name: Addie Applewood艾迪・蘋果木
descZh:
土城太陽議會蘋果席的代表，負責土城的外交。
有兩個孩子：佩妮・蘋果木和凱許・蘋果木。
descEn:
The representative of the Seat of Apple in the Council of Sols in Mudtown, in charge of diplomacy.
Addie has two kids: Penny Applewood and Cash Applewood.

qa.Q:
艾迪拒絕了你想要蘋果木的要求，你決定怎麼做？
Addie declined your request for the applewood, what do you do?
qa.C1:
向他闡明這是萊里女士的要求。
Telling him it's Miss Riley's request.
qa.C2:
點點頭，然後開始計劃該怎麼偷到蘋果木。
Nod, and start planning how to steal the applewood.
qa.R1:
艾迪咆哮道，萊里在土城也得遵守規矩，不得造次。
Addie roared, saying the even Riley should obey the rule in Mudtown.
qa.R2:
一週後，當艾迪發現蘋果木被偷時，你們已經離開土城了。
After Addie found that his applewood was stolen a week later, you're already out of Mudtown.

name: Alex艾麗克斯
descZh:
大學城科技區的工匠，專長是製作機甲。個性很直，但同時也討厭個性很直的人。
冒險者們帶著金屬手臂來找他研究，他十分有興趣。
比起和冒險者們討錢，他提出了請Midori把手臂拆下來借他研究，隔天再還給他，作為交易的籌碼。
descEn:
A mechanic in the tech division at the Great Citadel, who is best at working on mechas. She is a straight forward woman, but also dislike others who is straight forward.
The adventurers came to her with a metal arm, and she was interested in examining it.
Rather than charging the adventurers fee, Alex proposed that Midori take her arm down for her to do some research.

qa.Q:
艾麗克斯看著你身上的奇異裝備，詢問你是否介意讓他做個測試？
Alex looks at the strange equipment on your body, asking if you're willing to ket her do some testing on it?
qa.C1:
你點點頭，讓艾麗克斯著手研究。
You nod, permitting Alex to start researching.
qa.C2:
你搖搖頭，這是屬於你的珍貴物品，艾麗克斯不能想碰就碰。
You shake your head. This is your precious, Alex can't just touch it.
qa.R1:
研究一番過後，艾麗克斯提出報價，要用50枚金幣和你收購這些裝備。
After some research, Alex asks if she can buy your equipments for 50 gold pieces.
qa.R2:
艾麗克斯皺著眉頭，把你趕了出去。他不喜歡有人打擾他研究。
Alex frowns, and waves you out. She doesn't like to be interrupted in the middle of her research.

name: Alfenor阿爾芬諾
descZh:
被稱為蜘蛛王。
是多數人認定蜘蛛神教的主神，但其實地位低於母親大人。
10836年，由妖精王國的艾蒙醫生、法倫主教，和諾威爾的屍體粉塵，透過儀式融合而成。
descEn:
Also known as the Spider King.
Alfenor is mostly known as the God of the Spider-God religion, but is actually below Mother.
At year 10836, Alfenor was created by forging Dr. Elmond, Bishop Fallon and the dust of Norvelle’s body in the Elvish Kingdom through a ritual.

qa.Q:
你的腦中傳來窸窸窣窣的爬行聲，你摀住耳朵，聲音更大了。
You heard squeaking crawling sounds in your head. It sounds even louder when you cover your ears.
qa.C1:
屈服，放棄抵抗。
Give in, and stop resisting.
qa.C2:
用盡你的力量全力抵抗。你失去了意識。
Use all your effort to resist it. You lost consciousness.
qa.R1:
你感受到一股強大的力量侵入你。
You felt a strong force invading you.
qa.R2:
幾分鐘後，爬行聲消失了。你身邊的夥伴......看起來不太對勁。
A few minutes later, the sound disappeared. Your mate next to you...... looks a bit odd.

name: Alfie Fuller艾菲・富勒
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮的酒鬼，似乎總是醉醺醺的遊蕩在街上。
年約50，看起來在鎮上沒有家人。
時常酒醉後闖入勞迪俱樂部嚇唬來訪的外地人。
住在布魯斯家隔壁的破舊房屋內。
descEn:
The local drunk of Vowalon, who was always drunk on the road.
He was in his 50s and seems to be all alone in the town.
Alfie is often drunk while entering the Rowdy’s Club and scared travelers.
He lived in a house that is quite in a bad condition next the Bruce’s house.

qa.Q:
艾菲闖進酒館，抓者你的肩膀，大喊著危險。
Alfie runs into the tavern, grabs your shoulder, shouting danger.
qa.C1:
將他推開，繼續喝你的啤酒。不過是個瘋老頭。
You push him away, keep on with your beer. He's just a lunatic old man.
qa.C2:
你站了起來，詢問艾菲怎麼了？
You stand up, asking Alfie what's wrong?
qa.R1:
一天後，在屍體前，你回想起艾菲曾露出的恐慌的眼神。
A day later, facing the bodies, you remember Alfie's face of fear.
qa.R2:
布魯斯拍拍你的肩膀，告訴你艾菲還沒吃藥。
Bruce taps your shoulder, telling you that Alfie hasn't has his med yet.

name: Andrea Day安德烈亞・戴依
descZh:
大學城歷史區的現任區長。
個性古怪，有強烈的毒癮，辦公室基本上是煙霧瀰漫。
有個叫麥爾文的助手。
對各種不同宗教都有研究，過去曾研究攔截靈魂的方法，因此捕捉到蘿琳被月神帶走的靈魂。
descEn:
The current leader of the History District in the Great Citadel.
Andrea is a weird tempered man who has a very strong addiction to drugs, with his office mostly covered with dust.
He had an assistant named Melvin.
Andrea did research on all different religions, and once succeeded to intercept a soul, who happened to be Roline that was taken away by Phynoir.

qa.Q:
安德烈亞丟了一包「檸檬」給你，他的口中吐出橙黃色的煙。
Andrea handed you a bag of 'Lemon', blowing out orange smoke from his mouth.
qa.C1:
你大力吸了一口，新鮮嗆辣的味道直撲你的鼻腔。
You breath it in hard, fresh spicy flavor filled in your nostril.
qa.C2:
你搖了搖頭，和安德烈亞說了聲謝謝，便把「檸檬」還給他。
You shake your head, said thank you to Andrea, and gave 'Lemon' back to him.
qa.R1:
你不知道你看見的，究竟是安德烈亞儀式的成果，還是只是你的幻覺。
You're not sure if it's the result of Andrea's ritual or hallucination that you're seeing.
qa.R2:
安德烈亞咕噥一聲，叫麥爾文把你們趕走。
Andrea grunted, shouting Melvin to take you all out.

name: Anna安娜
descZh:
瑟巴諾鎮長索恩的妻子，視覺年齡約二十初頭，是個妖精。在索恩當上鎮長一段時間後來到瑟巴諾，與索恩相識並結婚。
在瑟巴諾被離奇屠村後，出現在Paladin面前，並透過自己的技術，將溶成泥的冒險者們重新培育出來。
似乎是蜘蛛王阿爾芬諾的後裔以及信徒。
在鎮長家的地底有座自己的實驗室。
將冒險者們重新培育出來後，安娜便消失了，但冒險者們卻發現自己身上出現了蜘蛛網型的印記，似乎是個詛咒。
再次出現時，安娜與母親大人一同威脅Paladin，後來又偽裝成蘿琳試著將Paladin帶走，實際是想對Paladin逼婚，以藉由他的貴族身份拿點好處。
透過Paladin的身體，將母親大人奪舍後，成為新的蜘蛛神。
descEn:
Anna is an elf who is the wife of mayor Thorne of Sebano, and looks like in her early 20s. She came to Sebano short after Thorne became the mayor of the town, and got married in a short time.
After the macabre slaughter of Sebano, Anna showed up to Paladin, and reformed the other adventurers from mud.
Anna seems to be a descendant and believer of Alfenor.
She has her own lab at the basement of the mayor’s house.
After recreating the adventurers, Anna disappeared, but the adventurers found some spider web-shaped totem on their bodies, that seems like a curse.
When Anna reappeared, she and Mother threatened Paladin, and also disguised as Roline, trying to take Paladin away. She was intended to force Paladin into marriage to take advantage of his noble identity.
Anna later invaded Mother’s body through Paladin, and became the new Spider God.

qa.Q:
你發現安娜的瞳孔看起來有點奇異，有點......不像人類。
You find Anna's pupil a bit odd, somewhat...... inhuman.
qa.C1:
你選擇沉默，不揭發這件事。
You choose to stay silent and not talk about this.
qa.C2:
你和索恩市長提及這件事。索恩市長感到震驚。
You told Mayor Thorne about this. He seemed surprised.
qa.R1:
你看見安娜對你露出詭異的微笑，不過幸好僅此而已。
You see Anna smiled at you in a weird way, but thank goodness, that's it.
qa.R2:
隔天，你倒在索恩市長的屍體旁，安娜變形的臉是你生前看到的最後景象。
The next day, you lay next to Mayor Thorne's body. Anna's twisted face is the last thing you see before you die.

name: Bartosz Richmond巴托斯。里奇蒙
descZh:
貝瑟頓的里奇蒙爵士。
里奇蒙家族似乎過去十分興旺，如今卻風華不再，且淪為城內人的笑話。
爵士於60歲左右時便開始失智，如今只能靠宅邸內的傭人用輪椅推著他才能行動。
他時不時會呼喊著「艾格妮絲」這個名字，但從家譜無法確定他喊的是他的老婆，還是祖母，兩人都叫艾格尼絲。
他有個女兒叫萊里。
爵士也對部分詞語有所反應，如「T.I.D.E.S.」。
descEn:
Syr Richmond from Batherdon.
The Richmond family used to be rich, but now they are nothing but a joke in Batherdon.
Bartosz suffered from dementia around his 60s, and can only move in a wheelchair with the aid of a maid in his mansion.
He often yells the name “Agnes", but can’t tell if it was his wife or grandmother, who both had the name Agnes.
He has a daughter named Riley.
Bartosz also responds to some words, like “T.I.D.E.S.".

qa.Q:
你找到了信中里奇蒙爵士提到的寶箱。你要依約帶回裡奇蒙宅邸，還是把寶箱帶走，離開貝瑟頓？
You found the treasure chest mentioned in Syr Richmond's letter. Do you bring it back to the Richmond mansion, or take it and leave Batherdon?
qa.C1:
帶著寶箱回到裡奇蒙宅邸。
Take the treasure chest back to the Richmond mansion.
qa.C2:
里奇蒙爵士受到寶箱的影響，恢復了神智。他把寶箱打開，將裡面的魔法物品分享給你們。
Syr Richmond was affected by the treaure chest and regain his consciousness. He opened the chest and shared the magical items in it with you.
qa.R1:
把寶箱帶離貝瑟頓。
Take the treasure chest out of Batherdon.
qa.R2:
你找變了王國的各大鎖匠與盜賊，依然打不開這個寶箱。
You looked for all famous locksmiths and thieves, but the treasure chest remain unopened.

name: Basuu巴蘇
descZh:
在《古斯塔夫諾曼失蹤事件》中艾爾諾新任的長老。有一名弟弟叫多蘇。
中年半妖精男性。
與來訪的古斯塔夫有激烈的爭執。
對來訪的冒險者們不予理睬，但在冒險者們離開營帳後，似乎表現出對於有人在調查古斯塔夫的死因很警惕。
descEn:
The new leader of El'Nore in “the Disappearance of Gustavo Norman". He has a brother named Dosuu.
A middle-aged half-elf.
He had an argument with Gustavo that went fierce.
Didn’t care about the visiting adventurers, but after they left the camp, he seemed to be very alert about people investigating the death of Gustavo.

qa.Q:
你們來到巴蘇的帳篷，想得到關於古斯塔夫失蹤事件的更多線索。
You come to Basuu's tent, wanting to get more information on the disappearance of Gustavo.
qa.C1:
你直接明瞭的詢問巴蘇關於古斯塔夫失蹤的事。
You directly ask Bass about Gustavo's disappearance.
qa.C2:
你偷偷觀察巴蘇的言行舉止和說的話。
You observe Basuu's behavior and his words in secret.
qa.R1:
巴蘇給了一些沒用的資訊，對你毫無幫助。
Basuu gives a bunch of useless information, which has no help to you.
qa.R2:
巴蘇和其他人說話時，有幾個關鍵字引起了你的注意。也許該問問其他居民這幾個地點在哪裡。
You heard certain keywords in Basuu's conversation with others. Maybe you should ask the other villagers about these places.

name: Beau波
descZh:
麥克嵩當地的七歲小女孩。父母在比武大會中死去，因此成為孤兒。
因為視台北市議員為偶像，要求加入一起冒險。在Midori與Siri的認可下加入台北市議員，並視Midori為媽媽，Siri為爸爸。
說話十分衝動不忌言，才剛加入台北市議員，得罪了當中不少人。
到妖精荒野後，以救世主的身份留在那裡，但最終除了波外，其他當地居民都在拉索斯教入侵後被消滅。回到物質世界時已年過40，便和冒險者們一起繼續以剿滅拉索斯教為目標冒險。
descEn:
A 7 years old girl fro, Macksohn, who lost her parents in the Macksohn Tournament, thus became an orphan.
Beau sees the Councilor of Tapei as her idol, so she asked to join them. With Midori and Siri acknowledging her, she joined the party and sees them as her parents.
Beau often speaks recklessly, and have already offended quite a lot of the party members.
When the party traveled to the Feywild, Beau stayed as the Messiah, but later she only survived to be the only one left after the Laxthos invasion. She was in her 40s when she came back to the material world, with the adventurers not aged yet. She traveled with the party and aimed to defeat the Laxthos.

qa.Q:
8歲的波站在冒險團隊前，說著自己要加入團隊。
Beau, who is eight years old, stand in front of the party, saying the she wants to join the party.
qa.C1:
接受他，並在一路上好好保護他。
Accept her, and protect her well on the road.
qa.C2:
拒絕他。你們光自己都顧不著了。
Decline her. You can't even take good care of yourselves.
qa.R1:
路上雖然艱辛，但波終究成為了可靠的夥伴。
Although it's a difficult trip, Beau become a helpful companion along the way.
qa.R2:
多年後再次回到麥克嵩時，你遭到一名浪客襲擊。「還記得我嗎？」
Years later when you arrive Macksohn, you're ambushed by a rogue. 'You still remmeber me?'

name: King Benevol II巴納沃二世
descZh:
麥丁頓的前任統治者。
在麥克嵩比武大會時遭到法蘭奇吸乾精力，卻在法蘭奇消失後彷彿完全恢復元氣，悄悄逃離了包廂。
在那之後，據說他傳位給了他的兒子艾略特四世，不見了。
descEn:
The ex-ruler of the Mattington Kingdom.
His soul was sucked out but Frankie at the Macksohn Tournament, but recovered after Frankie was gone, leaving the private box sneakily.
After that, it was known that he passed the throne to his son, Elliot IV, and was not seen again.

qa.Q:
你贏得了麥克嵩比武大會，國王巴納沃二世詢問你想要什麼作為獎賞？
You won the Macksohn Torunament. King Benevol II asked what you want as a price?
qa.C1:
你祈求成為禁衛軍的一員。
You ask to become one of the king's guard.
qa.C2:
你祈求一塊封地，成為領主。
You ask for a fief to be a lord.
qa.R1:
三年後，你以禁衛軍隊長的名號，成為貴族。
Three years later, you become a noble due to your title of the captain of king's guard.
qa.R2:
三年後，你的領地大豐收，你賺了不少錢。
Three years later, your earned quite some money due to the harvest in your fief.

name: Benny Cozlothramuda班尼・寇茲洛薩穆達
descZh:
本名班傑明，出身於歷史悠久的矮人家族。
沃瓦倫長年的腕力冠軍。
於沃瓦倫擔任潔絲敏失蹤事件的搜救隊一員，雖然對於沒能找到潔絲敏感到很懊惱，但本身爽朗的個性讓他對此沒有過度責怪自己。
descEn:
Benjamin was his full name, and he was from an ancient dwarf family.
Benny had been the longtime arm-wrestling champion in Vowalon.
He was also one of the rescue team to find Jasmine, but was upset that he failed. Good for him that he was a bright man that it didn’t linger too long.

qa.Q:
你擊敗班尼，贏得了沃瓦倫腕力冠軍。班尼拔下他的戒指，送給你作為贈禮。
You defeated Benny, becoming the Vowalon arm wrestling champion. Benny plugged off his ring, giving it to you.
qa.C1:
接受戒指，並將它戴上。
Accept the ring, and put it on your finger.
qa.C2:
禮貌的回絕，表示這是他家族的寶物，你不能拿。
Decline politely, saying it's his family heirloom, you shouldn't have it.
qa.R1:
酒館大家歡聲鼓舞，但你注意到班尼在角落生悶氣。
People in the tavern cheer and applause, but you notice Benny hiding in the corner, sulking.
qa.R2:
班尼向你擁抱，對你高尚的品德讚譽有加，但還是硬把戒指塞給你。
Benny embraces you, praises your noble character, but still gives you the ring.

name: Bernard Norm伯納德・諾姆
descZh:
麥克嵩的年輕貴族，家族似是經營牲畜的。
似乎對貴族間的雜交派對頗為熟悉。
與華生和Sugalu在王宮花園相談甚歡，而且對Sugalu十分在意。
似乎在鬥爭中被他所信任的潘蜜拉害死。
descEn:
A young noble in Macksohn, whose family does livestock business.
Bernard is quite familiar with the secret orgy parties within the noble circle.
He met Watson and Sugalu at the Palace Garden, and seemed to care about Sugalu pretty much.
It was suspected that his death was directed by his noble friend Pamela, who seemed to betray him due to the conflict between the nobles on whether to support the new king or not.

qa.Q:
踏入諾姆家，伯納德邀請你到二樓，見他臥床的母親。
Stepping into the Norm house, Bernard asks you to go two the second floor to see his bedridden mother.
qa.C1:
雖然聽起來有點怪異，但基於禮貌，還是點頭接受。
Although it sounds a bit weird, but to be polite, you still nod and accept.
qa.C2:
拒絕他，表示讓他母親好好休息，不打擾。
Decline him, saying it would disturb his mother, and his mother should rest.
qa.R1:
床單下隆起巨大的軀體。那很顯然不是人類。
A huge body appeared beneath the sheets. It's definitely not a human.
qa.R2:
伯納德露出失望的表情，但也不強迫你。
Bernard seems depressed, but he doesn't force you.

name: BoBo-C啵啵C/BoBo-Z啵啵Z
descZh:
與冒險者前往完成和洛森王國交易的機器人。
擔任馬車駕駛。
在呼喚了前輩啵啵W後，與龍蛋結合，進化成啵啵Z。
descEn:
A robot that traveled with the adventurers to the Lothum Kingdom, who acted as the carriage driver.
After calling BoBo-W, BoBo-C merged with the Dragon’s Orb and evolved into BoBo-Z.

qa.Q:
你看見了啵啵C和另一個相似的機器人正在溝通，但你聽不懂內容。
You see BoBo-C communicating with another robot, but you can't understand the language.
qa.C1:
隨他們去。只要能完成任務，中間有什麼插曲都沒關係。
Let them be. As long as the mission can be completed succefully, what happens in between doesn't matter.
qa.C2:
介入他們。你有預感他們的互動可能會讓任務有失敗的風險。
Intervene. You feel like their interaction might sabotage the mission.
qa.R1:
啵啵C長出了翅膀，成為啵啵Z，飛走了。你本可以阻止他的。
BoBo-C grows a pair of wings, transforming into BoBo-Z and flies away. You could've stopped this from happening.
qa.R2:
你將陌生的機器人趕走。任務順利成功了，但你似乎感覺到啵啵C有一股落寞。
You drive the strange robot away, and the mission was completed successfully. But you feel like BoBo-C is a bit depressed.

name: BoBo-V啵啵V/BoBo-W啵啵W
descZh:
札克的機器人夥伴，跟隨冒險者前往礦脈，取得龍蛋。
自行取得龍蛋後將它融入身體，進化成啵啵W。
二十多年後，以啵啵W的身份，協助啵啵C進化成啵啵Z，完成克里歐門王國與洛森王國的交易。
descEn:
The robot companion of Zach, following the adventurers to the mine to retrieve the Dragon’s Orb.
After retrieving the Dragon’s Orb, BoBo-V merged with it and evolved into BoBo-W.
20 years later, BoBo-W helped BoBo-C evolve into BoBo-Z, finalizing the trade between the Chryomen Kingdom and the Lothum Kingdom.

qa.Q:
你看見札克倒下後，啵啵V繼續往前探索。
You see Zach fall, but BoBo-V doesn't stop exploring.
qa.C1:
控制住啵啵V，他這樣亂跑很危險。
Control BoBo-V. It's dangerous of it to run around like this.
qa.C2:
不管啵啵V了，先為札克的屍體祈禱。
No need to care about BoBo-V. Praying over Zach's dead body is priority.
qa.R1:
啵啵V掙扎，但在你的控制之下他什麼也不能做。
BoBo-V struggles, but can't do a thing under your control.
qa.R2:
啵啵V消失在你眼前。你聽見洞穴傳來龍鳴聲。
BoBo-V is out of sight. The, your hear a dragon's roar from within the cave.

name: Bol-Bol波波/BoBo-OMEGA啵啵OMEGA
descZh:
擬人形機器人，帶領冒險者們與啵啵C前往完成與洛森王國的交易，但在半途中被冒險者要求拆解成零件。零件中顯示他的型號為啵啵OMEGA。
被設定為幼時因名字波波與機器人型號啵啵相似，而不喜歡自己的名字。
背後有烏瑪女王以外的勢力，但是沒有成功被冒險者們套出身份。
清楚知道自己是機器人的身份。
descEn:
A humanoid robot that accompanied the adventurers and BoBo-C to finalize the trade between the Lothum Kingdom and the Chryomen Kingdom, but was disassembled by itself due to the adventurers’ command. It was labeled BoBo-OMEGA.
It had a setting that due to its name close to the robot series BoBo, it disliked its name when it was young.
There seemed to be someone behind it other that Queen Uma of the Chryomen Kingdom, but it remained anonymous.
Bol-Bol is fully aware that it is actually a robot.

qa.Q:
你的夥伴正在將波波拆解，想了解這個機器人是怎麼運作的。
Your companion is trying to disassemble Bol-Bol, to figure out how this robot works.
qa.C1:
加入你的夥伴，好好研究一番。
Join your companion, and learn the mechanism.
qa.C2:
阻止你的夥伴，你們還得完成任務。
Stop your companion. You still have a mission to complete.
qa.R1:
你發現了一個神秘的裝置。這一定可以賣個好價錢。
You find a mysterious device. This can definitely fetch a good price.
qa.R2:
你的夥伴對你不開心。你聽見了波波對你說一聲謝謝。
Your companion is not pleased with you. Your hear Bol-Bol saying thank you.

name: Brock布拉克
descZh:
麥克嵩當地人，年約30的半獸人，舉止溫文有禮，有他自己的幽默感。對麥克嵩與崔尼斯教有些不信任。
在月先生的推薦下，加入冒險者們組成的樂團「荒野旋律」，擔任打擊手。
從小在麥克嵩長大，父母經營武器打鐵鋪，卻因經營不善而倒閉。
曾在黃昏酒館演出。
被斗篷人攻擊後陷入昏迷，且逐漸變得黝黑，長出毛皮，越來越不像人型生物了，最後成了拉茲特獸。
descEn:
A local Macksohn half-orc who is polite and humor in his own way. He didn’t trust Macksohn and the Trinix religion.
After the introduction by Mr. Moon, Brock joined the adventurer-formed band, Rhythm of the Wild as the drummer.
Brock grew up in Macksohn, with his parents as smiths, but the shop was closed due to bad business.
Brock used to play music in the tavern Nightfall.
He was down after attacked by the hooded figure and started to grew dark fur out of his skin, less human-like than before. He ended up becoming a Laztek.

qa.Q:
當布拉克說他會打鼓時，他翻開了他的肚皮，笑著開始拍奏。
When Brock says he can play the drum, he reveals his tummy and starts to pat it.
qa.C1:
笑了幾聲，跟著用你的樂器一起演奏。
Laugh a bit, and join him with your own instrument.
qa.C2:
露出不解的表情。肚皮才不是樂器。他肯定不學無術。
Reveals a confused expression. Tummy is not an instrument. He must be imcompetent.
qa.R1:
布拉克不久後拿出他的骨，技術了得。他對你印象很好。
Brock takes out his drumset not after long, and shows his skills. He has a good impression on you.
qa.R2:
布拉克乾笑幾聲化解尷尬。隔天你就沒有再看到他了。
Brock chuckles to defuse the embarrassment. You don't see him the next day.

name: Bruce Dunham布魯斯・頓翰
descZh: 勞迪俱樂部的老闆，年約50。
descEn: The owner of Rowdy’s Club. About 50 years old.

qa.Q:
布魯斯告訴你們隔天可以去看看鎮長戴洛。他可能有任務可以給你們。
Bruce suggest you to visit the mayor, Daryl. He might have missions for you.
qa.C1:
隔天去拜訪鎮長戴洛。
Visit Mayor Daryl the next day.
qa.C2:
隔天好好探索城鎮，用不著拜訪鎮長。
Explore the town the next day. Visiting the mayor is not necessary.
qa.R1:
鎮長戴洛給了你們一個危險的任務，但報酬蠻好的。
Mayor Daryl gives you a risky mission, but the pay is quite good.
qa.R2:
隔天夜晚，你們就離開了沃瓦倫。這裡沒什麼有趣之處。
The next night, you leave Vowalon. There's nothing interesting in this town.

name: Bruce Tallis布魯斯・塔里斯
descZh:
T.I.D.E.S.的成員之一，身形孔武有力，因此和阿龍在組織集會時，建立了交情。
但因一連串的誤會，導致自己陷入萬劫不復的深淵……
descEn:
A member of T.I.D.E.S. who has a strong body build, thus became friends with Al-lon during the T.I.D.E.S. gathering.
However, due to several misunderstandings, Bruce is now descending into the abyss with no return……

qa.Q:
格鬥場上，布魯斯看起來有點累，但眼神十分堅定。你想做什麼？
In the arena, Bruce looks a bit tired, but fierce in his eyes. What do you want to do?
qa.C1:
邀請他再打一場，分出個勝負。
Invite him for another round of fight, to see who is the winner.
qa.C2:
邀請他去享用自助餐。場下也是好哥兒們。
Invite him to the buffet. You can still be friends outside the arena.
qa.R1:
布魯斯在格鬥場上被打暈了。
Bruce was knocked out unconscious in the arena.
qa.R2:
布魯斯在自助餐吃太多，吃到吐了。
Bruce eats too much at the buffet that he throws up.

name: Cash Applewood凱許・蘋果木
descZh:
本名凱希斯。
佩妮的弟弟，長相清秀。
想藉由贏得本屆的「春日精靈」，來讓姊姊佩妮卸下重擔，同時不失去家庭因「春日精靈」得到的好處。
十分崇拜阿龍。
descEn:
Cassius Applewood.
Penny’s younger brother. Has a delicate and pretty face.
Cash wants to win the title of "the Spirit of Spring" to unleash the burden of his sister, while keeping the benefits of the title for the family.
Cash looks up to Al-lon pretty much.

qa.Q:
你看見一名清秀的女裝男孩，他似乎正在為了徵選「春日精靈」努力拜票著。是凱許！
You see a delicate pretty boy dressed as a girl. It seems like he's campaigning to be selected as "the Spirit of Spring". It's Cash!
qa.C1:
拍拍他的肩膀，告訴他議會不會讓他過關的。
Pat his shoulder, telling him that the council wouldn't allow this.
qa.C2:
擁抱他，然後為他拉票。
Embrace him, and start campaigning for him.
qa.R1:
凱許卸下他的裝扮，露出失望的表情。
Cash removes his costumes, revealing a sad face.
qa.R2:
雖然最後議會還是不讓他參選，努力過的凱許沒有挫敗的表情。
Although he's not allowed by the council eventually, Cash tried and doesn't look beaten down at all.

name: Cena希納
descZh:
馬格努斯爵士聘請的馬伕，本名約翰，被Paladin稱為希納。
在駕馬車前往麥克嵩前，才剛被馬格努斯爵士聘用一個月不到，薪水都還沒領。
協助Paladin將拷問他的衛兵擊暈，假扮成衛兵押解Paladin走在麥克嵩城內。
與Paladin一同在日出酒館鬥毆，帶著Paladin的魅力頭帶與大部分的武器消失在麥克嵩。
在比武大會說明會前，與一名女子，碧翠絲，出現在王宮前市集。
descEn:
A stableman hired by Syr Magnus. His name was John, but was mocked by Paladin as Cena.
Before driving the carriage to Macksohn, he had only been hired less than a month, without getting his payment yet.
Cena helped knocked out the guard that tortured Paladin, and disguised as the guard to take Paladin into Macksohn.
Cena joined Paladin in the tavern fight in Sunrise, but disappeared with Paladin’s Headband of Charm and most weapons after the fight.
Before the Macksohn Tournament, he was seen with a noble lady, Beatrice, at the Macksohn Plaza.

qa.Q:
你看見希納戴著Paladin的魅力頭帶，悄悄從酒館門口溜走，你選擇做什麼？
You see Cena wearing Paladin's Headband of Charm, sneaking out of the tavern. What do you do?
qa.C1: 大聲告訴Paladin，說希納跑走了。/nShout to Paladin, telling him Cena escaped.
qa.C2: 默默看著希納離開，不多說一聲。/nWatch Cena leaves without saying anything.
qa.R1:
一週後，你看到希納和一名貴族女子牽手走在麥克嵩王宮附近。
A week later, you see Cena walking, holding hands with a noble girl around the Macksohn Palace.
qa.R2:
一週後，你看到希納頭低低的跟著Paladin。他的頭上，當然沒有帶著魅力頭帶。
A week later, you see Cena walking with Paladin with his head down. And of course, he's not wearing the Headband of Charm.

name: Dr. Chandra Pyresong茜卓・派松博士
descZh:
YHWH過去的師傅，是一名烈焰術士。一頭短髮，繡有火焰的黑色皮衣是他的專屬標誌。
在冒險者們來到大學城時，正好在外修行。
在大學城有個十分舒服的住處，讓冒險者們可以暫時居住。
在趕回大學城後，追逐有著巫妖之手的Ron，在兩人單獨戰鬥時自爆而亡，但Ron僅重傷而已。
descEn:
The former master of YHWH, a pyromancer. She had short hair and shapes of flames on her black leather jacket.
She was out of town traveling when the adventurers arrived the Great Citadel.
She had a nice place to live in the Great Citadel, that acted as a temporary home for the adventurers.
After she hurried back to the Great Citadel, Dr. Chandra chased down Ron, who had the lich’s hand, but self-exploded during the fight, while Ron only had some scratches.

qa.Q:
聽聞茜卓・派松博士的死訊，身為學生的你來到大學城，但博士的房子已經被人佔據了。你要怎麼做？
As a student of Dr. Chandra Pyresong, you come to the Greate Citedel after learning her death. But you see her house occupied by someone else. What do you do?
qa.C1:
強行闖入與入侵者對峙，不能隨便讓博士的房子被人佔用。
Walk straight into the house to face the invader. Dr. Chadra's house should not be occupied by anyone so easily.
qa.C2:
到大學城中央塔和城主確認發生了什麼事。
Visit the Central Tower of the Great Citadel, to ask the leader what happened.
qa.R1:
你在房中看見師兄YHWH。看來是他繼承了博士的房子。
You see your senpai YHWH in the house. Seems like he inherits Dr. Chandra' house.
qa.R2:
城主告訴你在茜卓博士死後，他的弟子YHWH繼承了他的房子。
The leader told you that Dr. Chandra's disciple YHWH inherit the house after her death.

name: Chi-Chi綺綺
descZh:
住在「下沉回音」沼澤深處小木屋內的一名老太太，自稱從出生至此都住在這。
行動非常緩慢，外貌有些醜惡，但對冒險者們非常溫暖。
屋子內有異常多的巴坦腳，且似乎獵殺了不少青蛙人。
descEn:
An old lady living in a cabin in the swamp, the Sinking Echoes, who claimed to have been living here since she was born.
Chi-Chi moved very slowly, and didn’t have a good looking, but was very warm to the adventurers.
There are quite a lot of Bach’tahn appendages in her cabin, and it also seemed like Chi-Chi hunted down quite a lot of Bullywugs.

qa.Q:
「喝點茶吧？」綺綺對你説道。茶的顏色看起來不太乾淨。
"Have some tea," said Chi-Chi. The color of the tea looks dirty.
qa.C1:
禮貌地喝了一口。
Politely sip the tea.
qa.C2:
和綺綺禮貌地拒絕。
Politely deline Chi-Chi.
qa.R1:
口味不錯，而且身體沒有不舒服。至少現在還沒有。
It tastes good. Also, you don't feel uncmfortable. At least for now.
qa.R2:
綺綺打開櫃子把茶收了起來。櫃子裡面好像有隻死貓。
Chi-Chi opens the cabinet to store the tea. There seems to be a dead cat in the cabinet.

name: Connie Cornell康妮・康乃爾
descZh:
土城太陽議會的議員之一，玉米席的康妮・康乃爾，被阿龍稱為玉米小姐。
負責掌管土城的娛樂相關事項，包含春天精靈的投票。
疑似與山賊團體「海雅特山交響樂」有所勾結，但以他所述，春天精靈語山賊之間的契約早在他擔任議員之前就已經存在了。
descEn:
A member of the Council of Sols in Mudtown, Connie Cornell, the Seat of Corn, was called "Miss Corn" by Al-lon.
Connie is in charge of entertainment in Mudtown, including the voting of the Spirit of Spring.
It seemed that Connie might have worked out something suspicious with the bandit group “Mt. Hyatt Symphony", but as she said, the contract between the bandits and the Spirit of Spring had been there before she was in the council.

qa.Q:
你看見玉米小姐在公布春天精靈選票時造假，把瑪麗貝爾的名字唸成佩妮。
You see Miss Corn cheat when anouncing the Spirit of Spring votes, mispronouncing Maribel's name as Penny.
qa.C1:
大聲質疑，要求重新驗票。
Question the ticket count loudly and demand a recount.
qa.C2:
放過不管。
Let it slide.
qa.R1:
鎮民露出無奈的表情，玉米小姐完全不理你。
The villagers looks helpless, and Mis Corn ignores you completely.
qa.R2:
你感到良心不安。最後的結果佩妮的票數全面碾壓瑪麗貝爾。
You feel unease. The final result: Penny outvoted Maribel for a wide margin.

name: Dr. Crow烏鴉醫生
descZh:
在《鬧鬼荒野的偽多頭龍》中鬧鬼荒野當地醫生，似乎是個德魯伊。
養了一隻狗狗，叫馬可。
15051年在冒險者們來訪時，已經沒了狗狗，甚至不記得自己是否有養過狗。
烏鴉醫生在診所的牆壁上凌亂的以德魯伊語寫下自己記得關於兩年前被怪獸襲擊的隻字片語，但卻無法將內容完整拼湊。
descEn:
The doctor in Moorland Haunt from “The False Hydra of Moorland Haunt". Seems like a druid.
He has a dog companion named Marco.
When the adventurers visited Dr. Crow in 15051D.E., the dog was gone, and Dr. Crow didn’t even knew if he had a dog or not.
Dr. Crow marked some druidic writings on his walls, try to record the monster attack incident that happened 2 years ago, but couldn’t piece them together.

qa.Q:
烏鴉醫生給你一個你沒看過的藥丸，讓你嘗試。
Dr. Crow hands you a pill that you've never seen before.
qa.C1:
你覺得不太安心，拒絕了。
You feel unsafe, decline the offer.
qa.C2:
你吞了下去，比想像中的能接受。
You swallowed the pill. It's more acceptable than you would have thought.
qa.R1:
烏鴉醫生表示除了這個藥，他沒有別的方法能治好你的疾病。
Dr. Crow says other than this medicine, he has nothing that can cure your desease.
qa.R2:
你感到一陣恍惚，彷彿斷片了一陣子。醒來後，你覺得你的病好了。
You feel a moment of disorientation and black out. When you wake up, you feel cured.

name: Daryl Warren戴洛・沃倫
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮的鎮長。
潔絲敏的丈夫，山米克的父親。
在山米克死後便變得鬱鬱寡歡。
descEn:
The mayor of Vowalon.
Husband to Jasmine and father to Samick.
Became depressed after the death of Samick.

qa.Q:
戴洛帶著你們來到他兒子山米克的墓前，跪了下來。
Daryl brings you to his son's grave, and kneels down.
qa.C1:
跟著跪下來，默念拉索斯的禱詞。
Kneel with him, chanting Laxthosian prayers.
qa.C2:
站著，用你熟悉的祝禱詞為山米克祈禱。
Stand, and pray for Samick with prayers you're familiar with.
qa.R1:
戴洛抱著你。「拜託你們，一定要幫我找到我兒子死亡的真相。」
Daryl hugs you."Please...... please find the truth behind Samick's death."
qa.R2:
戴洛站了起來。「謝謝你們，路上請保重。」
Daryl stands up. "Thank you all. Please be careful on the road."

name: Dr. David大衛醫師
descZh:
麥克嵩當地醫生。
在日出酒館目睹殺人事件後被Lemmy威脅。
在Midori博得他的信任後，從他身上得到不少關於這座城市的情報，也引薦Ron去艾德蒙餐酒館（麥克嵩分店）擔任廚師。
為人十分理性與冷靜。
與日出酒館前老闆喬納森、衛兵刀疤臉以及艾德蒙餐酒館的店長路易斯都是舊識。
非常照顧他的弟弟，丹尼斯。
descEn:
A local doctor in Macksohn.
Threatened by Lemmy after he saw the murder in Sunrise.
After gaining his trust, Midori got a lot of information about Macksohn from him, and also recommend Ron to Edmond’s Diner as a cook
Is a radical and calm man.
He had known the ex-owner of Sunrise, Jonathan, the guard, Scar-Face, and the manager of Edmond’s Diner, Lewis for a long time.
Dr. David takes very good care of his brother, Dennis.

qa.Q:
大衛醫師把你拉到旁邊。「這裡不安全，我幫你介紹個新地方工作吧。」
Dr. David pulls you aside. "It's not safe here. I can introduce you to another place to work."
qa.C1:
接受大衛醫師的提議。
Accept Dr. David's offer.
qa.C2:
拒絕大衛醫師的提議。
Reject Dr. David's offer.
qa.R1:
隔天，大衛醫師帶你來到艾德蒙餐酒館。店長讓你加入，但他對你好像有些意見。
The next day, Dr. David takes you to Edmond's Diner. The manager seems to have a problem with you.
qa.R2:
你繼續在日出酒館工作。但新任老闆法蘭奇變得比以前更古怪。
You stay at the tavern Sunrise. But the new owner Frankie seems to be even odder than before.

name: Dennis丹尼斯
descZh:
自稱半神丹尼斯，是麥克嵩大衛醫師的雙胞胎弟弟，與大衛醫師長得可以說是一模一樣，不過打扮較為陰沈。
似乎對於蜘蛛王阿爾芬諾在冒險者們身上下的詛咒有些看法。
其實丹尼斯是個不學無術的失業者，只是想證明給自己的哥哥自己也是有能力的，但卻沒有辦法拯救被詛咒的冒險者們。不過，丹尼斯的確曾去過深淵，但那是在他年幼時生病陷入昏迷時發生的事。
descEn:
Called himself “Dennis the Demigod". Dennis is the twin brother of Dr. David, they look quite alike, but he is more gloomy than his brother.
Seemed to have some thoughts about the curse that Alfenor put on the adventurers.
Dennis is actually a jobless man, trying to prove to his brother that he is capable of doing meaningful things, but failed to save the cursed adventurers. However, Dennis did went to the Deep, but that happened when he got into coma after he got sick when he was a child.

qa.Q:
你很清楚半神丹尼斯現在在做的「儀式」只是他在隨便演戲。你要拆穿他嗎？
You're very clear the "ritual" Dennis the Demigod is performing is just a performance. Do you expose him?
qa.C1:
看在大衛醫師的面子上，你讓丹尼斯繼續表演。
On behalf of Dr. David, you let Dennis continue on his performance.
qa.C2:
你利用丹尼斯站在你身後的機會，站起身來將他敲暈。
You take advantage of the opportunity when Dennis is standing right behind you, stand up and knock him out.
qa.R1:
「你們得去深淵一趟，否則你們的詛咒不會解除！」丹尼斯高聲喊道。
"You must to go the Deep, or your curse will not be removed!" Dennis shouts.
qa.R2:
「你做了什麼？」大衛醫師質問你。「他可是我弟弟啊！」
"What have you done?" Dr. David questions you. "He's my brother!"

name: Domneil多姆尼爾
descZh:
自稱是詐欺之神奧提森的兒子。
透過項鍊與Tai Tai我還要以及Midori對話，並簽下契約。
曾將Jiaheng、Uko與Usioni從死亡救起，而與他們訂下契約，要他們比賽惡作劇，讓勝者成為他在人世間的代理人。
descEn:
Claimed to be the son of Ultisen, the God of Trickster.
Talked to Tai Tai and Midori through a necklace, and made them signed a contract.
He onced save Jiaheng, Uko and Usioni from death, and forced them to sign a contract to race out who is the best trickster. The winner would be his champion in the material world.

qa.Q:
「叫你夥伴把那個箱子打開，」多姆尼爾在你腦中說道。「會很有趣的。」
"Tell your friends to open that box," Says Domneil in your head. "It's gonna be fun."
qa.C1:
遵從多姆尼爾的指示，叫你的夥伴把箱子打開。
Follow Domneil's order, and tell your friends to open the box.
qa.C2:
保持警戒，叫夥伴們不要去碰那個箱子。
Stay alert, and tell your companions not to touch the box.
qa.R1:
一條巨蛇從箱子內竄出。「我喜歡你這傢伙。」多姆尼爾在你腦中笑著說。
A giant snake darted out of the box. "I like you, buddy." Domneil laughs in your head.
qa.R2:
沒事發生。「你真無趣啊。」多姆尼爾在你腦中說道。
Nothing happens. "You're such a boring person." says Domneil in your head.

name: Dosuu多蘇
descZh:
在《古斯塔服諾曼失蹤事件》中艾爾諾當地半妖精男子，長老巴蘇的弟弟。
因為懂普通語，被人請來帶領冒險者們見艾爾諾的長老與教主。
descEn:
A half elf in El'Nore from “The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman". Also the brother of the leader, Basuu.
Knew Common, thus was asked to lead the adventurers to meet the leader and priest in El'Nore.

qa.Q:
多蘇用生硬的普通語和你打了聲招呼。你的夥伴中只有你懂妖精語。
Dosuu greets you with a his broken Common. You're the only one who knows Elvish in your group.
qa.C1:
用普通語和多蘇詢問關於艾爾諾的事。
Ask Dosuu about El'Nore in Common.
qa.C2:
用妖精語和多蘇詢問關於艾爾諾的事。
Ask Dosuu about El'Nore in Elvish.
qa.R1:
多蘇禮貌的介紹了這個鎮子，然後帶你去見他的哥哥，長老巴蘇。
Dosuu introduce you the town, and lead you to his brother, the leader Basuu.
qa.R2:
多蘇帶你繞了一圈艾爾諾，這裡似乎有很多規矩和禁忌。
Dosuu leads you around El'Nore. There seems to be quite a lot of rules and taboos.

name: Edmond艾德蒙
descZh:
艾德蒙餐酒館的老闆兼大廚，不過現在不太親自下廚了。
戴著特殊設計的廚師帽，似乎很刻意地把自己的耳朵塞在帽子底下。
descEn:
The owner and chef of Edmond’s Diner, but he rarely goes into the kitchen now.
Edmond wears a specially-designed chef’s hat, trying to hide his ears to hide his identity as an elf.

qa.Q:
你突然意識到艾德蒙帽子下長長的耳朵。他肯定不是人類。
You notice the long ear covered under Edmond's hat. He's definitely not human.
qa.C1:
那又如何？不是人類也不會怎麼樣。
So be it. There's no problem not being a human.
qa.C2:
和身邊的夥伴竊竊私語，猜測艾德蒙可能是妖精。
Speak with your companions secretly, guessing Edmond is actually an elf.
qa.R1:
你好好享受了美味的一餐。下次來到麥克嵩，你還想再次造訪這家餐廳。
You enjoy the delicious meal. You're ready to come here again next time you visit Macksohn.
qa.R2:
你注意到艾德蒙對你們露出了失望的表情，他很快便消失在廚房內。
You notice Edmond's long face towards you. In a short time, he disappears in the kitchen.

name: Elby 艾爾比/ Dr. White 白醫師
descZh:
出現在多侖維爾的「醫生」。
外觀年齡約二十初頭，皮膚蒼白，髮色銀白，穿著也是全白，只有雙眼是碧藍色的。身形非常纖瘦到看起來不健康的程度，給人一種妖精的感覺，卻沒有尖耳朵。
可以在一般時空和妖精荒野間穿越。
他的群體似乎有著一般時空沒有的醫療技術。
在一般世界被稱為白醫師，而在妖精荒野則被稱為艾爾比。
在主持Midori和波的救世主試煉的最後，被發現是拉索斯在妖精荒野的間諜，善於使用魔法，且手上刺滿拉索斯教的經文。在將Midori拖往另一個時空時，被Midori殺死。
descEn:
A “doctor" appearing in Dorrenville.
Looked like in her early 20s, with pale skin, silver-white hair, and also wears in all white, with only her eyes blue. She was so thin that it looked unhealthy. She gave a feeling of elf, but without the pointy ears.
Elby can transport between the material world and the Feywild freely.
Her people seemed the have a high-tech medical profession not seen in the material world.
She was called Dr. White in the material world, but Elby in the Feywild.
After hosting the trial of the Messiah between Midori and Beau, she was found to be the spy working for Laxthos in Feywild. She was good in magic, and had Laxthos writings all on her arms. She was killed by Midori after dragging Midori in another plane.

qa.Q:
「跟著我唸咒語吧。」白醫師微笑說道。但你聽不懂他的咒語用的是什麼語言。
"Chant the spell after me." Dr. White smiles and says. But you have no idea what kind of language she uses in the spells.
qa.C1:
跟著白醫師唸咒語。就算不懂這個語言，唸的差不多就可以了吧？
Chant the spell with Dr. White. Even if you don't understand the language, it's alright if that sounds similiar, right?
qa.C2:
默默跟在旁邊，但不念咒語。
Stay next to Dr. White without chanting the spell.
qa.R1:
你的身體發光，有些刺痛，然後你暈了過去。
Your body glows, aching, then you faint.
qa.R2:
你看見白醫師身體變得透明，然後消失了。
You see the body of Dr. White fading, and disappears.

name: King Elliot IV艾略特四世
descZh:
麥丁頓王國的新任國王。
年約10歲，母后為瑪莉恩女士。
被認為只是個魁儡而已。
descEn:
The new King of the Mattington Kingdom.
He is about 10 years old, and his mother is Lady Marian.
He is seemed as a puppet only.

qa.Q:
你遠遠看著新上任的國王，艾略特四世。他看起來頂多十歲而已。
You look at the new king, King Elliot IV. He seems like he's at most 10 years old.
qa.C1:
你跪了下來。國王就是國王。
You kneel. Your king is your king, no matter what.
qa.C2:
你遲疑。這點年紀，能領導國家？
You hesitate. Can he rule the kingdom in this age?
qa.R1:
「起身。」艾略特四世的聲音顫抖。但你看見他的眼神堅定。
"Rise." You hear King Elliot IV's voice trembling, but his gaze firm.
qa.R2:
「你膽敢忤逆國王？」你在腦中聽見憤怒的女聲。
"You dare disobey the king?" You hear an angry voice in your head, in a female voice.

name: Elly Riversend河艾麗
descZh: 阿龍的養母，十分溫柔慈祥。
descEn:
Al-lon’s foster mother.
Elly is a warm and gentle lady.

qa.Q:
你看著阿龍多年來再次見到自己的母親，有點難為情。
You see Al-lon seeing his mother again in years. He seems to be a bit embarrased.
qa.C1:
推阿龍一把，鼓勵他擁抱他的母親。
Shove Al-lon, tell him to hug his mother.
qa.C2:
微笑看著阿龍。也許這就是他面對父母的方式吧。
Smile and look at Al-lon. Maybe that's his way with his parents.
qa.R1:
阿龍抓抓頭，扭捏地抱了抱自己的母親。艾麗看起來很開心。
Al-lon scratches his head, hugs his mother awkwardly. Elly looks very happy.
qa.R2:
艾麗走進廚房忙碌。半小時後，他端出豐盛的餐點，邀請大家一起享用。
Elly goes into the kitchen. After half an hour, she serves a sumptuous meal and invites everyone to enjoy it together.

name: Elmond艾蒙
descZh:
妖精王國的醫生，擁有由蜘蛛絲製作而成的紗布。
透過儀式，與法倫和諾威爾的粉塵融合為阿爾芬諾。
descEn:
A doctor in the Elf Kingdom Lothum.
He has bandages made by spider-web.
With a ritual, he merged with Fallon and the dust of Norvelle, becoming Alfenor.

qa.Q:
你看見在艾蒙身旁，有一包看起來奇異的紗布。
You see a pack of special gauze right next to Elmond.
qa.C1:
和艾蒙請教，這個紗布有什麼特別之處？
Asks Elmond what is special about this gauze?
qa.C2:
趁著艾蒙沒注意的時候，偷偷摸走它。
Sneakly steal it from Elmond when he's not paying attention.
qa.R1:
「這是我自己做的。」艾蒙說。「材料是......秘密。」
"I made them myself." Says Elmond. "And the material is...... confidential."
qa.R2:
當你從背包再度翻出這包紗布時，上面爬滿了蜘蛛。
When you take the pack out again from you bag, it's covered with spiders.

name: Enelmor Arylith艾內莫・艾瑞利斯
descZh:
阿龍的嬸嬸。
與瑟拉蒙為夫妻，有三名孩子：瑟拉斯、奈梨紗和維瑞克。
有嚴重的失眠，因此自己磨製安眠藥，存放在廚房內。
descEn:
Al-lon’s aunt.
Wife of Theramond, father of three: Serathe, Nylessa, and Vaelric.
She suffers from severe insomnia, so she made sleeping powders herself, and kept it in the kitchen.

qa.Q:
你看見阿龍和瑟拉斯在爭吵，艾內莫站在遠處默默看著。
You see Al-lon and Serathe fighting. Enelmor observing from far away.
qa.C1:
「身為長輩，你不介入嗎？」你問艾內莫。
"As an elder, don't you intervene?" You ask Enelmor.
qa.C2:
你默默觀察艾內莫，不特別靠近。
You observe Enelmor, not staying too close.
qa.R1:
「與繼承有關的是，我不好插手。」艾內莫默默說到。
"It's not good for me to intervene incidents involving inheritance" Enelmore says in a lower voice.
qa.R2:
你注意到艾內莫的黑眼圈，他似乎長期失眠。
You notice dark circles under Enelmor's eyes. Seems like she hasn't sleep well for some time.

name: Essis艾希斯
descZh:
狂暴戰士幫成員之一，鬥名為「巫妖剋星」。
前往聖拉雅米島調查後下落不明。
冒險者在金海岸礦坑下方的廢墟中找到了她的下落並一同打到了礦坑中的怪物。
戰鬥結束後艾希斯將她的武器「異教徒殺手」送給了冒險者。
descEn:
A member of the Raging Warriors, known in battle as the “Lichbane.
She went missing after traveling to St. Rayami Island for an investigation.
The adventurers eventually discovered her fate in the ruins beneath the Golden Coast Mines and fought alongside her against the monsters lurking there.
After the battle, Essis entrusted her weapon, “the Heretic Slayer,” to the adventurers.

qa.Q:
「這把劍，『異教徒殺手』，就交給你了。」艾希斯將他的寶劍遞給你。
"This sword, 'the Heretic Slayer', is yours." Essis hands her sword to you.
qa.C1:
慎重地接下寶劍。
Take the sword carefully.
qa.C2:
和艾希斯拒絕，這個重責大任你承擔不起。
Decline Essis. You can't bear this responsibility.
qa.R1:
「津菈教的信眾們就交給你們守護了。」艾希斯揮了揮手。
"The believes of Keinra are now in your care." Essis waves her hand.
qa.R2:
「看來我還得扛下這個責任好一陣子啊！」艾希斯看向天空。
"Seems like I'm still gonna take on this responsibility for some while!" Essis looks at the sky.

name: Eva伊娃
descZh:
卓茲蘭的寧靜酒館老闆雅各的新婚妻子，年紀十分的輕。
看起來十分靦腆害羞，穿著也很樸素。
後來被冒險者們發現在卓茲蘭的洞穴，被改造成恐怖的怪物。
descEn:
The newly wed young wife of Jacob of the tavern Silence in Drogsland.
Eva looked shy and dressed very simple. The adventurerslater found her transformed into a scary creature in the Cave of Drogsland

qa.Q:
你看見伊娃的軀體在手術台上，扭曲而變形。「我好痛苦......」他說。
You see Eva's body on the operating table, twisted. "I'm in so much pain......" She says.
qa.C1:
你將伊娃從手術台上抱下來，準備將他帶回地面。
You pick Eva from the operating table, preparing to take her back to the surface.
qa.C2:
你拿起武器，準備朝著伊娃攻擊。
You take out your weapon, preparing to attack Eva.
qa.R1:
你把伊娃扛在你的背上。你感覺到黏糊糊的蠕動感。
You carry Eva on your back. You feel a squishy wriggling sensation.
qa.R2:
伊娃張開他變形的嘴，發出尖銳的叫聲。
Eva opens her twisted mouth, screams loudly.

name: Evil Be-4壞四人
descZh:
土城的「壞蛋四人幫」，但阿龍總是稱他們為「壞四人」。成員包含：
喜愛勒索的格林道爾，骯髒惡臭的皮伯，脾氣暴躁的湯伯，以及破壞公務的賽菲。
時常霸凌土城的孩子們。
descEn:
The "Evil Gang of 4" in Mudtown, but Al-lon always call them the "Evil Be-4". With members including:
The blackmailing Grindle, the dirty Pibble, the irritable Tumble, and the vadalist Zaffie.
They often pick on and bully kids in Mudtown.

qa.Q:
你看見佩妮邀請壞蛋四人幫作為他的春天騎士團，準備出發去見山賊。
You see Penny inviting the Evil Be-4 as her Spring Knights, preparing to meet the bandits.
qa.C1:
你懷疑佩妮的品味，怎麼這麼差？
You suspect Penny's taste. That's pretty bad.
qa.C2:
該不會佩妮有什麼把柄在他們身上吧，你擔心道。
Penny wouldn't have any leverage over them, would she? You worry.
qa.R1:
縱使佩妮還是全土城最漂亮的女孩子，他在你心中地位動搖了。
Although Penny is still the prettiest girl in Mudtown, her position in your heart have wavered.
qa.R2:
你看見皮伯骯髒的臉上露出怪異的表情，你覺得不太舒服。
You see a weird expression on Pibble's dirty face. You feel disgusted.

name: Fallon法倫
descZh:
妖精王國中樹林之神涅西斯的主教，後來成為蜘蛛神教的創始者之一。
與艾蒙醫生共同執行儀式，兩人與諾威爾的粉塵融合為阿爾芬諾。
descEn:
The bishop of Nessis, the God of Forest, in the Elf Kingdom Lothum, who became one of the founder of the Spider-God religion.
Held the ritual with Dr. Elmond, merging with him and the dust of Norvelle to become Alfenor.

qa.Q:
「來，跟隨我，閉上雙眼，輕輕擺動你的身體。」你聽見法倫說著。
"Here, close your eyes, and gently sway your body."
qa.C1:
閉上眼睛，讓身體隨風擺動。
Close your eyes, and let your body sway with the wind.
qa.C2:
假裝照做，但偷偷睜開眼睛。
Act like you follow, but open your eyes secretly.
qa.R1:
你感到暈眩，然後逐漸失去意識。
You feel dizziness, then you lose your conscious eventually.
qa.R2:
「有人不遵守規則喔！」你聽見法倫的聲音朝著你靠近。
"Someone's not following the rule." You hear Fallon's voice moving close to you.

name: Mr. Flaerry弗列里先生
descZh:
Paladin的老師，前邁丁頓王國騎士團團長，現已退休。
待客十分大方，不過似乎和太太羅莎之間有些相處上的狀況，分房睡。
對於寇林菲爾德一代的性產業似乎暸若指掌。
膝下無子，視Paladin為己出。
為了讓麥克嵩的紫羅蘭承認Paladin是她的兒子，放棄了自己的爵位。
descEn:
The mentor of Paladin, ex-head of the knight in the Mattington Kingdom, now retired.
Was a generous host, but seems to have some gap with his wife, as they slept separately.
Knew a lot about the sex industry in Korringfield.
Flaerry didn’t have any child, thus saw Paladin as his son.
He gave up his title to ask for the Violet of Macksohn to admit Paladin as her child.

qa.Q:
你看見弗列里先生東張西望後，走入了一間沒有招牌的酒館。
You see Mr. Flaerry looking around, then sneaks into a tavern without a sign.
qa.C1:
慢慢經過，向酒館內看了一眼。
Walk slowly pass the tavern, and look inside.
qa.C2:
裝作不知道，自然地走進了酒館。
Act like you know knothing, and walk into the tavern.
qa.R1:
你看見酒館內暗暗的，什麼也看不清楚。
You see dimness in the tavern. You can't see anything.
qa.R2:
你看見弗列里先生和一名青年男子親暱的說話，十指交扣。
You see Mr. Flaerry talks with a young man intimately. Their fingers crossing each others'.

name: Frankie法蘭奇
descZh:
麥克嵩日出酒館的店小二。
在荒野旋律組成時，搶先擔任樂團的贊助人，被Samael敬稱為老闆。
在日出老闆喬納森失蹤時，與Ron一同前往老闆家，但沒有找到人。法蘭奇前後言詞不一的行為讓Ron感到非常可疑。之後暫時擔任日出的老闆，但與老闆失蹤似乎有什麼關聯……
在台北市議員重返日出酒館時，因為態度惡劣且敲詐他們，法蘭奇被切斷右手臂，且放入百寶袋內，慘遭滅口。在他被放入袋子前的最後一刻，口中吐出了瑟巴諾的地名。
台北市議員們將法蘭奇棄屍於地下道內一處開口的底下。
在麥克嵩比武大會授獎儀式後，悄悄出現在國王巴納沃二世身後。在吸乾了國王的精力後，化身為名為「暗影之父」的惡魔，飛向台北市議員們所處的觀眾席，對他們出擊。在被台北市議員們擊敗時，留下了「我會回來的。」一句話，便消失不見。
descEn:
A waiter in Sunrise, the local tavern in Macksohn.
When the adventurers formed the band “Rhythm of the Wild", he became the patron of the band, with Samael calling him boss.
When Jonathan, the owner of Sunrise gone missing, Ron and him went to Jonathan’s house, but couldn’t find anyone. His contradictory words got Ron suspicious. He later became the temporary owner of Sunrise, but it seemed like the missing of Jonathan had something to do with him……
As the party got back to Sunrise, he became mean and even extorted them, leading to his arm chopped off and himself dropped into the bag of holding. Before his last breath, he whispered the name of a nearby village “Sebano".
The party dropped his body under the sewer.
After the awarding ceremony at the Macksohn Tournament, Frankie sneaked up behind King Benevol II, and transformed into a demon named "the Father of Shadows"after sucking out his spirit, flying to the auditorium, and attacked the party and the people. As the party defeated him, he left the words “I’ll be back" and disappeared.

qa.Q:
你在日出酒館用餐。法蘭奇的態度又比昨天更差了。你走到櫃檯，法蘭奇說出了讓你理智斷線的金額。
You're dining in Sunrise. Frankie's attitude is even worse than yesterday. You walk towards the counter, and Frankie speaks of a price that just snaps you.
qa.C1:
你只付了你覺得合理的價錢，大約是今天金額的一半。
You only pay for what you think is reasonable, which is about half the price.
qa.C2:
你朝著法蘭奇重重揮了一拳，打在他的鼻樑上。
You swing right into Frankie's nose, hard and precise.
qa.R1:
法蘭奇對你嗆聲，要你不准再踏入日出酒館。
Frankie talks back to you, forbidding you from coming back to Sunrise.
qa.R2:
法蘭奇重重摔到地上，失去了意識。
Frankie falls to the ground, losing conscious.

name: Franz法朗茲
descZh:
荒野旋律在柏納斯家晚宴認識的吟遊詩人，年輕人類男性。
他表示自己也曾和冒險者們到處遊歷，搜集了不少故事，對於《沃瓦倫之歌》有著很濃厚的興趣，邀請荒野旋律和他談談這首歌的故事。
在麥克嵩期間，居住於布蘭登的角落。
過去的冒險團為追影者，因成員之一正義的涅巴倫被暗影之父殺死而解散。除了法朗茲之外的團員都決定引退。法朗茲因此投身於研究暗影之父，而來到麥克嵩。對於拉索斯教也有一定程度的認識，而且懂拉索斯語。
在比武大會遭暗影之父襲擊後，似乎受到了刺激，創作了相關的樂曲，並加入台北市議員，追查暗影之父與拉索斯教的線索。
在從妖精荒野回來後，因為發現自己和台北市議員的方向不同，而決定自行離開了。
descEn:
A young bard that the Rhythm of the Wild got to know at the Berners Family banquet.
He told the party that he once was an adventurer, collected quite a lot of stories, and was very interested in “the Song of Vowalon", inviting the adventurers to tell him about the story behind it.
Lived in Brandon’s Corner while he was in Macksohn.
His past party was named Shadow Trackers, and the party broke up after one of the member, Nebalon the Justice, was killed by the Father of Shadows. Everyone but Franz chose to retire, while Franz came to Macksohn to study on the Father of Shadows. He knew quite a lot about Laxthos and can speak Laxthosian.
After being attacked by the Father of Shadows at the Macksohn Tournament, Franz was somewhat inspired and chose to travel with the Councilor of Taipei to gather more information about the Father of Shadows and Laxthos.
After coming back from the Feywild, Franz realized that his goal is different from the party, so he the party left quietly.

qa.Q:
「讓我加入團隊吧。」法朗茲提議。「我對拉索斯教有一些認識，可以幫助你們。」
"Let me join your group." Franz proposes. "I know things about Laxthos. I can help you."
qa.C1:
接受法朗茲的提議，讓他加入隊伍。
Accept Franz's proposal, letting him join the team.
qa.C2:
拒絕法朗茲的提議，不讓他加入隊伍。
Decline Franz's proposal, letting him out of the team.
qa.R1:
在法朗茲的教導下，半年後，你能用拉索斯語做簡單的對話了。
Under Franz's tutelage, you can speak simple Laxthosian in half a year.
qa.R2:
法朗茲露出陰沉的表情。「你們會後悔的。」
Franz makes a gloomy expression. "You'll regret."

name: Frederick Norman弗雷德里克・諾曼
descZh:
T.I.D.E.S.組織的現任領導者。
在《古斯塔夫諾曼的神秘失蹤》中，出錢聘請冒險者們尋找其失蹤兒子古斯塔夫的貴族。
人稱諾曼爵士。
雖然愛護他的兒子古斯塔夫，但不想太過介入其生活。
有非常多眼線，以及不小的影響力。
在冒險者們逃離艾爾諾後，讓他們在諾曼宅邸待了好一段日子。
descEn:
The current leader of T.I.D.E.S.
The nobleman who paid the adventurers to find his lost son in “The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman".
He was often called Syr Norman.
Although he loved hos son Gustavo, he tried hard not to intervene Gustavo’s life.
Frederick had many informant working under him, and also he was quite powerful in the Kingdom, even in the Empire.
After the adventurers escaped El'Nore, he let them lived in the Norman mansion for quite a while.

qa.Q:
「你不該出現在這。」諾曼爵士的聲音從你身後傳出。
"You shouldn't be here." Syr Norman's voice emerge from your back.
qa.C1:
拿起武器，準備好戰鬥。
Take out your weapons, and prepare to fight.
qa.C2:
和諾曼爵士道歉，詢問離開這裡的方法。
Apologize to Syr Norman, and ask the way out of here.
qa.R1:
你感到昏沈，失去了意識。
You feel dizzy, and lost conscious.
qa.R2:
諾曼爵士微笑，帶你走回了一樓。
Syr Norman smiles, leads you back to the first floor.

name: Gary蓋瑞
descZh:
拉黎爾的狼夥伴，有比一般狼較高的智慧與力量。
異色瞳，左眼藍色，右眼橘色。
與拉黎爾形影不離，甚至願意為了保護拉黎爾而死。
descEn:
The companion of Ra’Leer, also a wolf with higher intelligence and stronger than most wolves.
Had heterochromatic pupils, with its left pupil blue and right orange.
Gary is always with Ra’Leer, and would even die protecting her.

qa.Q:
你看見蓋瑞身體狀況不太好，但你們在趕路，時間緊迫。
You see Gary's not looking well, but you're pressed for time on the way.
qa.C1:
你停了下來，給拉黎爾和蓋瑞一些時間好好休息。
You stop and make time for Ra'Leer and Gary to take a good rest.
qa.C2:
你讓拉黎爾和蓋瑞休息，自己和其他人則先繼續前進。
You let Ra'Leer and Gary rest, and continue on the road with the party.
qa.R1:
蓋瑞的狀況一時半刻好不了。最終，你們還是出發，但你為蓋瑞感到擔心。
Gary's condition is not gonna get better in a short time. Finally, you continue your journey, but you're worried about Gary.
qa.R2:
在悲劇發生的前一刻，你內心暗自慶幸蓋瑞和拉黎爾不在現場。他們值得活下去。
Before the tragedy, you're glad that Gary and Ra'Leer are not here. They deserve to live.

name: Gareth Berners葛瑞斯・柏納斯
descZh:
麥克嵩當地貴族柏納斯的成員之一。傑弗瑞的兒子，瑟琳的丈夫，蘭斯的父親。
現任麥丁頓王國禁衛軍的將軍，也是弗列里爵士的繼位者。
在柏納斯家晚宴時隨時護衛著紫羅蘭。
對於蛋糕類的甜點似乎有著難以抗拒的心理。
descEn:
A family member of the Macksohn noble house, the Berners Family. The son of Jeffery, husband to Selene, and father of Lance.
Gareth is currently the king’s guard of the Mattington Kingdom, and also the successor of Syr Flaerry.
Took care of Xandria, the Violet of Macksohn pretty closely at the Berners banquet.
Seems to be irresistible to sweets like cakes.

qa.Q:
宴會上，你看見身穿盔甲，威風凜凜的葛瑞斯聳立著，但他的眼神一直偷偷飄向旁邊的蛋糕。
During the banquet, you see the majestic, armor-wearing Gareth, standing, but his eyes keep drifting towards the cake.
qa.C1:
切下一片蛋糕，恭敬的遞給蓋瑞斯。
Cut a slice of cake, and hand it to Gareth politely.
qa.C2:
等待蓋瑞斯休息時，再將蛋糕遞給他。
Give Gareth the cake when he rest.
qa.R1:
蓋瑞斯向你拒絕，但你知道他真的很想吃蛋糕。
Gareth declines, but you know he wants the cake badly.
qa.R2:
蓋瑞斯接下你的蛋糕，狼吞虎嚥。
Gareth takes your cake, and devours it.

name: General Maliya Kaeyal瑪萊雅・凱耀將軍
descZh:
萊斯諾的將軍，中年紅龍人女性。
個性強硬且難以溝通，連市長與大臣都對他敬畏三分。
強烈主張要「收復」對面的蜥蜴人城鎮克萊芬。
descEn:
The general in Leisnor, a mid-aged red dragonborn female.
Maliya is very fierce, even the mayor and the minister are afraid of her.
She has a very strong opinion on 'recovering' the lizardfolk town Clyphen.

qa.Q:
你看見瑪萊雅・凱耀將軍正在用鞭子揮打他的部下，沒有人敢吭聲。
You see General Maliya Kaeyal whipping her subordinates. No one is brave enough to make a sound.
qa.C1:
你出聲制止。在你心中，沒有人該如此被對待。
You make a sound to stop it. In your mind, no one should be treated like this.
qa.C2:
你裝作沒看見。你知道挑戰他不會有好下場。
You act like you don't see it. You know challenging her is not gonna end well.
qa.R1:
你看見將軍的部下低聲說著謝謝，但將軍朝著你兇狠地走來。
You see the subordinates thanking you quietly, but the General walks to you fiercely.
qa.R2:
你聽見鞭子持續抽打，但沒有任何哀嚎聲。
You hear the whipping sound continues, but no wailing.

name: Glen葛蘭
descZh:
麥克嵩衛兵，據說是紅髮有雀斑的年輕人類男子。
刀疤臉承諾Ron將派遣葛蘭至日出酒館配合調查喬納森失蹤的事件。
descEn:
A young guard in Macksohn, seems like he was red-headed and had freckles.
Scar-Face committed to Ron the he would send Glen to help him investigate in the missing incident of Jonathan.

qa.Q:
你看見葛蘭對你使了個眼色，但沒有說話。
You see Glen winks at you, but he doesn't talk.
qa.C1:
你走向了他的桌子。
You walk towards his table.
qa.C2:
你走向了酒館外，繞到旁邊的巷子。
You walk out the tavern, into the alley next to it.
qa.R1:
「不要在店內讓他知道我們認識！」葛蘭小聲但急切地說道。
"Don't let him know we know each other in the tavern!" Glen whispers urgently.
qa.R2:
「你在幹什麼？不准給我偷懶！」你聽見法蘭奇的吼叫。
"What are you doing? Don't you dare slack off!" You hear Frankie shouting.

name: Grenland Folsen葛蘭倫・佛森
descZh:
隱居於魏斯科鎮的大法師。
寂靜神拉索斯的追隨者。
在台北市議員們的陪同下，穿越嚎叫森林，前往沃瓦倫鎮。
協助寇頓神父主持解除詛咒的祈禱儀式，卻也造成了沃瓦倫滅鎮事件，而後被台北市議員殺死。
descEn:
An archmage living in Wescoe.
A follower of Laxthos.
Traveled through the Howling Forest and arrived at Vowalon with the accompany of the Councilor of Taipei.
Helped Father Kaulton for the ritual to remove the curse, but ended up leading the town to be destroyed, but was killed by the Councilor of Taipei at the end.

qa.Q:
當你看見葛蘭倫大法師時，你才知道他是一名魔人。你的夥伴對此似乎有些意見。
You don't know Grenland the Archmage is a tiefling until you see him in person. Your companion seems to have some issue with it.
qa.C1:
告訴你的夥伴，不能因為他是什麼種族就產生刻板印象。
Tell your companion that they should not have stereotype to him due to his species.
qa.C2:
雖然不說，但你對葛蘭倫大法師保持著警戒之心。
Although you don't say it out load, you stay wary of Grenland the Archmage.
qa.R1:
幾天後當悲劇發生時，你感到惋惜。但你知道這是葛蘭倫大法師的問題，與他的種族無關。
When the tragedy happens days after, you feel sorry, but you not it's not his species that matter. Grenland the Archmage himself is the problem.
qa.R2:
幾天後當悲劇發生時，你感到後悔。你早該相信你夥伴的直覺的。
When the tragedy happens days after, you regret. You should've trust your companion's instinct.

name: Gustavo Norman古斯塔夫・諾曼
descZh:
在《古斯塔夫諾曼失蹤事件》中失蹤的年輕男子，是貴族諾曼爵士的兒子。
經冒險者調查後，發現他在妖精部落艾爾諾中意外殺死當地長老，被當地居民打死。
descEn:
The missing young man from “The Disappearance of Gustavo Norman", who is the son of Syr Norman.
After the investigation by the adventurers, Gustavo was found killed in the elvish tribe El'Nore by the locals.

qa.Q:
你沒有見過古斯塔夫。你對他的認知都是從別人口中聽來的。
You've never seen Gustavo. All you know of him was from other people's words.
qa.C1:
你相信艾爾諾妖精們的說法。古斯塔夫是個衝動的人，也因此違背了艾爾諾的各種規矩。
You believe in the elves in El'Nore. Gustavo is an impulsive man, breaking tons of rules in El'Nore.
qa.C2:
你相信諾曼爵士的說法。古斯塔夫是個熱情的探險者，知識淵博且好奇。
You believe in Syr Norman. Gustavo is a passionate explorer, intellect and curious.
qa.R1:
在艾爾諾的調查結束後，你和艾爾諾的妖精們共享佳餚，但你也注意到有些人對你的表情不太友善。
After the investigation in El'Nore, you have delicious food with the elves. But you also notice that there are unfriendly gazes towards you.
qa.R2:
你帶著事實的真相回到諾曼宅邸。諾曼爵士雖然很傷心，但他也依約給了你豐厚的酬勞。
You bring the truth back to the Norman Estate. Although Syr Norman is devastated, he pays you with the generous compensation.

name: Guu-Guu古古
descZh:
駐守於地下城一處入口的巨大食人魔，戴著一個黑色的面具，手持一根巨大棍棒。似乎看不見。
喜歡用疊字說話，最愛的東西是糖糖。
心理單純，像個孩子一樣。
descEn:
A huge orc who guarded the entrance of a dungeon with a black mask on his face and holding a giant stick in his hand. He seemed to be blind.
Guu-Guu loves baby talking, and candies are his favorite.
Guu-Guu had a pure heart like a child.

qa.Q:
你看見古古，擋在地下城的入口。他的背影對著你。
You see Guu-Guu standing at the entrance of the dungeon.
qa.C1:
你拿起武器，準備迎接戰鬥。
You prepare your weapons for a potential fight.
qa.C2:
你輕鬆繞到古古面前，嘗試和他溝通。
You casually walk in front of Guu-Guu, trying to communicate with him.
qa.R1:
古古沒有注意到你，是個偷襲的好機會。
Guu-Guu doesn't notice you, you have a good chance to sneak attack.
qa.R2:
古古看著你，口中呢喃著「糖糖......」。
Guu-Guu stares at you, "Candies......" He murmurs.

name: Harrel Mizel哈洛・米佐
descZh:
拉撒拿魔法商店的老闆，眼神看起來十分有智慧。
老尼克索的好友與酒友。
與艾瑞利斯家的奈梨紗似乎有不錯的交情。
後來哈洛現身為銀龍米札瑞爾，而且是阿龍父母之死的背後真兇。
在冒險者離開土城前，告訴了雷亞他家鄉的事。
descEn:
The owner of a magic item shop in Rathanad, who looks wise in his eyes.
A good friend and drinking buddy of Old Nixul.
Seems to be quite good with Nylessa Arylith.
Later, Harrel showed himself as the silver dragon Myz'haril, also the real culprit behind the death of Al'lon's parents.
Before the adventurers leave Mudtown, he told Leah about her hometown.

qa.Q:
你看見哈洛從龍人的型態，化身為銀龍。他的陰影籠罩著你。
You see Harrel transforms from his tiefling form, into a silver dragon. His shadow looms over you.
qa.C1:
你嚇地退後。你知道你是不可能和龍作對，然後活下來的。
You back off in terror. You know there is no chance fighting against a dragon and survive.
qa.C2:
你拿起武器，準備應戰。你不打算你的旅程就在這裡結束。
You take your weapon, preparing to fight. You don't plan to end your journey here.
qa.R1:
「哎呀，你不錯，還有點自知之明。」米札瑞爾對你吹了一口氣。
"Huh, you're alright. You do have self-awareness." Myz'haril breathes to you.
qa.R2:
「愚蠢的人類。」米札瑞爾冷笑道。「不過放心，把你殺掉對你沒有好處。」
"What a fool." Myz'haril smirks. "But don't worry, there's no benefit killing you."

name: Hobb霍布
descZh:
瑟巴諾當地的黑幫老大之一，身材十分壯碩，但是手下似乎都不太擅長打架。
鎮上的一間酒館「霍布的派對屋」似乎是他的黑幫的集散地。
似乎是拉索斯教的信奉者，手下的身上有刺拉索斯語的祝禱文。
與Drayer似乎過去就認識了。
和冒險者們談了交易，只要他們將鎮長家的魔法盒交給他，就能贖回被他綁走的喬納森。
真身是來自深淵的一頭綁匪怪蛙，其手下為魚人，與拉索斯教簽訂了契約。
計劃在瑟巴諾蓋一個建設，卻被冒險者們打斷了計劃，也殺光了他的手下。
在從冒險者們手上搶走魔法盒子之後就消失了，也連帶將幾名冒險者們溶成了泥。
descEn:
The leader of a local gangster in Sebano who had a very strong-build body.
His henchmen were not good fighters.
A local “tavern" was pretty much like the base of his gang.
Hobb seemed to be a believer of Laxthos, with his arms tattooed with Laxthos prayers.
It seemed like he and Drayer had known each other for some time.
Hobb negotiated a deal with the adventurers, with them handing him the magic box from Mayor Thorne’s house to release Jonathan, who was kidnapped by him.
The real identity of Hobb is a Banderhobb from the Deep, with merfolks has his henchmen, and he signed a contract with the Laxthos.
Hobb planned to build a construct in Sebano, but was interrupted by the adventurers and all his henchmen was killed.
After taking the magic box from the adventurers, Hobb disappeared after melting several adventurers into mud.

qa.Q:
「所以，你要接受我的提議嗎？」霍布看著你。
"So, do you accept my offer?" Hobb looks at you.
qa.C1:
你點點頭，你不覺得霍布的提議有任何疑慮。
You nod. You don't think there's anything to consider in Hobb's offer.
qa.C2:
你請霍布再給你一些時間考慮，你不想做太倉促的決定。
You ask Hobb to give you some extra time. You don't want to make a decision so hastily.
qa.R1:
「非常好。」霍布微笑。「我喜歡你這樣的客戶。」
"Very well," Hobb smiles. "I enjoy customers like you."
qa.R2:
「如果你不想要，我大有其他有興趣的客戶。」霍布的背後出現了一片人影。
"If you don't want it, I have other customers that will be interested." A number of people appears behind Hobb.

name: The Hooded Figure斗篷人
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮出現的神秘存在。
只有在深夜時，會披著黑色斗篷，出現在鎮上的街道上，露出他橘紅色閃閃發光的雙眼，有人還曾聽過他發出惡魔般的狂笑聲。
他的身份至今無人知曉。
在沃瓦倫滅鎮事件後，被冒險者目擊逃入寂靜殿內，疑似躲進了神父辦公室後掩藏通往地下的密室。
在麥克嵩曾被Paladin和Samael分別目擊到。
依照法朗茲的說明，他是拉索斯教的傳訊者，會出現在不同的城市。
descEn:
A mysterious figure seen in Vowalon.
Only at midnight, this hooded figure would be seen on the streets, with its orange eyes glowing. Some even claimed that they heard it laughed manically.
Its identity had not been revealed until now.
After the incident in Vowalon, it was seen sneaking into the Temple of Silencio, suspected to delve into the dungeon from the Father’s office.
He was seen by both Paladin and Samael at Mackoshn.
As Franz’s investigation implied, it is a courier of Laxthos, appearing in different cities.

qa.Q:
你獨自一人在街角看見疑似斗篷人的身影。你要怎麼做？
You see the sight that looks like the hooded figure by yourself alone. What do you do?
qa.C1:
你趕緊回到酒館，把消息告訴同伴們。
You rush back to the tavern, telling your companions.
qa.C2:
你趕緊追上，這種機會錯過就很難再遇到了。
You follow immediately. This is a chance that you wouldn't want to miss.
qa.R1:
當你們再次回到附近，你們找不到他的身影。
You can't find him after you come back.
qa.R2:
當你繞過轉角，你被絆了一跤。你醒來時，已經沒有看到斗篷人的身影了。
You run pass the corner, and tripped. When you wake up, you don't see the hooded figure anymore.

name: Indigo英荻格
descZh:
Samael的阿嬤。
原本以為在十多年前已經病死，卻離奇地出現在妖精荒野。
懂一般語、妖精語，以及仙靈語，而且有穿越一般世界與妖精荒野的能力。
在妖精荒野作為冒險者們的嚮導之一。
喜歡挖苦Samael，但其實對Samael也很照顧與看好。
身邊時常跟著不同的男伴。
descEn:
The grandmother of Samael.
She was considered dead from illness more than 10 years ago, but appeared in the Feywild instead.
Knowing common, Elvish, and Fey, Indigo also had the ability to travel between the material world and Feywild.
Act as a guide to the adventurers in the Feywild.
Liked to talk to Samael sarcastically, but actually looked after Samael and had high expectation to Samael.
Indigo often had different male partners along her side.

qa.Q:
你看見英荻格突然現身在你面前，頑皮的對你眨了一眼。
You see Indigo appears in front of you in a sudden, winks at you playfully.
qa.C1:
詢問英荻格剛剛是怎麼做到的？
Ask Indigo how she did that?
qa.C2:
在英荻格面前施展個小法術。
Cast a cantrip in front of Indigo.
qa.R1:
「有些魔法不是你想學就能學會的。」英荻格憐憫的看著你。
"Not all magic are learnable." Indigo looks at you in pity.
qa.R2:
「這不是什麼太厲害的把戲，但你這傢伙挺有趣的。」英荻格打量著你。
"This is not some hard trick, but you, are quite interesting." Indigo looks you up.

name: Iochi Mari伊洛・瑪莉
descZh:
一名有著銀白毛色的狐狸人修女，目前在方努爾市的聖津菈大教堂服務。
小時候和Midori、小雪一起在尼姆孤兒院長大。
descEn:
A fox-folk nun with silver-white fur, currently serving at St. Keinra Cathedral in Fanaur City.
She grew up in the Nimu Orphanage together with Midori and Yuki.

qa.Q:
「歡迎來到聖津菈大教堂，我是瑪莉，有什麼是我能幫忙的嗎？」
"Welcome to the St. Keinra Cathedral. I'm Mari. Is there anything I can help you with?"
qa.C1:
請瑪莉修女為你介紹津菈教。
Ask Sister Mari to introduce Keinra to you.
qa.C2:
「方努爾市竟然有狐狸人？」你很訝異他的種族。
"There's a foxfolk in Fanaur?" You're surprised by her species.
qa.R1:
瑪莉修女熟練地為你介紹了津菈教的教義。
Sister Mari introduce you to the principles of Keinra proficiently.
qa.R2:
「我......我也不清楚。」瑪莉低著頭。「我是個孤兒，從我有記憶以來我就在方努爾市了。」
"I'm...... I'm not sure." Mari looks down. "I was an orphan, and I've been in Fanaur since I know the world."

name: Jacob雅各
descZh:
在《鬧鬼荒野的偽多頭龍》中鬧鬼荒野當地寧靜酒館的店小二。
然而在冒險者隔天起床後，卻成了寧靜酒館的老闆。
15051年時，與伊娃結婚。
descEn:
The waiter working in the local tavern Silence in Moorland Haunt in “the False Hydra of Moorland Haunt".
As the adventurer woke up the next morning, he was turned into the owner of Silence.
Jacob married Eva in 15051D.E.

qa.Q:
你看見昨日在店中作為店小二的雅各，以老闆自居。這令你感到疑惑。
You see Jacob, who was a waitor in the tavern yesterday, now acts as the owner. This makes you confused.
qa.C1:
向雅各詢問關於昨日老闆的事。
Ask Jacob about the owner you see yesterday.
qa.C2:
裝作沒事，離開寧靜酒館後再去好好調查。
Act like nothing's wrong, and plan to investigate after leaving Silence.
qa.R1:
「誰？」雅各一臉困惑。「我已經開這家店好多年了，我一直都是老闆。」
"Who?" Jacob looks confused. "I've had this tavern for years, and I've always been the owner."
qa.R2:
鬧鬼荒野各處的跡象，都明確的告訴你，這座城鎮有說不出的怪異感。
All signs in Moorland Haunt tells you clearly, that there is some unspeakable weirdness in this town.。

name: Jasmine Warren潔絲敏・沃倫
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮長戴洛的妻子。
聘請冒險者至魏斯科帶回葛蘭倫大法師，以進行儀式來解除沃瓦倫的詛咒，卻在冒險者們回到沃瓦倫前失蹤了。
冒險者們在地下城發現潔絲敏被獻祭的屍體，冰冷而毫無血色，胸口插的匕首上面寫著拉索斯語的「犧牲」與「血脈」。而他的全名也被昭告為潔絲敏・卓尼森・沃倫。
descEn:
Wife of Daryl, the mayor of Vowalon.
Hired the adventurers to bring the archmage Grenland Folsen from Wescoe back to Vowalon to remove the curse of Vowalon, but gone missing before the adventurers returned.
The adventurers found Jasmine’s body sacrificed on an altar to a ritual, cold and bloodless, with a dagger stabbed into her chest with Laxthosian writings of sacrifice and bloodline. Her full name, Jasmine Dranison Warren was written on the altar.

qa.Q:
當你咬下潔斯敏送給你們的三明治，你感到一陣噁心。
When you take a bite on the sandwich Jasmine gave you, you feel nauseous.
qa.C1:
你懷疑潔絲敏的廚藝可能不太好，但心裡還是對他感激。
You suspect that Jasmine is not good at cooking, but you still feel grateful to her.
qa.C2:
你對於潔絲敏可能對你們下毒這件事，感到恐懼。
You're afraid of the fact that Jasmine might have poisoned you.
qa.R1:
你看了看夥伴的臉色。以你的經驗，這不是廚藝不好這麼簡單的事。
You see your companion's face. In your experience, this is more than bad cooking.
qa.R2:
你趕緊在山丘上尋找你所知可能可以作為解毒劑的植物。
You immediately start looking for plants that you know that can be made as antidote.

name: Jefferey Berners傑弗瑞・柏納斯
descZh:
麥克嵩貴族柏納斯家現任的代表人。
老婆為歐娜，孫子為蘭斯。
descEn:
The current face of the Macksohn noble family, the Berners Family.
His wife is Ona, and his grandson is Lance.

qa.Q:
你初次來到柏納斯宅邸。現任家族代表傑弗瑞邀請你們進入。
You arrive the House of Berners for the first time. The face of the family, Jefferey, welcomes you.
qa.C1:
富麗堂皇的裝潢，讓你覺得心曠神怡。麥克嵩的貴族家就是不一樣。
The opulent decor is a feast for the eyes and a delight to the soul. The noblehouses in Macksohn is truly exceptional.
qa.C2:
你的直覺告訴你，傑弗瑞・柏納斯是個需要注意的人。在你來之前就有人警告過你了。
Your instinct tells you to be aware of Jefferey Berners. Someone also told you this before you come here.
qa.R1:
晚宴過程中沒有發生任何奇特之事，你非常享受。
Nothing weird happened during the feast, and you enjoy it very much.
qa.R2:
晚宴過程中沒有發生任何奇特之事，但你始終覺得不安感揮之不去。
Nothing weird happened during the feast, but the feelng of insecure never left you.

name: Jonathan喬納森
descZh:
麥克嵩日出酒館的老闆與主廚。
因為小時候曾被龍人欺凌，而在酒館鬥毆事件中對Ron出手。鬥毆後為表歉意，聘用Ron在日出酒館作為廚師，並讓Ron住在日出酒館後台的員工休息室。
然而因Ron住宿的第一晚就遇到Lemmy造成的突發事件，讓喬納森決定出錢給Ron在外面找地方住。
隔天喬納森卻失蹤了。
隨著法蘭奇給予的線索，Paladin與他的新夥伴們在瑟巴諾發現了化名為喬納斯的喬納森，但他似乎被捲入了什麼事件，被霍布五花大綁。
最後，在Paladin面前被安娜殺死。
descEn:
The owner and chef of Sunrise, a local tavern in Macksohn.
Jonathan was bullied by dragonborns when he was a kid, so he attacked Ron in the tavern fight. To apologize, he hired Ron as the chef in Sunrise, and permit him to live in the employee’s room.
However, the first night Ron lived in Sunrise, there were incident caused by Lemmy, which led to Jonathan changed his mind and instead gave money for Ron to find somewhere else to live outside the tavern.
The next day, Jonathan was nowhere to be found.
Following Frankie’s lead, Paladin and his new group of adventurers found Jonathan at Sebano, with the alias Jonas. But he was in the midst of some trouble, as he got tied up by Hobb.
In the end, Jonathan was brutally murdered by Anna in front of Paladin.

qa.Q:
「我叫......喬納斯。」你覺得這個瑟巴諾的服務生看起來很眼熟。
"My name is...... Jonas." You think this waiter in Sebano looks oddly familiar.
qa.C1:
相信他。也許他只是個你看過的人的雙胞胎罷了。
Believe in him. Maybe he's just a twin of someone you've seen.
qa.C2:
翻找一下送上的餐點是否留有什麼線索。
Look for any clue from the food that he sent.
qa.R1:
在裡離開瑟巴諾前，你還是沒有找到失蹤的日出酒館老闆喬納森。你總覺得好像錯過了什麼。
Before you leave Sebano, you find no clue about the missing owner of Sunrise, Jonathan. You feel like you've missed something.
qa.R2:
你從盤子底下找到一張紙，是化名為喬納斯的喬納森留下的求救訊息。
You find a piece of paper under the plate. It's an SOS message left by Jonathan, who made an alias as Jonas.

name: Father Kaulton寇頓神父
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮的神父，負責管理寂靜殿，並帶領鎮上民眾禱告。
於一年前來到沃瓦倫鎮擔任神父。
主持解除詛咒的祈禱儀式，卻也造成了沃瓦倫滅鎮事件，而後被台北市議員殺死。
descEn:
The Father in Vowalon, in charge of the Temple of Silencio, and leading the prayers for the town folks.
Came to Vowalon a year ago.
Hosted the ritual to remove the cursed, but was also responsible for the slaughter of Vowalon, and later killed by the Councilor of Taipei.

qa.Q:
在寇頓神父的辦公室內，有一個可疑的櫃子。他的書桌擺放的位置，這個櫃子似乎打不開。
In Father Kaulton's office, there's a suspicious cabinet. As the position where his desk is placed, this cabinet seems to be unable to be opened.
qa.C1:
你向寇頓神父詢問這個櫃子。
You ask Father Kaulton about this cabinet.
qa.C2:
你計劃趁夜深人靜時，偷偷潛進來調查看看。
You plan to sneak in for investigation in the middle of the night.
qa.R1:
「這個櫃子在我來沃瓦倫之前就是這樣了。」寇頓神父說道。
"This cabinet has already been placed like this when I first came to Vowalon." Said Father Kaulton.
qa.R2:
當你從辦公室門口偷看，你看見寇頓神父搬走書桌，打開櫃子，走了進去。
When you look into the office from the door, you see Father Kaulton move away the table, open the cabinet, and walk in it.

name: Kahn坎
descZh:
麥克嵩的衛兵。
奉命在小木屋內看守Paladin，卻被Paladin的馬伕希納襲擊而被反綁在椅子上並換成馬伕裝。
被Midori和YHWH拯救，卻在帶兩人到日出酒館後被Lemmy劃破喉嚨而死。
手上刺有十道光芒的太陽。
descEn:
A guard in Macksohn.
Ordered to watch for Paladin in the cabin, but attacked by Cena and was disguised as Cena, tied on a chair.
Rescued by Midori and YHWH, but was cut by the throat by Lemmy after he brought the two to Sunrise.
He has a tattoo of a sun with ten rays on his arm.

qa.Q:
你看見坎帶著兩名戴著面具人，朝著市區內走去。
You see Kahn leading two people with masks, walking into the city.
qa.C1:
這是衛兵的是，你沒有多加干預。
This is guards' business. You shouldn't intervene.
qa.C2:
默默跟在他們身後，看看會發生什麼事。
Follow them quietly, wanting to know what happens next.
qa.R1:
一段時間後，你聽見日出酒館傳來打鬥聲。
After a while, you hear sounds of fighting in Sunrise.
qa.R2:
你看見坎一走進日出酒館，就被襲擊倒地。
You see Kahn ambushed and uncnscious right after he entered Sunrise.

name: Kevin Bolden凱文・波頓
descZh:
麥克嵩城門旅店的老闆。是貴族家庭的後代，但為了證明自己可以自力更生，開了城門旅店。
個性十分單純，容易相信人。
對Midori有所迷戀。為了向Midori賠罪，送了他一條家中的珍珠項鍊。
descEn:
The owner of the Gates Inn, a local tavern in Macksohn. Kevin was from a noble family, but to prove his ability to be self-reliance, he opened the Gates Inn.
Kevin was a naive man who believed in others easily.
He had a crush on Midori. To apologize to her, Kevin gave her a pearl necklace from his family.

qa.Q:
你來到城門旅店，看見凱文正朝著樓上看著。
You arrive at the Gates Inn, seeing Kevin staring upstairs.
qa.C1:
和凱文打了聲招呼。
Say hi to Kevin.
qa.C2:
默默等待，看會發生什麼事情。
Wait patiently to see what comes next.
qa.R1:
「啊，抱歉。請問你要入住嗎？」凱文趕緊回神。
"Ah, sorry. Do you want to check in?" Kevin quickly snaps out of it.
qa.R2:
不久後，你看見一位穿著重甲的年輕女士走了下來，凱文結結巴巴地對他說話。
Not after long, you see a lady in heavy armor walking down the stairs. Kevin starts talking to her, stuttering.

name: King Knicol神王尼可
descZh:
地底王尼可大人。
冒險者於地下城與哥布林激戰後俘虜的一隻哥布林。在哥布林王戰死後，被冒險者加冕為地底王，並賜名尼可。
被Usioni五花大綁，大多數時間掛在他的背後，作為防身的工具。
本名呱啦。
descEn:
Lord Knicol, King of the Underground, aka King Kincol.
The goblin that the adventurers captured after the fight in the dungeon. After the Goblin King was dead, he was crown the King of the Underground and Knicol was given as his name by the adventurers.
King Knicol was mostly tied behind Usioni and was acted as his shield.
His birth name was Guala.

qa.Q:
酒館內，你看見一隻哥布林被放在桌子上，眼神迷茫渙散。
You see a goblin placed on a table in the tavern, eyes unfocused.
qa.C1:
這想必是傳聞中的「神王尼可」，你趕緊走了過去，向他致意。
This must be the rumored "King Knicol". You quickly walk towards him, salute to him.
qa.C2:
酒館內什麼都有，你看過更怪的事發生。
Weird things happens in the tavern. You've seen even weirder ones.
qa.R1:
「現在你是『王之四騎士』的一員了。」一名牛頭怪從旁邊走了出來，對著你說。
"Now you're part of 'the Four Horseman of the King'." A minotaur walks out, says to you.
qa.R2:
不久後，你看見一名牛頭怪把哥布林綁在背上，從酒館離開了。
Not after long, you see a minotaur ties the goblin on his back, and leaves the tavern.

name: Kojo寇久
descZh:
在《古斯塔夫諾曼失蹤事件》中，住在艾爾諾的中年男性人類。經營著一間小店，裡面有不少材料與雜貨。
向冒險者們揭露艾爾諾當地妖精的陰謀。
在儀式當晚，協助Anedak拯救遭到綁架的其他冒險者們。
似乎有強大的魔法能力。
最後在儀式現場倒地，沒能逃離。
descEn:
A middle aged human who run a small store at El'Nore from “the Disappearance of Gustavo Norman".
Revealed the conspiracy of the elves to the adventurers.
Helped Anedak save the other kidnapped adventurers at the night of the ritual.
Seems to have strong magical power.
Fainted at the ritual at the end, and didn’t survive.

qa.Q:
你看見寇久雙手撐地，直冒冷汗。「你們快逃。」他低聲說著。
You see Kojo with his hands on the ground, sweating. "You guys go." He whispers.
qa.C1:
將寇久背起，帶著他逃離現場。
Carry Kojo on his back, and take him away.
qa.C2:
聽寇久說的，和夥伴們趕緊逃離。
Listen to Kojo, and escape with your companions.
qa.R1:
不久後，寇久從你背上衰落。你檢查一下，他已經沒了氣息。
Not after long, Kojo fall from your back. You check, and he's not breathing anymore.
qa.R2:
你們看見儀式現場被大火包圍。寇久會一直住在你的心中。
You see the ritual engulfed by fire. Kojo will continue to live in your heart.

name: Lance Berners蘭斯・柏納斯
descZh:
麥克嵩當地貴族柏納斯家成員之一，祖父為傑弗瑞，祖母為歐娜，母親為瑟琳，父親為蓋瑞斯。
對於冒險者們與冒險故事十分有興趣。
在Lemmy等人闖入其宅邸後，將Lemmy綁住並拷問他，最後將一枚黑色寶石沒入Lemmy胸前以進行追蹤。
descEn:
A family member of the Macksohn local noble house Berners. Jefferey is his grandfather, Ona his grandmother, Selene and Gareth his parents.
Had high interest in the stories of the adventurers.
After Lemmy and the others intruded the Berners house, he tied up Lemmy and tortured him, and put a black diamond into his chest to track him.

qa.Q:
「告訴我更多關於你們冒險的故事。」蘭斯饒富興致的看著你。
"Tell me more about your adventures." Lance looks at you with interest.
qa.C1:
選擇告訴他你們被冠上屠村惡名的真相。
Choose to tell him the truth behind the story that you were framed as the town slayer.
qa.C2:
選擇告訴他你們靠著組樂團賺金幣的事蹟。
Choose to tell him the story that you earned gold pieces by forming a band.
qa.R1:
你發誓你看見蘭斯的眼中閃了一道光。
You swear you see a glint flashed in Lance's eyes.
qa.R2:
蘭斯感到無趣，很快就離開餐桌了。
Lance feels bored, and leaves the table in a short time.

name: Laura Fishburne蘿拉・費許朋
descZh:
T.I.D.E.S.的成員之一。
藉由挑戰萊里・里奇蒙成功，晉升為方尖碑的一員。
descEn:
A member of the T.I.D.E.S.
After succeeding challenging Riley Richmond, Laura became one of the Obelisk.

qa.Q:
你看見蘿拉一腳將萊里掉在地上的眼球踩爛。
You see Laura steps right on the eyeball plucked out from Riley's eye socket.
qa.C1:
你仔細看萊里的眼神。
You look into the eye of Riley.
qa.C2:
你仔細看蘿拉的眼神。
You look into the eyes of Laura.
qa.R1:
萊里並沒有透露出恐懼或傷心的眼神。
There is no fear or sadness in Riley's eye.
qa.R2:
蘿拉並沒有透露出得意或嘲諷的眼神。
There is no triumphant or mocking in Laura's eye.

name: Leonard “Old Pipe" Riversend「老煙槍」河萊納
descZh:
阿龍的養父。
數年前，阿龍因控制不了情緒，誤傷他的養父，而逃離土城。
阿龍回來後，發現萊納拄著拐杖，卻稱自己是因為爬山受傷才需要拐杖。
descEn:
Al-lon’s foster father.
Years ago, Al-lon accidentally hurt Leonard due to him losing control of himself, and fled Mudtown.
After Al-lon came back to Mudtown, he found Leonard with a crutch, claiming that it was due to his own accident on a trip to the mountains.

qa.Q:
你發現河萊納驕傲地把玩著他的拐杖。
You see Leonard playing with his crutch proudly.
qa.C1:
向他的太太河艾麗詢問這件事。
Ask Elly, his wife, about this.
qa.C2:
向河萊納詢問這件事。
Ask Leonard about this.
qa.R1:
「事情已經過去了。」河艾麗小聲說道。「我們不太提他受傷的事。」
"It's over for some time." Elly speaks in a low voice. "We don't talk about why he got hurt."
qa.R2:
「我前陣子爬山受傷了，所以需要拐杖。」
"I need a crutch since I fell mountain climbing some time ago."

name: Leslie Grunfeld萊斯麗・格倫費爾德
descZh:
索拉的母親，彼特的妻子，婚後雖然冠夫姓為萊斯麗・麥迪遜，主要還是以自己的本名自稱。
父親為匿名之聲的領導人，但他並不相信這個宗教團體。
在索拉死後，召集匿名之聲的群眾，創立了拉索斯教，被尊稱為拉索斯夫人。
descEn:
The mother of Sora and the wife of Pete. Even though changed her last name to Madison after marriage, she mostly used her original family name.
Her father was the leader of Voice of the Anonymous, but she never believed in the religious group.
After the death of Sora, she gathered the members of Voice of the Anonymous and found the religion Laxthos, and was remembered as the Lady of Laxthos.

qa.Q:
有些人說拉索斯之母到現在都還活著，但那是幾千、幾萬年的事了。
Some people say that the Mother of Laxthos is still alive, but that's a story thousands, or even tens of thousands years ago.
qa.C1:
世界上可能有禁忌的魔法，讓人能活這麼久也說不定。
There might be forbidden magic for people to live this long.
qa.C2:
神話、傳說都是杜撰的，這是為了拉索斯教而傳出的吧。
Myths and legends are all made up. This must be told for Laxthos.
qa.R1:
多年後，你習得了這個魔法。代價很大，但是，值得。
Years later, you learn this magic. The price was grand, but, it's worth it.
qa.R2:
不久後你就忘記這件事了。
You forget about this story some time later.

name: Lewis路易斯
descZh:
艾德蒙餐酒館的店長。
與大衛醫師熟識，考慮聘用Ron為廚師。
descEn:
The manager of Edmond’s Diner.
Familiar with Dr. David.
Considered hiring Ron as a chef.

qa.Q:
你來到艾德蒙餐酒館用餐。店長路易斯來到你的餐桌，恭喜你成為本年度來店第1000組客人。
You come to Edmond's Diner for dinner. Lewis the manager come to your table, congratulating you to be the 1000th customer this year.
qa.C1:
接受邀請，來到廚房觀賞廚師們的烹飪現場。
Accept the invitation to see the chefs cook in the kitchen.
qa.C2:
接受提議，享用特別為你製作的特餐。
Accept the offer to enjoy a special dish specially for you.
qa.R1:
你看見廚師們熟練地把所有食材烹調成美味又漂亮的佳餚，就像魔法一樣。
You see the chefs skillfully turns the food into delicious dishes, just like magic.
qa.R2:
色彩繽紛、香氣撲鼻的餐點送到你的餐桌上，這是貴賓等級的待遇。
Colorful, enticing dishes are served at your table. This is a VIP experience.

name: Lil’Lily小莉莉
descZh:
本名莉莉絲，是歐德里克聘來當地城的嚮導。
雖然工作時臉色不好看，但還是十分盡責，備受歐德里克信任。
descEn:
Her real name is Lilith, and she was hired by Odrick to serve as a guide in the dungeon.
Although she often looks displeased while working, she is very dedicated and greatly trusted by Odrick.

qa.Q:
「各位還有什麼問題嗎？」小莉莉有氣無力地問道。
"Any more questions?" Lil'Lily asks wearily.
qa.C1:
快速舉起你的手。
Raise your hand in just a second.
qa.C2:
體諒小莉莉，不問任何問題。
Be considerate of Lil'Lily, and ask no question at all.
qa.R1:
「唉，好的。」小莉莉嘆氣。「請問有什麼問題？」
"Okay......" Lil'Lily sighs. "What is your question?"
qa.R2:
「好。那我們繼續往前走。」小莉莉說到。
"Alright. Let's continue moving." Lil'Lily says.

name: Liliana莉蓮娜
descZh:
有著一頭銀白色短髮的津菈教聖騎士，和半妖精拉芙是冒險夥伴。
兩人受瑪琳船長之邀來到聖拉雅米島協助調查島上的失蹤以及中毒事件。
descEn:
A Paladin of Keinra with short silver-white hair, and the adventuring partner of the half-elf Ralf.
The two were invited by Captain Marin to come to St. Rayami Island to help investigate the disappearances and poisoning incidents occurring there.

qa.Q:
「不好了！」你看件莉蓮娜跑了過來。「拉芙被困在礦坑了！」
"Oh no!" You see Liliana runs towards you. "Ralf is trapped in the mine!"
qa.C1:
通知衛兵，請他們整隊帶人搶救。
Notify the guards, tell them to bring people to help.
qa.C2:
和冒險團隊一起出發，前往礦坑。
Start moving towards the mine with the adventuring group.
qa.R1:
當衛兵們抵達礦坑時，拉芙的身影已經消失了。
When the guards arrive, Ralf is nowhere to be found.
qa.R2:
經過激烈的戰鬥，你們終於把拉芙救了出來。
After a intense combat, you finally save Ralf out from the mine.

name: Lumio魯米歐
descZh:
斐納札的機器人衛兵，十分有群眾魅力。
與Ubbo一同爭取心空席的席次，並順利晉級到決選。
在決賽中對Ubbo造成極大量的傷害，但最後在其他冒險夥伴的聯手下被擊敗，於空中化為火球，在地面炸開。
descEn:
A charismatic warforged guard in Fenadra.
Lumio ran for the vacancy of the Seat of Heartless against Ubbo, and entered the finals.
In the final contest, Lumio dealt tons of damage to Ubbo, but was defeated by the other adventurers. He turned into a huge fireball and exloded on the ground.

qa.Q:
你看見魯米歐從支持者中走了出來，禮貌地和你握個手。
You see Lumio walking out from his supporters, shaking your hand politely.
qa.C1:
和魯米歐說了幾句話，期待兩人接下來的競爭。
Talk to Lumio, excited about the coming competition.
qa.C2:
趁魯米歐不注意，對他襲擊。
Sneakily attack Lumio out of his surprise.
qa.R1:
「不論誰輸誰贏，我們都是優秀的人才！」魯米歐高昂的說道。
"No matter who wins it all, we're all excellent." Says Lumio in high spirits.
qa.R2:
魯米歐反擊，你沒想到會這麼痛。
You don't expect it to hurt this much when Lumio fights back.

name: Luny魯尼
descZh:
在《古斯塔夫諾曼失蹤事件》中艾爾諾當地宗教，月之神信仰支派的宗教領袖，被當地居民敬稱為教主大人。
邀請冒險者們參加當地的宗教儀式。
descEn:
The religious leader of Phyneal in El'Nore, from “the Disappearance of Gustavo Norman". He was called the Lord Bishop by the locals.
Luny invited the adventurers to the local ritual.

qa.Q:
隨著儀式進行，你覺得有點怪怪的。
As the ritual goes on, you feel something weird.
qa.C1:
你大聲打斷儀式。
You stop the ritual in a loud voice.
qa.C2:
你繼續觀察，先不打斷儀式。
You continue observing, not stopping the ritual, as for now.
qa.R1:
魯尼走向你，你感到一股強烈的壓迫感。
Luny walks to you. You feel an intense sense of pressure.
qa.R2:
當你意識再次清晰，你的身邊已經倒了一片人。
When your consciousness becomes clear again, people are lying on the ground around you.

name: Lysien Amoret利希恩・阿莫雷
descZh:
長期資助Lott與其冒險夥伴的匿名神秘貴族。
在一次給Lott等人的信中，邀請他們至他的「覆羽莊園」，並署名為「羽王」。
在晚宴中，提及自己曾被月神芬尼爾賜予愛人，卻也被芬尼爾將其奪走，因此再也不信仰芬尼爾。另外，從他的話語中，可得知他已經生存了數百年。
利希恩的莊園內似乎有不明的力量。
descEn:
The anonymous patron who had supported Lott and his adventuring group for a long time.
In a letter to Lott and his adventuring group, Lysien invited them to his “Feathered Estate", with “the Lord of Feathers" as his signature.
In the feast, Lysien mentioned that he was gifted a love by Phyneal, the God of Luna, but taken away later, thus he never believed in Phyneal again. Also, from his words, it seemed that he had already live for hundreds of years.
There seemed to be some mysterious power working in Lysien’s estate.

qa.Q:
你看見利希恩站在房間的另一側。你有很多問題想詢問他。
You see Lysien standing on the other side of the room. You have a lot of question you want to ask.
qa.C1:
你大聲呼喚利希恩。
You shout to Lysien loudly.
qa.C2:
你朝著利希恩走去。
You walk towards Lysien.
qa.R1:
利希恩沒有抬頭，像是沒聽見一樣。
Lysien doesn't raise his head, like he doesn't hear you.
qa.R2:
當你終於穿過人群走到另一側時，利希恩的身影卻消失了。
When you finally walk past the people to the other side, Lysien is nowhere to be seen.

name: Mafa馬法
descZh:
在《古斯塔夫諾曼失蹤事件》中艾爾諾當地的營帳主人。
對冒險者十分友善，提供不少關於古斯塔夫失蹤的資訊。帶領冒險者們前往祭拜古斯塔夫與前任村長的墳墓，也帶冒險者們前往案發的儀式現場。
租給冒險者們一座營帳供他們休息。
descEn:
A tent owner in El'Nore from “the Disappearance of Gustavo Norman".
Mafa was friendly to the adventurers, providing some information about the disappearance of Gustavo. He also took the adventurers to pay respect to Gustavo and the ex leader of El'Nore, and even took them to the place where the ritual happened.
Mafa rented a tent to the adventurers.

qa.Q:
馬法正在推薦你不同款式的營帳，讓你選擇。
Mafa is recommending you different types of tents for you to choose from.
qa.C1:
挑選比較小的營帳。
Choose the smaller tent.
qa.C2:
挑選比較大的營帳。
Choose the bigger tent.
qa.R1:
馬法請了孩子來幫你提行李，帶你入住。
Mafa asks the kids to help take your luggages, helping you check in.
qa.R2:
馬法承諾等入住後帶你逛逛艾爾諾。
Mafa promise to tour you around El'Nore after checking in.

name: Syr Magnus馬格努斯爵士
descZh:
Paladin的父親。
麥丁頓王國騎士團的副團長，因在王都麥克嵩遭到匪徒攻擊，未及時治療傷勢，導致傷口感染，被迫退休，回到寇林菲爾德養傷，卻因重傷，很有可能喪命。
在Paladin犧牲了自己的左耳，透過神秘的月神教儀式後，產出了一罐粉紅色的液體。馬格努斯爵士喝下後，竟然神奇的完全康復了。
向Paladin透露他的生母並不是他長期以來稱為母親的那位女人，而是他在麥克嵩遇見的另一個女子，珊吉雅，又被稱為麥克嵩的紫羅蘭。
descEn:
The father of Paladin.
The former vice-leader of the kings guard of Mattington. Syr Magnus was attacked by bandits in Macksohn, but wasn’t cured right after that, which led to his wound infected and forced to retire to rest back in Korringfield. However, the injury was too severe that it might cost him his life.
After Paladin sacrificed his left ear, with the help of the mysterious ritual of Phyneal, a pink potion was made for Syr Magnus to drink, which got him healed magically.
He revealed to Paladin that his mother was actually a woman called Xandria, aka the Violet of Macksohn, whom he met at Macksohn.

qa.Q:
馬格努斯爵士詢問你接下來要去哪裡？他可以提供你馬匹。
Syr Magnus asks where you plan to go to next. He can provide you horses.
qa.C1:
前往王國首都麥克嵩，尋找麥克嵩的紫羅蘭，珊吉雅。
To Macksohn, the capital of the Kingdom, to find the Violet of Macksohn, Xandria.
qa.C2:
前往洛森王國去見妖精。
To the Lothum Kingdom, to visit the elves.
qa.R1:
馬格努斯爵士告訴你，到麥克嵩可以報上他的名號，會順利一點。
Syr Magnus tells you that using his name can make it easier to survive in Macksohn.
qa.R2:
馬格努斯爵士提點你以他的經驗，對付妖精的訣竅。
Syr Magnus tells you from his experience the trick to deal with elves.

name: Syr Galaestrel Freyeman格雷斯卓・費雷曼大人
descZh:
萊斯諾的大臣，中年藍龍人男性。
個性溫和且堅定，但在將軍面前毫無插嘴的餘地。
認為萊斯諾與克萊芬兩地應該分治，而非強硬地靠武力收復。
descEn:
The minister in Leisnor, a mid-aged blue dragonborn male.
Galaestrel is calm but firm, but there is no room for him to interrupt the general during conversation.
He believes that Leisnor and Clyphen should be ruled seperatedly, not with martial force.

qa.Q:
「我相信萊斯諾和克萊芬之間可以有和平化解危機的方法，你說對吧？」格雷斯卓・費雷曼大人詢問你。
"I believe there is a way to resolve the crisis between Leisnor and Clyphen. You believe in that, too, right?"Lord Galaestrel Freyeman asks.
qa.C1:
「是的，」你回應。「我相信克萊芬的人民們也願意好好談的。」
"Yes." You say. "I believe the people in Clyphen would like to talk about it.
qa.C2:
「不，」你搖搖頭。「兩邊的人想法差太多了，我不覺得有談話的機會。」
"No." You shake your head. "People on the two sides have very different opinions, I don't think there's any chance to communicate.
qa.R1:
「但我們萊斯諾必須要先達成共識。」格雷斯卓大人嘆氣。
"But we still need to have an agreement in Leisnor." Lord Galaestrel sighs.
qa.R2:
「該不會馬萊雅將軍的做法才是最好的......」格雷斯卓大人露出無奈的表情。
"What if General Maliya's way is the best......" Lord Galaestrel shows a helpless expression.

name: Mango芒果
descZh:
由妖精王國的能量產出的蛋，孵出的魔法生物。
其外型由照養他的Lott的意識所塑型。
擁有超出想象的知識，但有時候會突然說出讓人恐懼又無法理解的話語。
與Lott一起在母親大人的屠殺中生存。
與Lott一起來到斐納札後消失了一段時間，最終在Ubbo成為心空席後，以巨蛇的型態現身，且有著痛苦人臉的花紋與殘肢長在身上。
芒果將Psyber咬傷，將他拖入傳送門消失了。
descEn:
A magical creature hatched from an egg made by the energy in Lothum Kingdom.
Its appearance is decided by Lott, its caretaker.
Mango has crazy amount of knowledge, but sometimes says things that creeps out people.
Survived with Lott after the Mother’s Massacre.
After arriving Fendra with Lott, Mango disappeared for a while. It showed up after Ubbo ascended into the Seats of Eclipsed as a huge snake with tormented faces as its pattern, and appendages on its body.
Mango bit Psyber, and dragged him into a portal hole.

qa.Q:
你覺得芒果的眼神怪怪的。
You think Mango looks weird in his eyes.
qa.C1:
他只是隻小動物，沒什麼大不了。
He's just a small creature, there's nothing to worry.
qa.C2:
嘗試對他使用「偵測思想」魔法。
Use the magic "detect thought" on it.
qa.R1:
你始終甩不掉那種持續被監視的感覺。
You just can't get rid of the feeling of under surveillance.
qa.R2:
你發現的的魔法對他無效。芒果用奇怪的表情盯著你看。
You find your magic useless against it. Mango looks at you in a weird facial expression.

name: Marco馬可
descZh:
在《鬧鬼荒野的偽多頭龍》中鬧鬼荒野當地醫生烏鴉醫師養的狗。
帶領冒險者們尋找腐臭味發出的源頭。
descEn:
The dog that Dr. Crow owned in Moorland Haunt from “the False Hydra of Moorland Haunt".
Guided the adventurers to find the source of the rotten smell.

qa.Q:
你看見馬可對著一個角落瘋狂吠叫。
You see Marco barking at a corner like he's mad.
qa.C1:
狗狗有時候就是會做些看不懂的事，大概沒什麼大不了的。
Dogs sometimes do weird things, it's probably nothing.
qa.C2:
嘗試用武器戳戳看角落。
Try to poke the corner with a weapon.
qa.R1:
你離開後，馬可還在對那個角落吠叫。
Maro keeps on barking at the corner even after you leave.
qa.R2:
你戳到一個有彈性的東西，但你沒有看見他的實體。
You poke something elastic, but you can't see it.

name: Marcus Jens馬可斯・詹斯
descZh:
麥克嵩的貴族，家族從事情報搜集。
雇用了一名叫伊的貧民窟少年（伊稱呼他為M伯爵），似乎在調查和蜘蛛神教相關的事。
有一名叫瑪莉安的妹妹被關在王宮監獄內，冒險者受他委託，將瑪莉安從監獄救出來。
多年前曾購買了大量的魔法球，魔法球的功能似乎非常多元，而且不是只有他自己能使用。
馬可斯是月神教的信徒。
在麥克嵩的擁王派失利後，與冒險者們一同逃往洛森王國，前往尋找母親大人的旅途。然而，在一次與月光狩獵會的戰鬥中，被敵人的詛咒殺死。冒險者將他安葬，並立了一個木製的墓碑。
descEn:
A noble from Macksohn whose family did intelligence gathering.
He hired a young man from the ghetto named Yi to do some investigation about the Spider God religion.
