He had a sister named Marianne who was locked up in the Macksohn Palace Jail. The adventurers was paid by him to get her out of the jail.
Marcus bought a lot of magical orbs years ago, which seemed to have multiple functions, and could even be used by people other than him.
Marcus is a believer of Phyneal.
After the royalist faction failed in Macksohn, Marcus traveled with the party to Lothum, on a trip to find the Mother. However, he was cursed to death in a battle against the Moonlight Predators. The party buried him, erected a wooden tombstone for him, and paid their respect.

qa.Q:
馬可斯掏出一顆有彈性的球，交給你，讓你玩玩看。
Marus takes out an elastic ball, give it to you to play with it.
qa.C1:
你將球用力揉捏。
You knead the ball vigorously.
qa.C2:
你將球朝著地上丟。
You throw the ball to the ground.
qa.R1:
球變成像泥漿一般柔軟可塑。
The ball turns flexible, like mud.
qa.R2:
球彈到地上時，發出一道小閃光。
The ball emits a tiny flash when it hits the ground.

name: Lady Marian瑪莉恩夫人
descZh:
麥丁頓現任國王艾略特四世的母親，在前國王時期似乎沒有人知道他的存在。
被智者奧利佛暗示不是人類。
似乎有一定程度的魔法能力，能主動進行心靈溝通。
根據瑪莉安的說法，本名為瑪麗蓮，過去是他蜘蛛神教的夥伴，但後來信奉了拉索斯教，改名為瑪莉恩，並揭發他臥底的身份，使他被關入地牢，因此瑪莉安對他恨之入骨。
descEn:
The mother of the current King of Mattington, Elliot IV. She was not known when the former king reigned.
She was hinted not a human by Oliver the Wise.
Seemed to have some kind of magical powers, and could do active telepathy.
As Marianne said, Marian’s name was originally Marilyn, and was her companion of followers of the Spider God, but turned to believe in Laxthos and changed her name to Marian, also turning her in. Marianne was then locked up in jail, thus she hated Marianne deeply.

qa.Q:
你在刺客留下的毒匕首上看見刻著瑪莉恩夫人的名字。
You see Lady Marian's name carved on the poisoned dagger from the assassin.
qa.C1:
認定瑪莉恩夫人是背後的真兇。
Believe that Lady Marian is the cuprit behind this.
qa.C2:
認為有人要誣陷瑪莉恩夫人。
Belive that someone is trying to frame Lady Marian.
qa.R1:
你展開逃離麥克嵩的計劃，逃得越遠越好。
You start a plan the escape from Macksohn, the farther the better.
qa.R2:
你回到宮廷，將匕首遞給瑪莉恩夫人。
You return to the palace, giving Lady Marian the dagger.

name: Marianne Jens瑪莉安・詹斯
descZh:
麥克嵩貴族馬可斯・詹斯的妹妹。
年輕時曾經離家出走過一段時間。
被關在麥克嵩王宮監獄，是蜘蛛神教在麥克嵩的間諜。
過去曾和當時名為瑪麗蓮的瑪莉恩為同夥，但因為被背判而被送入地牢。
安娜過去是他的下屬。
descEn:
The sister of the Macksohn noble Marcus Jens.
She ran out of home was she was young for some time.
She was locked in the Macksohn Palace Jail for some time, as she was the spy of the Spider God.
She was a companion of Marilyn, but was send to jail by Marilyn betraying her.
Anna was her subordinate.

qa.Q:
你背著虛弱的瑪莉安。他正呢喃著什麼。
You carry the exhausted Marianne on your back. You hear her mumbling.
qa.C1:
你詢問瑪莉安怎麼了？
You ask Marianne what's wrong.
qa.C2:
你不多問，現在重要的是讓他回到家。
You don't ask. The most important thing now is to bring her home.
qa.R1:
「馬可斯。」瑪莉安小聲說道。「我有點不知道等等怎麼面對他。」
"Marcus." Marianne whispers. "I'm not quite sure how I should face him later."
qa.R2:
你回到詹斯家門口。一敲門，馬可斯就將門打開了。
You arrive at the Jens. As soon as you knock the door, Marcus opens it.

name: Maribel Muddlewick瑪莉貝爾・莫德維克
descZh:
本年度競爭土城「春天精靈」的女孩之一，但輸給了佩妮・蘋果木。他原本想透過擔任春天精靈，來和「聽說存在」的山賊進行談判，為土城謀取較為公平的利益。
父母外出旅行兩年以上都還沒回到土城來。
在與瑪莉貝爾相處後，冒險者們發現他廚藝精湛、飽讀詩書，且有足夠的獨立生活能力，力邀他加入冒險團隊，但瑪莉貝爾暫時沒有想離開土城的心，只想好好把書看完。
descEn:
A girl running for “the Spirit of Spring" in Mudtown this year, but lost to Penny Applewood. She wanted to become the Spirit of Spring to negotiate with the “bandits" for benefits for Mudtown.
Her parents have been traveling for over two years, and haven’t returned to Mudtown.
After spending some time with Maribel, the adventurers found her to be quite proficient with cooking, well-read, and also has the ability to live independently. They tried to convince her into joining the adventuring group, but Maribel still wants to finish her books before leaving the town.

qa.Q:
夜裡，你看見平常安靜的瑪莉貝爾在窗邊低聲啜泣。
In the night, you see Maribel, who's been quiet all the time, sobbing next to the window.
qa.C1:
移動到他旁邊，安慰他。
Move near her, trying to comfort her.
qa.C2:
移動到他旁邊，問他怎麼了？
Move near her, asking her what's wrong.
qa.R1:
瑪莉貝爾用力抱住你，什麼也沒說。
Maribel hugs you tightly, not saying a word.
qa.R2:
「沒事，快去睡吧。」瑪莉貝爾說完，也鑽回被窩裡。
"Nothing, go to bed." Maribel goes back to bed after saying.

name: Captain Marin瑪琳船長
descZh:
方努爾市的一名船長。
受羅賓遜主教委託，載冒險者們到南方的荒島，尋找雪の化身の目覚め的下落。
多年後，聖拉雅米島成為他的封地。他也帶了新的冒險者來到島上調查中毒事件。
descEn:
A captain from Fonaur.
Comissioned by Bishop Robinson to bring the adventurers to the Southern island to find the book “雪の化身の目覚め".
Years later, St. Rayami Island became her fiefdom. She also brings new adventurers to the island to investigate the poisoning incident.

qa.Q:
你登上瑪琳船長的船，這艘船看起來有些年紀了，但依然穩固。
You board Captain Marin's ship. This ship looks a bit old, but still stable.
qa.C1:
你向瑪琳船長詢問他過去冒險的經歷。
You ask Captain Marin about her past adventures.
qa.C2:
你向瑪琳船長詢問這次任務的細節。
You ask Captain Marin about the details of the current mission.
qa.R1:
瑪琳船長像你說起多年前在聖拉雅米島上發生的傳奇。
Captain Marin tells you about the legends that happened on St. Rayami Island years ago.
qa.R2:
瑪琳船長和你說明聖拉雅米島上現在對中毒事件調查的進度。
Captain Marin tells you the current progress of the investigation on the poisonous incident on St. Rayami Island.

name: Matilda瑪蒂達
descZh:
魏斯科的一名女子。
話不多，但與他的夥伴梅莉之間似乎頗有默契。
descEn:
A woman from Wescoe.
Didn’t talk much, but seemed to have a good understanding with her companion Maylee.

qa.Q:
你看見瑪蒂達在教堂前鬼鬼祟祟，東張西望。
You see Matilda acting suspicious in front of the church.
qa.C1:
上前和瑪蒂達搭話。
Walk towards Matilda, talk to her.
qa.C2:
跟蹤他，小心不被他發現。
Follow her, try not to be spotted by her.
qa.R1:
瑪蒂達裝作沒事，隨興回覆你。
Matilda acts like nothing happened, responds to you casually.
qa.R2:
你看見教堂門被打開，神父讓瑪蒂達溜了進去。
You see the door to the church opened, the Father let Matilda sneaks in it.

name: Maylee梅莉
descZh:
魏斯科的一名女子，年輕且十分漂亮。
在酒食樂酒館與瑪蒂達和Brown說明了關於拉索斯教的事，並請Brown喝了一杯似乎被下了藥的啤酒。
descEn:
A woman from Wescoe, young and pretty.
Told Brown about Laxthos with Matilda at Beer, Food, Fun, and treated Brown a beer that was suspiciously poisoned.

qa.Q:
你在酒館看見坐在隔壁桌的梅莉對你眨了眼。
You see Maylee, who sits in the table next to you in the tavern, winks at you.
qa.C1:
移動到那桌去，和梅莉說話。
Move to the table, and talks to Maylee.
qa.C2:
繼續待在你的桌子。
Stay at your table.
qa.R1:
梅莉詢問你是不是外地人，沒在這裡見過你。
Maylee asks if you're not from here, she hasn't seen you here before.
qa.R2:
梅莉自己移動到你的餐桌，和你攀談。
Maylee moves to your table and starts talking to you.

name: Melvin麥爾文
descZh:
大學城歷史區區長安德烈亞・戴依的助理。
自稱沒有什麼學術能力，只能幫安德烈亞打雜。似乎對安德烈亞十分懼怕。
最終在安德烈亞示範給冒險者們看的月神教靈魂轉移儀式中，因為是無辜的靈魂，而被犧牲。
descEn:
The assistant of Andrea Day, the leader of the History District at the Great Citadel.
Claimed that he had not much academic abilities, and could only help Andrea with chores. Seemed to be afraid of Andrea.
At the end, he was sacrificed by Andra as the innocent soul for the soul-transport ritual of Phyneal to the adventurers.

qa.Q:
你看到麥爾文站在門外看著安德烈亞的表情，充滿恐懼。
You see Melvin's face looking at Andrea from outside the door, full of fear.
qa.C1:
你喊了一聲「戴伊先生」。
You shout "Mr. Day."
qa.C2:
你自己走進辦公室，不把麥爾文牽連進去。
You walk into the office on your own, not dragging Melvin in.
qa.R1:
「麥爾文！」安德烈亞喊道。「怎麼沒有好好招呼客人？」
"Melvin!" Shouted Andrea. "Why didn't you take care of the guest?"
qa.R2:
你看見麥爾文鬆了一口氣，默默溜走。
You see Melvin sighs with relief, sneaks away.

name: Mikkel Drogskol米可・卓茲克
descZh: 卓茲克家族的最後一名成員，年約二十多。在睡夢中被殺死，如今成為幽魂，徘徊在卓茲克別莊，有時會與來訪的客人攀談，但對方不一定聽得到他的聲音。
descEn: The last member of the Drogskol family, at the age of 20ish. Mikkel was killed in his bed, and became a spirit, lingering in the Drogskol Manor. He sometimes talk to visitors, but they were not guaranteed to hear his voice.

qa.Q:
你聽見腦中傳來一個聲音，自稱是米可・卓茲克。但你的夥伴們都沒有聽見他。
Your hear a voice in your head, saying that he is Mikkel Drogskol. But none of your companions hear that.
qa.C1:
嘗試與聲音對話。
Try to communicate with the voice.
qa.C2:
假裝聲音不存在。
Act like the voice doesn't exist.
qa.R1:
米可告訴你，在莊園底下有一座巨大的地洞。
Mikkel tells you that there is a huge cave under the manor.
qa.R2:
米可時不時嘲諷你和夥伴的行為，試圖引起你的回覆。
Mikkel mocks you and your group's actions, trying to make you respond.

name: Moore摩爾
descZh:
卡什拉的書店店員。
店內的書似乎都是出現在卡什拉的人的人生記錄。
descEn:
A bookstore clerk at Kashla.
The books in the store seemed to all be life records of people appearing in Kashla.

qa.Q:
摩爾向你介紹書店裡的書，都是有出現在卡什拉的人的人生紀錄。
Moore introduce to you the books in the bookstore. They're all life records of people who have set foot in Kashla.
qa.C1:
你嘗試尋找你的名字，想知道裡面的內容。
You try to look for your name, wanting to know what's inside.
qa.C2:
你嘗試尋找你認識的人的名字，想知道裡面的內容。
You try to look for names of people you know, wanting to know what's inside.
qa.R1:
你的紀錄中寫了你的未來。你很後悔打開這本書。
You read your future in your book. You regret reading it.
qa.R2:
你看見了你認識的人的各種秘密，讓你難以相信。
You read secrets of people you know. They're hard to believe.

name: The Mother母親大人
descZh:
麥克嵩舊城區蜘蛛神教的宗教領袖。
據說是舊城區出生，因為不知名原因頓悟，而對蜘蛛神教有所領悟的人。
出現在舊城區的一座隱密神殿（被稱為母親大人的寺廟）內，接見來訪者時，會從牆壁內的洞穴出現，現身於床上。
冒險者們也發現在貴族伯納德・諾姆家的三樓，有個房間，和寺廟格局相似，母親大人也會在這裡出現。
有一張佈滿皺紋的臉，表情難以解讀。會發出各種奇異的聲響來進行溝通，也會以普通語說話。
實際上，早在阿爾芬諾誕生前就已存在於妖精王國境內，但其起源未知。
被安娜奪舍後，鑽入Paladin的體內逃走。
之後在洛森王國的一座洞穴內，異變的母親大人殺死了Lott以外的冒險者們。
descEn:
The religious leader of the Spider God religion in old town Macksohn.
She was said to be born in the old town, but had an epiphany for some unknown reason, thus understood the religion.
She appeared in a cryptic temple, being known as Mother’s Temple. When she greeted visitors, she would appear from the hole on the wall, moving to the large ancient bed.
The adventurers also found a room similar to the temple at the third floor of the noble Bernard Norm’s house, where the Mother also appeared.
The Mother had a wrinkled face, and her facial expression was hard to interpret. She made different kinds of sounds to communicate, as she also used Common.
In fact, the Mother was born in the Elvish Kingdom even before Alfenor, but her origin was not known.
After being replaced by Anna, the Mother escaped into Paladin's body.
Later, in a cave in Lothum, the mutated Mother killed the group of adventurers except Lott.

qa.Q:
你看見母親大人原始的臉，巨大而駭人。
You see the primal face of the Mother, huge and terrifying.
qa.C1:
你雙腳顫抖，跪了下來。
Your legs tremble as you kneel down.
qa.C2:
你睜大雙眼看著母親大人。
You stare at the Mother with your eyes wide open.
qa.R1:
你感受到母親大人的觸肢在你頭上游移。
You feel the appendages of the Mother wandering around your head.
qa.R2:
母親大人張大他的嘴，發出了吼聲。
The Mother opens her mouth, roars.

name: Mr. Moon月先生
descZh:
麥克嵩當地的音樂經紀人，有個辦公室名叫「派頓」。
給人一種精明狡黠的感覺。
在崔尼斯劇院挖掘到Samael，邀請Samael與他簽約，並給了Samael一個有🎵符號的名片。
帶冒險者們組成的樂團「荒野旋律」來到柏納斯家的宅邸演奏。
與柏納斯家族似乎有長期穩地的合作。
月之神芬尼爾的信徒。
在麥克嵩似乎有些許影響力，曾告訴Samael與Paladin遇到衛兵找麻煩時，可以報上他的名號。
在（部分）台北市議員離開麥克嵩前，透露自己過去和月神的交易，讓他已與死亡距離不遠。
在冒險者們回到麥克嵩時，月先生已經死去了。
descEn:
A local agent in Macksohn, who owned an office called Patton’s.
He gave people a sense of smart and cunning.
When Mr. Moon found Samael at the Trinix Theatre, he invited Samael to sign with him and gave Samael a name card with the musical note 🎵.
Mr. Moon brought Rhythm of the Wild, the band formed by the adventurers to perform at the mansion of the Berners family.
He seemed to be working with the Berners family long term.
Mr. Moon is a worshiper of Phyneal, the God of Moon.
He had some power in Macksohn, as he once told Samael and Paladin that whenever they had some problem with the guards, they can simply say his name.
As some members of the adventurers left Macksohn, he revealed the deal he had with the God of Moon, that made him close to death.
When the adventurers got back to Macksohn, Mr. Moon was already dead.

qa.Q:
月先生遞給你一張名片，告訴你只要在名片上點兩下，你就會自動被傳送到他面前。
Mr. Moon gives you a name card, telling you that you'll be transported to him right after you click twice on the card.
qa.C1:
把卡片收起來。需要時再拿出來。
Put the card away. You'll take it out when you need it.
qa.C2:
現場在名片上點了兩下。
Click the card twice right away.
qa.R1:
月先生和你鞠躬，表示期待未來再相見。
Mr. Moon bows to you, saying that he expect to see you again in the future.
qa.R2:
你瞬間傳送到月先生的面前，他嘆了一口氣。
You immediately transport to the front of Mr. Moon. He sighs.

name: Mr. Muffins瑪芬先生
descZh:
過去由溫德家飼養的巴哥犬，現在與Brown一起冒險。
似乎有能透過心靈感應的方式與人溝通，甚至可以化成似人的生物。
對溫德大人似乎懷有很深的敵意，但對彼得則是非常保護。
descEn:
The pug that was formerly owned by the Wind family, now traveling with Brown.
Mr. Muffins seemed to have the ability to telepathy, and even morph into humanoid.
He seemed to have great hatred toward Lord Wind, but protective toward Peter.

qa.Q:
你發現瑪芬先生已經好一段時間沒有跟你心靈感應了。
You find Mr. Muffins using his telepathy to you for quite a while.
qa.C1:
他大概是有所顧慮吧。
He might have his own reason.
qa.C2:
你仔細檢查他是否有任何異狀。
You checked thoroughly if there's anything weird on him.
qa.R1:
接下來的一整天時間，瑪芬先生一樣沒有和你心靈感應。
For another day, Mr. Muffins hasn't telepathed to you.
qa.R2:
你懷疑他頭上戴的帽子可能抑制了他的魔法。
You suspect that the hat on his head suppresses his magic.

name: Norvelle諾威爾
descZh:
征服者洛林的左右手。
個性殘暴，死於其他妖精之手。
蜘蛛神教的創立者之一，屍體的粉塵被艾蒙醫生撿走，拿來作為儀式的材料。
descEn:
The right hand of Lorin the conqueror.
Norvelle was cruel, and killed by other elves.
One of the founder of the Spider-God religion. The dust of his body was collected by Dr. Elmond to perform the ritual.

qa.Q:
你看見諾威爾掐著一名妖精的脖子。
You see Norvelle choking an elf.
qa.C1:
上前阻止諾威爾。
Stop Norvelle.
qa.C2:
不要介入好了。你知道你打不贏他。
Maybe don't intervene. You know there is no chance you can fight and win him.
qa.R1:
諾威爾用揍了你一拳。他掐著脖子的手沒有放開。
Norvelle punches you. He doesn't let go of the elf's neck.
qa.R2:
沒多久，那名妖精斷氣了。
Not after long, the elf stops breathing.

name: Nylessa Arylith奈梨紗・艾瑞利斯
descZh:
阿龍的堂妹。
身材嬌小，和顏悅色，熱愛藝術。
與弟弟維瑞克感情很好，並對魔法商店老闆哈洛・米佐有很強烈的愛意。
受到哈洛的煽動，在畫室內殺害其伯伯費洛登與伯母瑟萊拉，並擺放成其在夢中所見的「雙龍登仙」姿勢。
案發前請維瑞克為他竄改記憶，消除他的意圖；案發後請維瑞克為他竄改記憶，消除他行兇的記憶。
在確認其為兇手後，受到新任龍冠阿龍的審判，砍去其手，流放拉撒拿。
descEn:
Al-lon’s cousin.
Has a petite build, and a pleasant face. Love arts.
Nylessa is good with her brother Vaelric, and has a strong romantic intention towards the magic item shop owner Harrel Mizel.
She was incited by Harrel, killed her uncle Vaerodan and aunt Selyra, and posture them as “the Two Dragons Ascension", which she dreamt.
Nylessa asked Vaelric to modify her memory to erase her intention, and to remove her memory of the murder after the event.
After being accused of being the murderer, Nylessa is put into trial by the new Crown, Al-lon, chopping off her hands, and exile out of Rathanad.

qa.Q:
你意識到了奈梨紗和哈洛之間微妙的情愫。
You notice the subtle feelings between Nylessa and Harrel.
qa.C1:
你私下向奈梨紗詢問他對哈洛的感受。
You ask Nylessa her feelings toward Harrel privately.
qa.C2:
你私下向哈洛詢問他對奈梨紗的感受。
You ask Harrel his feelings toward Nylessa privately.
qa.R1:
奈梨紗結巴的說沒什麼，他只是很崇拜哈洛。
Nylessa stutters, sayling she simply worships Harrel.
qa.R2:
「你觀察得挺仔細的。」哈洛對你微笑。
"You do observe carefully." Harrel smiles at you.

name: Lord Octavian von Oderick屋大維・馮・歐德里克大人
descZh:
啤酒商起家的商人，靠著低價且劣質的啤酒賺了很多錢。
近期開始涉足娛樂產業，「隨機地城」試營運中！
歐德里克啤酒，歐歐歐歐歐......五告讚！
本名為馬克・丹尼爾斯。
descEn:
A merchant who began his career in the beer trade, earning a great deal of money by selling cheap, low-quality beer.
Recently, he has begun venturing into the entertainment industry, with the “Random Dungeon” currently in trial operation!
Oderick Beer—O-O-O-O-O… Awesome!
His real name is Marc Daniels.

qa.Q:
你聽見有人喊了一聲「歐德里克啤酒」。
You hear someone yelling "Oderick Beer".
qa.C1:
你嘆了一口氣，不跟著喊。
You sigh, not chanting with them.
qa.C2:
你接著喊「歐歐歐歐歐......五告讚！」 
You follow up with "O-O-O-O-O… Awesome!"
qa.R1:
其他人在你頭上將啤酒打開，冒出的啤酒淋到了你的頭上。
Others open their cans of beers on your head, the beer spilled on your head.
qa.R2:
歐德里克大人出現在大家面前，發給每個人一罐啤酒。
Lord Oderick shows up, giving everyone a can of beer.

name: Ona Berners歐娜・柏納斯
descZh:
麥克嵩貴族柏納斯家的成員之一，老公是傑弗瑞，孫子是蘭斯。
似乎與邁克嵩的紫羅蘭有些交情。
descEn:
A member of the Macksohn noble house Berners. Jefferey’s wife and Lance’s grandmother.
Seemed to have friendship with the Violet of Macksohn.

qa.Q:
你知道歐娜和紫羅蘭有些交情。
You know Ona knows the Violet pretty well.
qa.C1:
你向歐娜詢問關於紫羅蘭的事。
You ask Ona thing about the Violet.
qa.C2:
你向歐娜詢問該如何讓紫羅蘭注意到你。
You ask Ona how to make the Violet notice you.
qa.R1:
歐娜向你透露了一些其他人不知道的關於紫羅蘭的事。
Ona reveals some things about the Violet not known by other people.
qa.R2:
歐娜表示交給他介紹，他可以讓紫羅蘭對你印象深刻。
Ona tells you that she'll introduce you to the Violet. She knows how to impress her.

name: Oswald Creighton奧斯華・克雷頓
descZh:
土城附近海雅特山上的山賊首領。
被佩妮・蘋果木暱稱為「大奧斯」。
為了控制手下的山賊，需每個月利用土城春天精靈身上的翠綠印記執行儀式，卻反而因為長時間相處，而讓佩妮愛上他。
在佩妮的口中「強壯、可靠，且善良」、「人不壞」。
在「斬殺交響樂」襲擊時，為了讓佩妮不受傷害，帶著佩妮私奔。
一段時間後，跑到拉撒拿尋找阿龍，表示佩妮的狀況不太妙。
descEn:
The bandit lord in Mt. Hyatt near Mudtown.
Named Big Os by Penny Applewood.
Oswald needs to use the Mark of Verdant on the Spirit of Spring to perform a ritual in order to control his bandits. However, with tons of time staying together, Penny fell in love with him.
He is, quoted by Penny, “strong, reliable and kind", and also “not a bad person".
To keep Penny from getting hurt, Oswald ran away with Penny when the Slashing Symphany attacks.
After a while, Oswald came to Rathanad to tell Al-lon that things went wrong with Penny.

qa.Q:
你第一次見到山賊首領奧斯華。他和你想的不太一樣，臉上的笑容純真而善良。
You see Oswald, the leader of the bandits the first time. He's different from what you imagined. His smile pure and nice.
qa.C1:
山賊就是山賊，必須剿除。你準備好你的武器。
Bandits are bandits, they should be eradicated. You prepare your weapons.
qa.C2:
也許你對奧斯華太有偏見了。應該好好認識他。
Maybe you're to prejudice against Oswald too much. You should try to know him more.
qa.R1:
「放輕鬆，兄弟。」奧斯華拍拍你的肩膀。
"Relax, bro." Oswald pat your shoulder.
qa.R2:
你花了些時間，發現整個山賊社群不過是個遊牧群體，沒有惡意。
You spend some time, only to find that the whole bandit community being just a nomad group, with no hostility.

name: Pamela Yaso潘蜜拉・雅索
descZh:
麥克嵩的貴族，家裡似乎是經營農作物的，幾個世代前才搬遷到麥克嵩。
與華生和Sugalu在王宮花園相談甚歡，並邀請他們前來家裡作客。
在家中的晚宴，要求貴族們表態是否支持新任國王。
潘蜜拉實際上是反對國王派，也被認為在鬥爭中策劃將支持國王派的人馬幾乎都殺光了，其中包含他的朋友伯納德.
descEn:
A noble in Macksohn, whose family does crop business, and moved to Macksohn a few generations ago.
Had a great talk with Watson and Sugalu at the Palace Garden, and invited them for dinner.
At the banquet at her place, she asked the nobles whether they support the new king or not.
Pamela was actually against the new king, and believed to be the one killing off the nobles who supported the new king, including her old time friend, Bernard.

qa.Q:
在潘蜜拉的晚宴上，他要求大家閉上雙眼，要大家舉手，針對支持和反對國王的態度做出表示。
At Pamela's feast, she asks you all to close your eyes, and raise hands to indicate whether you support or oppose the King.
qa.C1:
你在潘蜜拉喊出「支持國王請舉手」時舉起你的手。
You raise your hand when Pamela says "raise your hand if you support the King."
qa.C2:
你在潘蜜拉喊出「反對國王請舉手」時舉起你的手。
You raise your hand when Pamela says "raise your hand if you oppose the King."
qa.R1:
幾天後，你發現有刺客在暗中追殺你。
You find assassins following you the other day.
qa.R2:
隔天，潘蜜拉私下邀請你到他家談談。
Pamela invites you to her house for a talk the next day.

name: Pattie Sylverome派蒂・希爾維羅姆
descZh:
希爾維羅姆家族被費內羅・懷雅特抄家後唯一倖存的後代。
因家族與深淵的交易，被當作在深淵的俘虜，但也因此習得深淵魔法，且可以穿梭於物質世界和深淵。
將冒險者們復活，希望冒險者們能為他的家族復仇。
descEn:
The only surviving member of the Sylverome family after the massacre by Phanero Wyatt.
Due to the trade between the Sylverome family and the Deep, Pattie served as a hostage, but also learned Deep magic, and can travel between the Deep and the material world.
Pattie revived the adventurers, hoping they can avenge her family.

qa.Q:
你看見派蒂怯生生的看著你，他看起來十分疲憊。
You see Pattie looking at you timidly. She looks exhausted.
qa.C1:
詢問他關於深淵的事。
Ask her about the Deep.
qa.C2:
關心他狀況是否還好。
Ask if she's doing alright.
qa.R1:
派蒂一五一十地告訴你他知道關於深淵的事。
Pattie tells you all that she knows about the Deep.
qa.R2:
「我......我的家人被屠殺了。」派蒂說道。
"I...... My family was wiped out." Says Pattie.

name: Penny Applewood佩妮・蘋果木
descZh:
本名佩妮洛普。
蘋果木家的長女，是土城最漂亮的女孩之一，也是阿龍的初戀。
已蟬聯土城連續三年的「春日精靈」。
愛上山賊首領奧斯華・克雷頓，暱稱他為大奧斯。
在斬殺交響樂襲擊時，與大奧斯私奔，但不久後似乎遇到了危機。
descEn:
Penelope Applewood.
The eldest daughter in the Applewood family. One of the prettiest girl in Mudtown, and alos Al-lon’s first love.
Penny has been the “Spirit of Spring" in Mudtown for three consecutive years.
In love with the bandit lord Oswald Creighton, whom she called as Big Os.
Ran away with Big Os when the Slashing Symphany attacks, but fall into crisis not long after.

qa.Q:
「你......你說你喜歡我，為什麼？」佩妮大大的眼睛看著你。
"You...... you say you like me. Why?" Penny looks at you with her big eyes.
qa.C1:
你吞了一口口水。「我覺得你長得很可愛。」
You swallow a mouthful of saliva. "I think you are cute."
qa.C2:
你深情的看著他。「我從小跟你一起長大，我覺得你很純真善良。」
You look at her deeply. "I grew up with you, and I know you're pure and kind."
qa.R1:
「哈哈哈，原來是這樣子。」佩妮笑道。「但我得告訴你，我有喜歡的人了。」
"Hahaha, so that's why." Penny laughs. "But I have to let you know, I already have someone on my mind."
qa.R2:
「你的個性也很棒！」佩妮微笑。「但我得告訴你，我有喜歡的人了。」
"You also have a good personality!" Penny smiles. "But I have to let you know, I already have someone on my mind."

name: Pete Madison彼特・麥迪遜
descZh:
索拉的父親，萊斯莉的老公。
卡什拉的鎮長，但在索拉死後也抑鬱而死。
descEn:
The father of Sora, and the husband of Leslie.
The mayor of Kashla, but was depressed to death after the dead of Sora.

qa.Q:
你負責雕刻彼特的墓碑，他不確定要和誰確認墓誌銘的文字。
You're in charge of carving Pete's tombstone. You're not sure who should decide the words on his epitaph.
qa.C1:
你選擇詢問他的妻子，萊斯莉。
You choose to ask his wife, Leslie.
qa.C2:
你選擇詢問他的朋友，瓦克松醫師。
You choose to ask his friend, Dr. Vaxon.
qa.R1:
你刻上「彼特・麥迪遜 卡什拉鎮長」。
You carve "Pete Madison Mayor of Kashla".
qa.R2:
你刻上「彼特・麥迪遜 慈愛的父親」。
You carve "Pete Madison A Loving Father".

name: Peter彼得
descZh:
溫德家的公子，年約7歲，個性十分單純。
有隻叫瑪芬先生的巴哥犬。
descEn:
The boy from the Wind family, age seven, and was very naive.
He had a pug named Mr. Muffins.

qa.Q:
「我沒有朋友，除了瑪芬先生。」彼得看著你。「你可以當我朋友嗎？」
"I don't have any friend, except Mr. Muffins." Peter looks at you. "Can you be my friend?"
qa.C1:
點點頭，不多說什麼。
Nod, and not saying anything else.
qa.C2:
「我只是個過客，不會在波馬贊待多久的。」你誠實說道。
"I'm just a visitor, and I'm not gonna stay long at Bomozan."
qa.R1:
「瑪芬先生！我們有新朋友了！」彼得抱起瑪芬先生，開心地說。
"Mr. Muffins! We have a new friend!"Peter hugs Mr. Muffins happily.
qa.R2:
「嗯，沒關係。」彼得點點頭。「瑪芬先生，我們去玩吧！」
"That's okay." Peter nods. "Mr. Muffins, let's play!"

name: Phola佛拉
descZh:
弗萊特境內的嚮導之一，相對年輕而較無經驗，但根據師父的說法「很有潛力」。事後冒險者們發現他是師父的孫子。
嗜酒。
在Tweeter的開導下戒酒，重新找到自己人生的價值。
在冒險者們在母親大人的洞穴內被屠殺時，因為在外面把風而逃過一劫。
descEn:
A young and rather inexperienced guide in Phreit Realm, who “had a lot of potential", said Shifu. The adventurers soon found that Phola was Shifu’s grandson.
Alcoholic.
Quitted drinking with the help ofTweeter, and found his purpose in life again.
He survived due to keeping watch at the door when the adventurers were murdered in the Mother's cave.

qa.Q:
你看見佛拉又在喝酒了。身為你的嚮導，你覺得不太安心。
You see Phola drinking again. As his guide, you feel uneasy.
qa.C1:
你放棄和佛拉溝通。和他說他就會戒酒嗎？
You give up communicating with Phola. Would he quit drinking if you talk to him?
qa.C2:
你利用守夜時和佛拉長談，也許有機會讓他好好思考。
You talk to Phola deeply during your night shift. Maybe he'll think thoroughly.
qa.R1:
隔天他又宿醉了。你的行程又延期了。
He has another hangover the next day. Your schedule is postponed, again.
qa.R2:
你說的話讓佛拉重新思考。雖然他沒有馬上戒酒，但你覺得他看起來變得不一樣了。
Your words makes Phola think again. Although he doesn't stop drinking immediately, you think he looks different.

name: Queenie昆妮
descZh:
在魏斯科服務中心工作的半身人女子。
對顧客非常熱情，講話有點急切。
descEn:
A halfling woman who worked in the Wescoe service center.
She was enthusiastic toward customers, and talks quickly.

qa.Q:
「歡迎來到魏斯科！」你聽見昆妮響亮的聲音。
"Welcome to Wescoe!" Your hear Queenie's loud voice.
qa.C1:
和昆妮買一份地圖。
Buy a map from Queenie.
qa.C2:
請昆妮帶你遊覽魏斯科。
Ask Queenie to tour you in Wescoe.
qa.R1:
昆妮遞給你地圖，同時送給你一張明信片。
Queenie hands you the map, and also gives you a postcard.
qa.R2:
昆妮爽快地帶你從服務中心走出。
Queenie cheerfully leads you out from the service center.

name: Ralf拉芙
descZh:
有著一頭金色長髮的半妖精遊俠，和聖騎士莉蓮娜是旅行的夥伴。
兩人受瑪琳船長之邀前往聖拉雅米島協助調查島上的失蹤以及中毒事件。
拉芙在調查中被綁架到金海岸礦坑內，後被冒險者救出。
descEn:
A half-elf ranger with long golden hair, and the traveling companion of the paladin Liliana.
The two were invited by Captain Marin to travel to St. Rayami Island to help investigate the disappearances and poisoning incidents occurring there.
During the investigation, Ralf was kidnapped and taken into the Gold Coast Mines, where he was later rescued by the adventurers.

qa.Q:
你們終於救出了拉芙，他的意識還清醒，但身體很虛弱。
You finally save Ralf. She is still conscious, but her body is weak.
qa.C1:
詢問他關於被抓走事情的細節。
Ask her about the details of her being captured.
qa.C2:
讓他先好好休息。
Let her rest first.
qa.R1:
拉芙告訴你他在洞穴裡看見了一隻巨大的拉茲特獸，有人在控制他。
Ralf tells you that she saw a huge Laztek. Someone is controlling it.
qa.R2:
拉芙閉上雙眼。你們得趕快把他帶回旅店。
Ralf closes her eyes. You need to bring her back to the tavern immediately.

name: Rashim拉辛
descZh:
住在麥克嵩舊城區（貧民窟）的年輕男子。
雖然自稱不信蜘蛛神教，但是對貧民窟的蜘蛛神教宗教領袖母親大人似乎十分熟悉。
帶領華生前往母親大人的神殿。
descEn:
A young man living in old town Macksohn (ghetto).
He claimed not believing in the Spider God, but was familiar with Mother, the religious leader at the ghetto.
Led Watson to the temple of Mother.

qa.Q:
拉辛帶著你走在舊城區內。
Rashim leads you in the old town.
qa.C1:
詢問拉辛為何不信蜘蛛神教？
Ask Rashim why he doesn't believe in the Spider God.
qa.C2:
和拉辛詢問舊城區的歷史。
Ask Rashim about the history of Rashim.
qa.R1:
拉辛表示要信什麼神是自由的，蜘蛛神也不會因為不信他而對他生氣。
Rashim says it's free to believe in any god. The Spider God wouldn't be mad at him if he doesn't believe in it.
qa.R2:
拉辛表示幾百年前，這裡是麥克嵩最熱鬧的地區。後來發生的事件讓麥克嵩的中心換了地方。
Rashim says that hundreds of years ago, this is the most popular area in Macksohn. Incidents happened, and so the center of Macksohn shifted.

name: Ra'Leer the Herder牧人拉黎爾
descZh:
居住於嚎叫森林內的妖精德魯伊。
有一隻隨行的狼夥伴，蓋瑞。
對嚎叫森林內的野生動物都十分親近且熟悉。
她近期感覺到了森林內的不平靜，覺得事有蹊蹺。
森林之神的忠實信奉者。
descEn:
The elf druid who lived in the howling forest.
She had a wolf companion, Gary.
She was familiar with the wildlife in the howling forest.
She sensed something wrong in the forest recently.
She was loyal believer of Nessis, God of Woods.

qa.Q:
你來到嚎叫森林，看見拉黎爾站在森林入口，惡狠狠的盯著你。
You arrive the Howling Forest. You see Ra'Leer standing in front of the forest, staring at you viciously.
qa.C1:
拿起武器，準備和拉黎爾戰鬥。
Prepare your weapons for a combat against Ra'Leer.
qa.C2:
和拉黎爾點頭，表示自己在森林內會與生命為友。
Nod to Ra'Leer, promising that you'll befriends the creatures in the forest.
qa.R1:
不知道何時，你的身邊竄出一匹狼。蓋瑞咬了你的腿一口。
You don't know when, a wolf comes out next to you. Gary bites you leg.
qa.R2:
拉黎爾答應帶你穿越嚎叫森林，若遇到敵人，他會與你站在同一陣線。
Ra'Leer promise to lead you through the Howling Forest. If there is enemy, she'll be on your side.

name: Reese Tig瑞斯・提格
descZh:
居住在方努爾市的人類冒險家。
協助津菈教調查城市中發生的中毒以及失蹤事件。
在Ron昏迷時將他的巫妖手臂用神秘的鍊子鍊住以抑制巫妖的法術。
後在尼姆孤兒院前方的水井下遭遇敵人，不幸喪生。
descEn:
A human adventurer residing in the city of Fanaur.
He assisted the Church of Keinra in investigating the poisoning and disappearance cases occurring throughout the city.
When Ron fell unconscious, he restrained Ron’s lich arm with a mysterious chain to suppress the lich’s magic.
He later encountered enemies beneath the well in front of the Nimu Orphanage and was unfortunately killed.

qa.Q:
瑞斯將一本厚厚的書遞給你。
Reese hands you a grimoire.
qa.C1:
詢問瑞斯這是什麼？
Ask Reese what this is?
qa.C2:
接下這本書。
Take the book.
qa.R1:
瑞斯表示這是他的研究筆記，希望你能拿來參考。
Reese says it's his study, hoping you can use it as a reference.
qa.R2:
你從書上感受到一股魔法的力量。
You feel magical power from the book.

name: Riley Richmond萊里・里奇蒙
descZh:
里奇蒙家族的當家掌門人，巴托斯的女兒。喬里森的信奉者。
過去為T.I.D.E.S.方尖碑的成員，但被蘿拉・費許朋挑戰成功，失去一隻眼，而被迫帶著冒險者們離開組織。
於土城有屬於自己的研究中心「渡鴉中樞」。
descEn:
The current frontman of the Richmond family, daughter of Bartosz. Believer of Jeorisan.
She was once an Obelisk in T.I.D.E.S., but was challenged by Laura Fishburne succesfully, lost one of her eye, and expelled with the adventurers by the society.
She has her own research center, “the Raven Nexus" in Mudtown.

qa.Q:
萊里委託你幫他尋找一個特定的物品，他會給予你豐厚的獎賞。
Riley asks you to find her a specific object. She'll give you a grand prize for that.
qa.C1:
詢問萊里他要這個物品的目的。
Ask Riley the purpose of getting this object.
qa.C2:
和萊里討價還價。
Bargain with Riley.
qa.R1:
萊里表示，他想製作能讓他重回T.I.D.E.S.的法器，這是材料之一。
Riley says that she wants to build an artifact that can bring her back to T.I.D.E.S., and this is one of the material.
qa.R2:
你發現萊里願意為此付出不少錢。
You find Riley willing to pay a lot for this.

name: Bishop Robinson羅賓遜主教
descZh:
津菈敎的主教。
召集勇者們前往方努爾市南方的荒島，尋找津菈敎的聖典雪の化身の目覚め。
數年後，請冒險者們調查聖拉雅米島的中毒事件，以及前往娜塔莎港尋找逃脫的Mirdori。
descEn:
A bishop of Keinra.
Gathered the adventurers to a island south of Fanaur, the find the holy book of 雪の化身の目覚め.
Years later, Bishop Robinson asked the adventurers to investigate in the poisonous incident on St. Rayami Island, and find the escaped Midori in Natasha Port.

qa.Q:
你看見羅賓遜主教看起來很苦惱。
You see Bishop Robinson looking distressed.
qa.C1:
向羅賓遜主教詢問是否有可以幫忙之處。
Ask Bishop Robinson if there's anything you can help.
qa.C2:
向羅賓遜主教匯報任務的進度。
Report the current progress of the mission to Bishop Robinson.
qa.R1:
羅賓遜主教表示，他只是需要休息一下。
Bishop Robinson says that he only needs some rest.
qa.R2:
羅賓遜主教點頭，表示他很滿意。
Bishop Robinson nod, saying he's very satisfied.

name: Roline Hughes蘿琳・休斯
descZh:
麥克嵩貴族休斯家族的新任掌門人。
從小就展現出極好的社交天賦，因此父親努力培養他作為家族的接班人。
與Midori和Ron在麥克嵩王宮花園初見。
在比武大會事件後對Ron產生了極深的情愫。
在認識Ron前，似乎常常出入貴族的秘密雜交派對，但如今亟欲隱藏這段過去。
在Paladin等人於15048年再次回到麥克嵩時，用心幫助他們，甚至作為掩護讓他們逃出王宮。不久後被安娜冒用身份，襲擊Paladin。後來再次見到Paladin時，協助落魄的他買東西。
在Tweeter打開第三隻眼時，他的靈魂成了與交易之神芬諾爾交易時，被犧牲的祭品，身體化成了陶瓷。
15048年的蘿琳在小黑屋掛著斗篷，作為交易之神的代言人。
15050年在YHWH等人回到麥克嵩時，與YHWH在文創區巧遇，但看起來眼神空洞，似乎還沒有恢復成原本的樣貌。
Ron等人到了大學城，透過歷史區區長安德烈亞・戴依的儀式，成功釋放了蘿琳。
descEn:
The new face of the Macksohn noble house Hughes.
She showed her expert in social contact in her youth, thus her father trained her to be the successor of the family.
Met Midori and Ron at the Macksohn Palace Garden.
Started having a feeling towards Ron after the Macksohn Tournament incident.
She seemed to go to the nobles secret orgies quite often, but she tried hard to reveal it after knowing Ron.
After Paladin and the party returned to Macksohn at 15048 D.E., she helped them and even covered them to escape the palace. Not long after that, her identity was used by Anna to sneak onto Paladin. After seeing Paladin again, she bought him stuffs to help him.
When Tweeter opened his third eye, her souls was used as the sacrifice to fulfill the trade with Phynoir, becoming a pottery doll.
She then acted as the hooded spokesman of Phynoir at the Dark house.
When YHWH and the party returned to Macksohn at 15050 D.E., she met YHWH at the art district, but she looked hollow. It seemed like she hadn’t returned to her true self.
Ron and the party went to the Great Citadel, and with the help of Andrea Day, Roline’s soul was released through a ritual.

qa.Q:
你看見蘿琳正在振筆疾書，非常認真。
You see Roline writing, very concentrating.
qa.C1:
詢問蘿琳在寫什麼？
Ask Roline what she's writing?
qa.C2:
偷偷看蘿琳在寫什麼？
Peak at what Roline is writing.
qa.R1:
羅琳收起紙，說著不是什麼重要的東西。
Roline puts the paper away, says it nothing.
qa.R2:
你看見蘿琳的信中寫著滿滿的愛意。
You see love flowing out of Roline's letter.

name: Ronald the Magician魔術師羅納德
descZh:
被稱為魔術師，看起來會使用魔法。
在嚎叫森林出現，有種植一種藍色的小顆果實。
似乎是個喜歡追求樂趣的人。
descEn:
He was called the Magician, and seemed like he can use magic.
Appeared in the Howling Forest, planting a blue fruit.
Ronald seemed like someone who enjoy fun.

qa.Q:
你看見羅納德手上拿著一顆藍色的果實。
You see Ronald holding a blue fruit in his hand.
qa.C1:
向他詢問這是他種的嗎？
Ask him if he planted it?
qa.C2:
向他請教這是什麼魔法變出來的？
Ask him what magic he used to make it?
qa.R1:
「當然，」羅納德說。「種植物是我的小小興趣。」
"Of course." Ronald says. "Gardening is a hobby of mine."
qa.R2:
「魔術師不是只會用魔法而已。」羅納德說。
"Magic is not the only thing that a magician use." Says Ronald.

name: Ronfello朗費羅
descZh:
聖拉雅米島上一名脾氣古怪的老礦工。
在金海岸礦坑崩塌事件中的唯一倖存者。
從此之後便一個人居住在島上的舊燈塔附近。
descEn:
An eccentric old miner on St. Rayami Island.
He is the sole survivor of the Gold Coast Mines collapse.
Since then, he has lived alone near the old lighthouse on the island.

qa.Q:
你準備去拜訪朗費羅。聽說他喜歡吃海鮮粥。
You're about to visit Ronfello. You heard he likes seafood porridge.
qa.C1:
先到市集買一碗海鮮粥，等等好說話。
Buy a seafood porridge at the market first. It'll help smoothening up the talk.
qa.C2:
海鮮粥蠻貴的，只是說說話而已，不用買吧。
Seafood porridge is quite expensive. It's just a talk, no need for that.
qa.R1:
在朗費羅家門口，他一把拿走你手上的海鮮粥。後來的談話很順利。
At Ronfello's house, he grabs the seafood porridge from you. The talk goes pretty well.
qa.R2:
朗費羅看著你們，不說一語，把門關上。
Ronfello looks at you, says nothing, and slams the door.

name: Rosa Flaerry羅莎・弗列里
descZh:
Paladin的導師，前麥丁頓王國騎士團團長弗列里爵士的夫人。
在冒險者們踏離地下城，來到扣林菲爾德時承諾要保護他們。
麥克嵩比武大會時，在混亂中受傷而下肢殘廢。
descEn:
The wife of Syr Flaerry, Paladin’s mentor and the ex leader of the King’s Guard in Mattington.
As the adventurers left the dungeon, promised to protect them in Korringfield.
Rosa was hurt and became disabled in the incident of the Macksohn Tournament.

qa.Q:
你發現羅莎和弗列里先生很少一起活動。
You find Rosa and Mr. Flaerry rarely do any activities together.
qa.C1:
和羅莎詢問這件事。
Ask Rosa about this.
qa.C2:
不多問，這也沒什麼大不了的。
You don't ask. That's not a big deal.
qa.R1:
「我們已經一起生活幾十年了，不需要永遠黏在一起。」羅莎說。
"We've been together for tens of years. We don't need to be together all the time." Says Rosa.
qa.R2:
你偶爾看見羅莎落寞地看著弗列里先生。
Sometimes, you see Rosa staring at Mr. Flaerry in a lonely way.

name: Sammick Warren山米克・沃倫
descZh:
沃瓦倫鎮長戴洛與傑絲敏之子。
大約半年前，25歲的山米克被發現死於寂靜殿前，沃瓦倫的詛咒因此被鎮民廣為討論。
descEn:
The son of the mayor of Vowalon, Daryl and Jasmine.
About half a year ago, Samick, aged 25, was found dead in front of the Temple of Silenciom and so the Curse of Vowalon was spread and discussed among town folks.

qa.Q:
你聽說山米克死去那天，他的屍體一大清早在寂靜殿前被發現。
You hear that the day Sammick died, his body was found at the entrance of the Temple of Silencio early in the morning.
qa.C1:
向他的父親戴洛詢問。
Ask his father Daryl.
qa.C2:
向寂靜殿的寇頓神父詢問。
Ask Father Kaulton of the Temple of Silencio.
qa.R1:
戴洛說平常山米克那個時間都還沒出門。
Daryl says Sammick doesn't go out that early.
qa.R2:
寇頓神父說他也是被告知才知道這件事。
Father Kaulton says he only learned that after others told him.

name: Scar-Face刀疤臉
descZh:
麥克嵩當地衛兵，因臉上有不少刀疤，而自稱刀疤臉。
在Ron的請求下協助調查日出酒館老闆喬納森的失蹤案件。
對法蘭奇的閃爍說詞也有些起疑。
承認自己是崔尼斯教的信徒，但也向Ron表示不是所有崔尼斯教的人都是有問題的。
在麥克嵩比武大會上為了保護國王巴納沃二世，遭到法蘭奇擊斃。
descEn:
A guard in Macksohn. He called himself “Scar-Face" due to a lot of scars on his face.
Scar-Face helped Ron investigated into the missing incident of Jonathan, the owner of Sunrise.
He had doubts toward Frankie.
Scar-Face admitted to be a believer of Trinix, but also explained to Ron that not all Trinix believers had something wrong with them.
He was killed by Frankie protecting the late King Benevol II.

qa.Q:
你看見刀疤臉朝你走了過來。「有什麼需要幫助的嗎？」
You see Scar-Face walking towards you. "Is there anything I can help you with?"
qa.C1:
和刀疤臉說不用。
Tell Scar-Face there's nothing to help.
qa.C2:
和刀疤臉說剛才有個行跡怪異的衛兵。
Tell Scar-Face there was a weird guard.
qa.R1:
「祝你有個美好的一天，崔尼斯祝福你。」刀疤臉向你行禮。
"Have a nice day, and may Trinix bless you." Scar-Face salutes to you.
qa.R2:
「告訴我他的特徵，我請人去調查。」刀疤臉認真的看著你。
"Tell me their traits. I'll send people to investigate." Scar-Face looks at you seriously.

name: Sean尚
descZh:
Ron在尖頂寺的師兄，武藝十分高強。
來到麥克嵩參加比武大會。
descEn:
A senpai of Ron from the Peak Temple. He was good in martial arts.
Came to Macksohn to participate in the tournament.

qa.Q:
你看見一個手拿長棍的男人走在麥克嵩的街道上。
You see a man with a long stick walking in Macksohn.
qa.C1:
向他詢問他是哪裡來的人？
Ask him where he is from?
qa.C2:
向他詢問他是來賣克嵩做什麼的？
Ask him the purpose of him being in Macksohn.
qa.R1:
尚向你鞠躬，告訴你他來自尖頂寺。
Sean bows to you, telling you that he was from the Peak Temple.
qa.R2:
尚亮出他的長棍，表示他是要來贏下比武大會的。
Sean shows his long stick, saying he's here to win the tournament.

name: Selene Berners瑟琳・柏納斯
descZh:
麥克嵩當地貴族柏納斯家成員之一。
蘭斯的母親，丈夫為蓋瑞斯。
descEn:
A member of the Macksohn noble house, the Berners family.
The mother of Lance, and her husband is Gareth.

qa.Q:
你看見瑟琳在柏納斯家似乎有些格格不入。
You see that Selene seems unfit in the Berners house.
qa.C1:
你向瑟琳詢問這件事。
You ask Selene about this.
qa.C2:
你觀察他和其他家族成員的互動。
You observe her interaction with other family members.
qa.R1:
「沒有這種事。」瑟琳微笑。「能成為柏納斯家的一員，是我的驕傲。」
"There's nothing like that." Selene smiles. "It's my honor to be part of the Berners family."
qa.R2:
你發現瑟琳對所有人表現得都有些不自然。在這個家族，他就像個局外人。
You find Selene acting abnormal towards all people. She's like an outsider in the family.

name: Selyra Arylith瑟萊拉・艾瑞利斯
descZh:
阿龍的親生母親，拉撒拿龍冠費洛登的妻子。
舉止端莊優雅。
在阿龍去見銀龍後的隔天，瑟萊拉與老公費洛登被發現死於艾瑞利斯家的畫室。
descEn:
Al-lon’s biological mother, the wife of Vaerodan, the Crown of Rathanad.
Behave in a dignified and elegant matter.
A day after Al-lon met the silver dragon, Selyra and her husband, Vaerodan, was found dead in the studio in the Arylith house.

qa.Q:
「『賽勒涅爾』的意思是......」瑟萊拉頓了一下。「等你正式成為龍冠後，我再告訴你吧。」
"The meaning of 'Cyrinel' is......" Selyra pauses. "I'll tell you when you officially become the Crown."
qa.C1:
追問瑟萊拉。
Press Selyra for answer.
qa.C2:
等成為龍冠後再問他吧。
Well, ask her after becoming the Crown then.
qa.R1:
「意思又不會變，急什麼？」瑟萊拉笑道。
"Why rush? The meaning wouldn't change." Selyra smiles.
qa.R2:
一天後你看見瑟萊拉的屍體。
A day later, you see the body of Selyra.

name: Serathe Arylith瑟拉斯・艾瑞利斯
descZh:
阿龍的堂姐。
身材魁武，表情兇狠，看起來對阿龍有些不滿的情緒。後來向阿龍表明自己並非針對他，只是表達方式很直接而已。
擔任拉撒拿的守衛，負責每天的巡邏。
在自己房間內存放各種不同武器。
descEn:
Al-lon’s cousin.
Has a strong build, and looks fierce. Seems like she has some bad impression with Al-lon. She latered confessed to Al-lon that she was not targeting him. She only has a very direct way to communicate.
Acts as a guard in Rathanad, and is in charge of daily patrols.
She has a large collection of weapons in her room.

qa.Q:
「你看什麼看！」瑟拉斯瞪著你。
"How dare you stare at me!" Serathe stares at you.
qa.C1:
你避開眼神，不看著他。
You look away, not staring at her.
qa.C2:
「怎麼了嗎？」你回問瑟拉斯。
"What's the matter?" You ask Serathe.
qa.R1:
「哼。」瑟拉斯悶哼道。
"Huh." Serathe groaned.
qa.R2:
「你想打架嗎？」瑟拉斯站了起來。
"You wanna fight?" Serathe stands up.

name: Shalan Hartlow沙蘭・哈特洛
descZh:
大學城現任的城主，歷史區出生。
待人感覺十分隨興。
descEn:
The current leader of the Great Citadel, Shalan was from the history district.
He treat people with a casual attitude.

qa.Q:
「來來來，喝點茶。」沙蘭招呼你們。
"Come, come have some tea." Shalan greets you.
qa.C1:
坐了下來用茶。
Sit and have tea.
qa.C2:
站著和沙蘭告知你來的目的。
Stand and tell Shalan the purpose you're here.
qa.R1:
半小時後，沙蘭終於問起你們來的目的。
After half an hour, Shalan finally ask the purpose you come here.
qa.R2:
「別著麼嚴肅，輕鬆點。」沙蘭拍拍旁邊的沙發。
"Don't be so serious, relax." Shalan pats the sofa next to him.

name: Sham薩姆
descZh:
有著伊許頓大人身體的人，自稱是月神給予他的。
離開小黑屋時，看見Tweeter的第三隻眼，表示無條件聽從他的命令。
descEn:
A man with the body of Lord Ishton, who claimed was given by the God of Moon.
After leaving the Dark house, Sham saw Tweeter’s third eye, and told Tweeter that he’d obey him no matter what.

qa.Q:
你的夥伴垂死，你呼喚薩姆，請他協助。他表示需要一些祭品。
Your companion is dying. You summon Sham, wanting him to help. He says some sacrifices are needed.
qa.C1:
你答應薩姆。為了救你的隊友，什麼犧牲都是值得的。
You agree. To save your companions, every sacrifice is worth it.
qa.C2:
你遲疑。你知道月神的交易，通常都會讓人後悔。
You hesitate. You know most trades involving the God of Moon makes people regret.
qa.R1:
當薩姆再次現身，他的身邊有兩個孩子。你來不及回應，薩姆就把兩個孩子的生命吸光，隊友的生命穩定了下來。
When Sham shows up, he has two kids next to him. Before you have any time to respond, Sham absorbs the life of the tow kids, and your companions are stable.
qa.R2:
幾分鐘後，你的隊友沒了生命。你不知道如果做了交易，會有什麼結果。
Minutes later, your companions run out of life. You wonder what would've happened if you made the trade.

name: Sha'Doom沙度
descZh:
身份未名的麥克嵩人。
似乎與當地衛兵有很多關聯。
手上刺有十道光芒的太陽。
曾偽裝成Lemmy、拉芬奇以及安雅・拉芬奇。
由玩家義揚操控。
descEn:
A Macksohn local with unknown identity.
Seemed to be connected to the local guards.
He had a Sun with 10 rays on his hand.
Sha’Doom once disguised as Lemmy, LaVinci and Anya LaVinci.
This character was played by Roger.

qa.Q:
在麥克嵩競技場，你看見兩名長得一模一樣的人互相指著對方。周圍是一團大屠殺。
You see at the Macksohn stadium, two identical figures pointing each other. A massacre is happening right around them.
qa.C1:
你選擇隨機攻擊其中一位。至少有一名是假冒者。
You choose to attack one randomly. At least one of them is a doppelganger.
qa.C2:
你仔細觀察，希望能找出破綻。
You look carefully, trying to spot the difference.
qa.R1:
被你攻擊的那一名瞬間變形成你的模樣。
The one that is attacked by you transform into you immediately.
qa.R2:
你發現其中一名身上的細節有些模糊。他比較有可能是冒名者。
You find the details of one of them looking blur. He has a better chance of being a doppelganger.

name: Shifu師父
descZh:
弗萊特境內拉黎爾的一名舊識，真名未知，被尊稱為「師父」。不會一般語，需要由身邊的莉娜和莉塔擔任翻譯與服侍。
似乎擁有一定程度的魔法能力，能將地圖投影至空中。
住在一個看起來蠻漂亮的帳篷內，在冒險者到訪時請他們喝下似乎可以看見一些幻象的茶。
descEn:
An old acquaintance of Ra’Leer in Phreit realm. His name was not known, but he was called “Shifu" instead. He didn’t speak the common tongue, and needed Rina and Rita, who served him, to be his translator.
It seemed that Shifu had some magical power, and he could project maps in the air.

qa.Q:
師父用魔法在空中投影出一個地圖，有些抽象。
Shifu projects a map in the air. It looks somewhat abstract.
qa.C1:
向莉娜與莉塔詢問地圖的細節。
Ask Rina and Rita about the details in the map.
qa.C2:
嘗試自己解讀地圖的內容。
Try to read the map on your own.
qa.R1:
師父長篇大論，莉娜與莉塔用很簡短而生疏的普通語為你翻譯。
Shifu explains a lot, but Rina and Rita translate in short but broken sentences.
qa.R2:
師父看你沒有很了解，嘗試用魔法增加更多細節與標注。
As you look not fully understand, Shifu adds more details and indicators on the map with magic.

name: Sigom III希岡三世
descZh:
狂暴之儀中的評議委員長，是一名瘦小的狗頭人。
鬥名為狂暴之聲。
武器是一把中型的釘頭槌。
descEn:
The chairman of the council in the Rite of Fury, a small and slender kobold.
His battle title is the Voice of Anger.
His weapon is a medium-sized flanged mace.

qa.Q:
你看著瘦小的希崗三世，威風凜凜。
You see the slender Sigom III. He looks fierce.
qa.C1:
詢問澤克他是怎麼成為評議委員長的？
Ask Zek how he became the chairman of the council.
qa.C2:
向希崗三世跪下，對他高超的武藝甘拜下風。
Kneel down to Sigom III. You're awed by his superb martial arts.
qa.R1:
「他的祖先是狂暴戰士幫的創立者。」澤克說道。「他繼承了他祖先的風範。」
"His ancestor was the founder of the Raging Warriors." Zek says. "He inherited his ancestor's demeanor.
qa.R2:
希岡三世扶了你起來。「你通過測試了。」他說。
Sigom III helps you up. "You've passed the trial." He says.

name: Sora索拉
descZh:
謎樣的小男孩。
看起來年齡大約十歲。
疑似留下了他的日記，但日記中記載的年份似乎和現在的紀元不同。
有隻名為嘟嘟的狗。
他的父母為了他的健康，在他身上做了各種儀式，最後卻讓他喪命。
descEn:
A mysterious boy.
He looked like a 10 years old kid.
He seemed to left his diary, but the years in the diary was far from the current empire years.
He had a dog named Dudu."For his health, his parents performed rituals on him, which eventually lead to his death.

qa.Q:
「你說我死了？」索拉困惑的看著你。「什......什麼意思？」
"You say I'm dead?" Sora looks at you, confused. "What...... what do you mean?"
qa.C1:
告訴索拉他是活在過去的人，你們只是到了他的記憶裡。
Tell Sora that he was from the past. You're just in his memory.
qa.C2:
告訴索拉你們會把他救出來，不用擔心。
Tell Sora that you'll save him, and there's no need to worry.
qa.R1:
「我不懂。」索拉皺著眉頭。「我活在......現在啊！」
"I don't get it." Sora frowns. "I live...... in the present."
qa.R2:
「啊。瓦克松醫師說過，有人會來拯救我。就是你們吧？」
"Ah. Dr, Vaxon said there will be someone who'll come and save me. You're those people, right?"

name: Speedy斯比迪
descZh:
台北市議員等人在麥克嵩買的馬。
十分年輕健壯。
descEn:
A horse the party bought at Macksohn.
Young and strong.

qa.Q:
斯比迪的速度很快，但你覺得他有點難以控制。
Speedy is fast, but you think he's a bit hard to control.
qa.C1:
嘗試放慢速度，讓隊伍能跟得上。
Try to slow Speedy down, so the rest of the partt can catch up.
qa.C2:
任由斯比迪奔馳，他適合當偵查的先鋒。
Let Speedy dash. He's fit to be the front scout.
qa.R1:
不久後，斯比迪按耐不住。他不斷發出悶哼聲。
Not after long, Speedy can't stand it anymore. He keeps growling.
qa.R2:
你騎在斯比迪身上往前跑。你懷疑其他人是否知道你們往哪裡跑了。
You ride Speedy and dash. You suspect any one of the group would know where you headed.

name: Tam Quorr譚・寇爾
descZh:
在心空域的宿舍與Lott搭訕的人。年約三十的人類女子。
對冒險者們表示自己在地面上是研究芬尼爾的學者，多年前來到斐納札後逐漸變異，現在覺得自己回不去了。
向冒險者們說明了很多斐納札的規則，包涵每日兩次的禱告、衣服深淺的意義、議員與區域的關係，甚至透露了心空席從缺的消息。
雙手已嚴重變形，表情控制也十分不自然。
譚現身為第三名爭奪心空席的人選，但沒有自己夥伴的他，第一輪就淘汰了。
descEn:
A human woman in her thirties who talked to Lott in the dorm in the Realm of Hollow Heart.
Tam told the adventurers that she used to be a scholar whose topic was around Phyneal, God of Luna, and came to Fenadra. She “changed" a lot, and deemed that she has no way back to the surface now.
Tam told the adventurers a lot of rules here in Fenadra, including the two time prayers everyday, the meaning of the color of their clothes, the relationship between the seats of councilmen and the realms. She even told the adventurers about the news of the absent of the Seat of Hollow Heart.
Her hands are twisted, and her facial expression are extremely distorted.
Tam showed up as the third candidate of the Seat of Hollow Heart. But with no companions, she became the first to be eliminated from the trials.

qa.Q:
你看見譚走向你。他看起來精神有些狀況，但至少他是人類。
You see Tam walking towards you. She looks a bit mentally distorted, but at least she's a human.
qa.C1:
你回覆他的搭話。也許能得到一些有用的資訊。
You respond to her. Maybe you can get some useful information.
qa.C2:
你刻意避開他。這裡所有人都太古怪了。
You ignore her intentionally. Everyone here is just weird.
qa.R1:
你從譚口中聽到不少關於斐納札的資訊，對你有些幫助。
You learn quite a lot about Fenadra from Tam. They're helpful to you.
qa.R2:
譚沒有刻意打擾你。但幾天內，你覺得有一雙眼睛一直在監視你。
Tam doesn't interrupt you intentionally. But in the few days, you feel like someone spying on you.

name: Theramond Arylith瑟拉蒙・艾瑞利斯
descZh:
阿龍的叔叔，費洛登的弟弟。
與艾內莫為夫妻，有三名孩子：瑟拉斯、奈梨紗和維瑞克。
在費洛登死後，成為代理龍冠。
預計在完成審判後，將龍冠交給正式成為艾瑞利斯一族的賽勒涅爾（即阿龍）。
descEn:
Al-lon’s uncle, Vaerodan’s younger brother.
Husband of Enelmor, father of three: Serathe, Nylessa, and Vaelric.
Became the acting Crown after the death of Vaerodan.
Expect to give the Crown to Cyrinel (Al-lon), who had officially became one of the Aryliths, after the trial.

qa.Q:
瑟拉蒙朝著山的那一頭走去。你有些擔心在艾瑞利斯一家發生這麼多事後，他會做什麼事出來。
Theramond walks toward the other side of the hill. You're a bit worried what he'll do after all the things that happened to the Aryliths.
qa.C1:
你追了上去，搭上瑟拉蒙的肩膀。
You run to him, putting your hands to his shoulder.
qa.C2:
你默默看著瑟拉蒙的背影，不讓他離開你的視線。
You silently watch Thermond's back, make sure you don't lose him.
qa.R1:
瑟拉蒙嘆了一口氣。「不用擔心我。」他苦笑著。
Theramond sighs. "Don't worry about me." He smiles bitterly.
qa.R2:
瑟拉蒙在山丘頂坐了下來，眺望遠方。
Theramond sits on the top of the hill, looking into the distance.

name: Thompson湯普生
descZh:
於貝瑟頓經營許久的小型書店「第1410頁」內工作的店員。
與毛毛熟識，會提供雞腿給毛毛吃，似乎與領養他的貴族家庭也有不少交流。
自稱是T.I.D.E.S.組織的相關人員，但並非內部成員。
descEn:
A bookstore clerk of "Page 1410", a small bookstore in Batherdon.
Thompson is familiar with Dawn Light Fur, even provides him chicken drumsticks. He also seemed to have been working with the noble family that adopted Dawn Light Fur.
Thompson claimed to be a related with T.I.D.E.S., but not a member of it.

qa.Q:
你看見湯普生和斑貓人冒險者毛毛十分熟悉。
You see that Thompson is quite familiar with Dawn Light Fur, the Tabaxi adventurer.
qa.C1:
詢問湯普生他和毛毛是怎麼認識的。
Ask Thompson how he and Dawn Light Fur met.
qa.C2:
和湯普生表示你是毛毛的冒險夥伴。
Tell Thompson that you're an adventuring companion of Dawn Light Fur.
qa.R1:
「他的家人過去是我重要的客戶。」湯普生說道。
"His family was my important clients." Thompson says.
qa.R2:
「那你可要好好在冒險途中照顧他。」湯普生微笑道。
"Then you better take good care of him in the adventures." Thompson smiles.

name: Mayor Thorne索恩市長
descZh:
瑟巴諾的鎮長，住在一個華麗的房子內，長期拄著一根拐杖。
因為房子被Inu放火，而對Inu十分厭惡。
招待冒險者們在他家夜宿。
家裡似乎有個神秘的魔法盒子。
死亡時，身上被發現有蜘蛛的咬痕。
descEn:
The mayor of Sebano, who lived in a classy house, and walk with a stick.
He hated Inu since Inu was responsible for his house on fire.
Invited the adventurers to live in his place.
There seemed to be a mysterious magic box in his house.
When he died, there were bitten marks of spiders all over his body.

qa.Q:
你看見索恩市長抓著狗型的Inu，用他的鞭子抽打。
You see Mayor Thorne whipping the dog-like Inu.
qa.C1:
Inu本來就太頑皮了，是該好好教訓他。
Inu has been too naughty. He should totally get a lesson.
qa.C2:
阻止索恩市長。Inu只是個孩子，至少看起來如此。
Stop Mayor Thorne. Inu is just a kid, at least he looks like it.
qa.R1:
Inu咬了索恩市長一口，然後對著房子放火。
Inu bites Mayor Thorne, and incinerate the house.
qa.R2:
索恩市長哼了一聲，放開了Inu。
Mayor Thorne groans, and let go of Inu.

name: Mayor Saerus Pharyon賽爾斯・費利昂市長
descZh:
萊斯諾的市長，即「龍冠」，中年金龍人男性。
個性軟弱而優柔寡斷。
對於萊斯諾和克萊芬的立場模糊。
descEn:
The mayor, a.k.a. Crown, of Lesinor, a mid-aged gold dragonborn male.
Weak and indecisive.
Has an ambiguous stance in the situation between Leisnor and Clyphen.

qa.Q:
賽爾斯市長看起來猶豫不決，無法打斷將軍和大臣的對話。
Mayor Saerus looks indecisive. He can't interrupt the conversation between the General and the Minister.
qa.C1:
繼續觀察賽爾斯市長的窘況。
Keep on observing the awkwardness of Mayor Saerus.
qa.C2:
介入將軍與大臣的對話，為市長發聲。
Intervene the conversation between the General and the Minister, and talk for the Mayor.
qa.R1:
一段時間後，你發現大臣也不說話了，任憑將軍發號施令。
Some time later, you find the Minister stop talking, too, letting the General make orders.
qa.R2:
將軍惡狠狠地瞪者你。「你以為你他媽是誰？」
The General stares at you viciously. "Who the fuck do you think you are?"

name: Tina蒂娜
descZh:
貝瑟頓的貴族里奇蒙家中負責照顧失智的巴托斯爵士的僕人，已經在爵士宅邸工作10年了。
據他所說，這份工作是由巴托斯爵士的女兒萊里付他薪水，且薪資十分不錯。
看見巴托斯爵士從失去神智，變成正常，又化作石頭。央求冒險者們別把真相告訴其他人。
descEn:
The maid who had been taking care of the noble Syr Bartosz Richomnd in Batherdon for 10 years.
As told by Tina, she was paid well by Syr Bartosz’s daughter, Riley.
Witness the progress of Syr Bartosz turning from unconscious, to normal, then into stone. She pleaded the adventurers not to tell the truth to other people.

qa.Q:
面對巴托斯爵士的狀況，蒂娜失業了。
Facing the situation of Syr Bartosz, Tina is now jobless.
qa.C1:
隱瞞事情的真相，讓萊里繼續付蒂娜薪水。
Hide the truth, and let Riley keep on paying Tina.
qa.C2:
利用你的人脈，替蒂娜介紹新的工作。
Use your connections, and find a new job for Tina.
qa.R1:
在那之後，蒂娜再也沒有收到薪水了。
After that, Tina never get her salary anymore.
qa.R2:
新的雇主對蒂娜很滿意，也很高興你能介紹他。
The new employer is very satisfied with Tina, and happy that you introduced her.

name: Trisha of Baylon貝倫的崔夏
descZh:
冒險者們在地下城發現困在牢籠內的半妖精年輕女子。
崔夏自稱來自洛森王國的貝倫部落。他的父母是拉索斯教的忠誠信徒，卻遭到背叛，而導致崔夏被綁至地下城。同時，崔夏也因為父母的關係，對拉索斯教十分了解，進而對該宗教極度厭惡。
幼年時雙手手臂被刺上拉索斯經文的刺青。
隨身攜帶一個裝有開鎖工具的黑色小盒子，以及兩把匕首。
在與冒險者走在地下城的過程中，因為Uko將一顆神祕石放在他的掌心，而將神祕石吸收進了身體裡。
崔夏曾向Midori透露自己會聽到聲音叫他做不好的事情，在石頭融入他身體後，如果他反抗，便會感到極度的頭痛。
在與台北市議員們逃出地城後，與Uko一同從寇林菲爾德逃亡，去尋找他的父母。
descEn:
The half-elf young girl the adventurers found locked up in a cage in the dungeon.
Trisha said she was from Baylon Tribe in the Lothum Kingdom. Her parents were loyal Laxthos worshippers, but was betrayed, which led to Trisha locked up in a cage.At the same time, due to her parents, Trisha was familiar with the cult, but also hated it.
She had Laxthos scripts tattooed on her arms when she was young.
She had a black box of locket picks on her, and also two daggers.
When traveling with the adventurers, a mysterious stone found by Uko was absorbed by her body.
Trisha revealed to Midori that she heard voices telling her to do bad things, and she’d felt agony if she resisted after the mysterious stone was absorbed by her.
When the party escaped the dungeon, she and Uko left Korringfield to find her parents.

qa.Q:
你看見崔夏從口袋掏出一串絕對不屬於他的項鍊。
You see Trisha taking out a neckless from her pocket that definitely don't belong to her.
qa.C1:
私下告訴崔夏這樣做不對。
Tell Trisha privately that this is wrong.
qa.C2:
和崔夏說好換來的金幣要分你一半的金幣。
Tell Trisha that you want half the gold pieces that she gets from the neckless.
qa.R1:
崔夏露出懺悔的表情，但你知道他只是演給你看的。
Trisha shows a regretting face, but you know she's just acting to you.
qa.R2:
崔夏露出得意的表情，點頭答應。
Trisha has a smug expression, nods and agrees.

name: Twiggle頹哥
descZh:
雷雅在貝瑟頓設下陷阱，抓到的松鼠。
目前團隊中僅有Leah可以透過動物溝通術和他對話，從對話中得知他是個滿口髒話、神經質的牆頭草。
目前頹哥與鑰一起坐在鑰的推車上，和冒險者們一起冒險。
被鑰封為「嘎吱爵士」。
descEn:
A squirrel caught be Leah with her traps near Batherdon.
Leah is the only one who can communicate with Twiggle through speak with animals. She found that Twiggle is a swearing edgy bandwagon squirrel.
Twiggle has been staying with Kaname on her cart and travel with the adventurers.
Dubbed as "Syr Creak" by Kaname.

qa.Q:
你看見頹哥暈倒在地上。
You see Twiggle faint on the ground.
qa.C1:
把頹哥撿起來，捧在手心。
Pick up Twiggle, and put him in your hands.
qa.C2:
把頹哥撿起來，放進森林裡。
Pick up Twiggle, and put him into the forest.
qa.R1:
頹哥沒有醒來，但不久後你就聽見他的打呼聲。
Twiggle doesn't wake up. But some time later, you hear him snoring.
qa.R2:
你發現頹哥趁大家不注意時，爬了起來，躲進樹林裡。
You find Twiggle get up when no one pays attention, and hides in the forest.

name: Vaelric Arylith維瑞克・艾瑞利斯
descZh:
阿龍的堂弟。
十分年輕，卻是艾瑞利斯家族內最聰明的存在。
與姊姊奈梨紗感情很好。
擅長各種魔法，甚至會竄改記憶的魔法。
在姊姊奈梨紗被定罪後，利用魔法將自己的記憶洗去。
descEn:
Al-lon’s cousin.
Very young, but already the smartest one in the whole Arylith family.
Vaelric is very close to his sister Nylessa.
Expert in all kinds of magic, and can even perform magic that alter memories.
When his sister Nylessa got convicted, Vaelric used magic to wipe his own memory.

qa.Q:
你知道維瑞克是全艾瑞利斯家最聰明的。你懷疑這個事件他有插手。
You know Vaelric is the most clever one in the Aryliths. You suspect that he is involved in the incident.
qa.C1:
嘗試詢問維瑞克，從他身上套出答案。
Try to ask Vaelric, and get the answer from him.
qa.C2:
仔細觀察維瑞克，從他身上找出把柄。
Observe Vaelric carefully, try to find his weakness.
qa.R1:
維瑞克說得振振有詞。你覺得他可能說謊，但你找不出破綻。
Vaelric speaks with great conviction. You think he might be lying, but you just can't find the loophole.
qa.R2:
你發現維瑞克時不時盯著他的姊姊奈梨紗看。也許你該改對奈梨紗問話。
You find Vaelric staring at his sister, Nylessa. Maybe you should ask Nylessa instead.

name: Vaerodan Arylith費洛登・艾瑞利斯
descZh:
阿龍的親生父親，拉撒拿龍冠。
當年曾下令老尼克索將阿龍的蛋拋棄。
舉止嚴肅但不嚴厲。
在阿龍去見銀龍後的隔天，費洛登與老婆瑟萊拉被發現死於艾瑞利斯家的畫室。
descEn:
Al-lon’s biological father, the Crown of Rathanad.
Ordered Old Nixul to abandan Al-lon’s egg years ago.
Looks serious but not strict.
A day after Al-lon met the silver dragon, Vaerodan and his wife, Selyra, was found dead in the studio in the Arylith house.

qa.Q:
你覺得費洛登用他嚴肅的表情，隱藏了很多秘密。
You think Vaerodan hides a lot of secrets behind his strict face.
qa.C1:
向費洛登詢問關於阿龍被棄養的事。
Ask Vaerodan about the story of Al-lon's abandonment.
qa.C2:
向費洛登詢問關於銀龍的事。
Ask Vaerodan about the Silver Dragon.
qa.R1:
「那是多年前的錯，但我也是逼不得已的。」費洛登小聲說道。
"It was a mistake made years ago, but I had no choice." Vaerodan whispers.
qa.R2:
「那傢伙......我們私下再說吧。」費洛登看了看周圍。
"That guy...... Let's talk later in private." Vaerodan looks around.

name: Dr. Vaxon瓦克松醫師
descZh:
卡什拉的醫生，為匿名之聲工作。
對索拉從小照顧，但也建議索拉的父母對其進行一些儀式，最終導致索拉的死亡。
曾向索拉預言會有幾名冒險者會來把他救出來。
在冒險者們與他相見時，手部似乎有些狀況，與Ron的巫妖之手十分相似。經過Midori的感知，他似乎不是人類，而是名巫妖。
descEn:
The doctor in Kashla, who worked for the Voice of the Anonymous.
Looked after Sora since Sora was a baby, but also suggested Sora’s parents with some rituals, which led to Sora’s final death.
He once told Sora a prophecy that there would be several adventurers who will bring him out.
As the adventurers met him, there seemed to be something wrong with his arms, like Ron’s arm. After Midori’s sensing, Dr. Vaxon might not be a human, but a lich.

qa.Q:
你來到瓦克松醫師的診間。
You come to Dr. Vaxon's clinic.
qa.C1:
你W%ARSFFDHd。
You $^!TY^%UHDYJ.
qa.C2:
你^&JETDYKU(。
You @W#RFAWR&RHT.
qa.R1:
「你以為這些選擇是你自己決定的嗎？」
「這些問題，難道都不是有引導性的問題嗎？」
「你怎麼不自己想想，除了兩個選項外，還有沒有別的可能性？」
"You think these choices are made by yourself?"
"Aren't these all guiding questions?"
"Why don't you stop and think if there's any options outside the two given choices?"
qa.R2:
「Rugatha不過是個虛幻的世界，醒醒吧。」
「這些故事都只是被寫出來的，你很清楚，我也很清楚，所以我們別裝了。」
「等等你骰出大失敗可別怪我。」
"Rugatha is just a fictional world. Wake up."
"These stories are all made up. You know it, and I know it, so let's just not pretend."
"Don't blame me if you roll a critical failure later."

name: Valero Berners瓦萊羅・柏納斯
descZh:
年僅10歲左右，與索拉生下兒子塔里・柏納斯。
父母為懷雅特和露西。
descEn:
About age 10. She had a baby with Sora, named Tari Berners.
Valero’s parents were Wyatt and Lucy.

qa.Q:
你看著年幼的瓦萊羅，懷中抱著一個出生不久的孩子。
You see the young Valero, holding a baby who was just born in her arms.
qa.C1:
詢問瓦萊羅這是誰？
Ask Valero who this is?
qa.C2:
嘗試把孩子接到你手中，讓瓦萊羅休息。
Try to take the baby from Valero, so she can rest.
qa.R1:
「這是我的孩子，塔里。」瓦萊羅說。
"This is my baby, Tari." Valero says.
qa.R2:
孩子大哭。瓦萊羅把他從你手中奪了回來。
The kid cries. Valero snatch the baby from your hands.

name: Lord Wind溫德大人
descZh:
溫德家中的父親。
似乎是拉索斯教的人員，或是從事相關的貿易工作。
descEn:
The father in the Wind family.
He seemed to be working for Laxthos, or did some business that is related to Laxthos.

qa.Q:
「你給我滾出去！」溫德大人抱著昏迷的彼得。「不要讓我再看見你。」
"Go away!" Lord Wind hugs Peter, who is in coma. "Don't let me see you again."
qa.C1:
嘗試和他說明彼得發生了什麼事。
Try to explain what happened to Peter to him.
qa.C2:
默默離開現場。
Leave the scene silently.
qa.R1:
溫德大人從背後抽出匕首，直對著你。
Lord Wind takes a dagger from his back, pointing at you.
qa.R2:
你聽見溫德大人哭喊著彼得的名字。
You hear Lord Wind crying out Peter's name.

name: Xandria, the Violet of Macksohn麥克嵩的紫羅蘭，珊吉雅
descZh:
Paladin的生母，居住在麥克嵩的半身人。
大家對她的形容是「傾國傾城」。
在柏納斯家的晚宴上，和Paladin相認，但是似乎是靠著弗列里爵士的交涉才願意認Paladin。
在比武大會的災難後，決定和弗列里夫婦一同回到寇林菲爾德居住。
曾將胸前的別針和髮簪分別遞給Paladin和YHWH作為信物。
descEn:
The woman who gave birth to Paladin, a halfling who lived in Macksohn.
She was described as the prettiest of all in Macksohn.
She finally admits being Paladin’s mother in the Berners banquet, but mostly due to Syr Flaerry giving up on his title.
After the Macksohn Tournament incident, she decided to go back to Korringfield with the Flaerry couple.
She gave Paladin her pin and YHWH her hairpin as gifts.

qa.Q:
你看見紫羅蘭跟著柏納斯家的人一起出現在晚宴上。他被蓋瑞斯緊緊守護著。
You see the Violet enters the banquet with the Berners. She's escorted by Gareth.
qa.C1:
詢問歐娜・柏納斯紫羅蘭與柏納斯家之間的關係。
Ask Ona about the relationship between the Violet and the Berners.
qa.C2:
詢問刀疤臉紫羅蘭與王室之間的關係。
Ask Scar-Face about the relationship between the Violet and the royal family.
qa.R1:
「我們都是對國王來說重要的人。」歐娜低調的說。
"We're all important figures to the King." Says Ona in low profile.
qa.R2:
「國王十分器重紫羅蘭，他的地位和大臣一樣高。」刀疤臉說。
"The King values the Violet a lot. She's about as important as the Minister." Says Scar-Face.

name: Yuki小雪
descZh:
對Midori而言非常重要的人，多次以幻影出現在Midori的腦中，也曾在妖精荒野時被艾爾比以幻象呈現在大家面前。
過去似乎曾被關押在一個伸手不見五指的地方，現在的動向不明。
在聖拉雅米島的洞穴，被發現操控著拉茲特獸攻擊老鼠人。
descEn:
A very important figure to Midori, who showed up in Midori’s head a lot of times, and also projected by Elby in the Feywild.
She was once locked up in a total dark place, and there had been no clue where she is.
She was found controlling a Laztek, attacking the ratfolks in a cave on St. Rayami Island.

qa.Q:
你看見Midori對著一個幻象直盯著出神。
You see Midori staring at an illusion, mesmerized.
qa.C1:
詢問Midori那個人是誰？
Ask Midori who is the person?
qa.C2:
詢問Midori他生命中是否有很重要的人？
Ask Midori if there is someone important in her life?
qa.R1:
「一個我很珍惜的人。但他消失很久了。」Midori說。
"Someone I cherish. But she's been gone for long." Midori says.
qa.R2:
「你們對我來說都很重要啊。」Midori說。
"You're all important to me." Midori says.

name: Zach札克
descZh:
帶領冒險者前往礦脈的矮人，愛喝啤酒。
有一隻名為啵啵V的機器人夥伴。
在礦脈因掉入陷阱而死亡。
descEn:
The dwarf who brought the adventurers to the mine, who lived drinking beer.
He had a robot companion called BoBo-V.
Zach fell into a trap and died in the mine.

qa.Q:
你看見札克走在礦脈中，搖搖晃晃。
You see Zach walking in the mine, wobbling.
qa.C1:
要札克休息一下，清醒一點再繼續往前走。
Tell Zach to take a break, and continue after he's sober.
qa.C2:
隨時注意札克的狀況，讓他繼續。
Watch out for Zach, and let him continue on.
qa.R1:
「我沒事！」札克拍拍胸脯。「這裡我老熟了！」
"I'm alright!" Zach pats his chest. "I'm familiar with this hell of a place!"
qa.R2:
當你注意到時已經來不及了。札克踩到了陷阱。
It's too late when you notice it. Zach steps on a trap.

name: Zek澤克
descZh:
狂暴戰士幫位於拉克渡口的首領。
是一名有一頭紫髮的壯碩男子。
委託冒險者去聖拉雅米島上尋找失蹤的狂暴戰士幫成員。
並舉行了狂暴之儀測試波以及YHWH是否有加入狂暴戰士幫的資質。
descEn:
The leader of the Raging Warriors at Lark Crossing.
He is a burly man with purple hair.
He commissioned the adventurers to search St. Rayami Island for missing members of the Raging Warriors.
He also conducted the Rite of Fury to test whether Beau and YHWH were qualified to join the Raging Warriors.

qa.Q:
「關於狂暴戰士幫，還有什麼問題嗎？」澤克看著大家。
"Are there any more question about the Raging Warriors?" Zek looks at everyone.
qa.C1:
詢問關於狂暴戰士幫的歷史。
Ask about the history of the Raging Warriors.
qa.C2:
詢問自己在狂暴戰士幫可以得到什麼鬥名。
Ask what title you can get in the Raging Warriors.
qa.R1:
「這一切都得從希崗大人開始說起。」澤克坐了下來。
"It all starts with Lord Sigom." Zek sits down.
qa.R2:
「你？我想想......」澤克停了一下。「大概是『說說傻話』吧！」
"You? Let me think......" Zek paused. "I'd say something like 'Nonsense Speaker', I guess."

name: Manbao慢爆
descZh:
Samael於麥克嵩地下城撿到的拉茲特獸幼獸，行動緩慢，聲音低沉。
被Samael當成酷爆的弟弟養。
食性未知。
descEn:
A Laztek pup that Samael found in the Macksohn Dungeon.
It moves slowly and has a deep, rumbling voice.
Samael keeps it as Kubao's little brother.
Its diet is unknown.

qa.Q:
你看見慢爆停在Ron手上休息。
You see Manbao resting on Ron's hand.
qa.C1:
把慢爆挪下來。
Move Manbao from Ron's hand.
qa.C2:
問Ron這是怎麼回事？
Ask Ron what this is about.
qa.R1:
你發現挪下來後，慢爆又爬回去了。
You find Manbao crawls back after you move it away.
qa.R2:
「啊我怎麼會知道？」Ron聳聳肩。「他就喜歡啊。」
"How would I know?" Ron shrugs. "He just likes it."

name: Dudu嘟嘟
descZh:
索拉家養的黃金獵犬，十分活潑，受到YHWH的喜愛。
在一次瓦克松建議的儀式中，被開腸剖肚，拿來獻祭。
descEn:
The golden retriever that Sora owned, it was lively and loved by YHWH.
In a ritual hold by Dr. Vaxon, It was killed and slit through its body as a sacrifice.

qa.Q:
你看見嘟嘟的屍體躺在你們面前。
You see the body of Dudu in front of all of you.
qa.C1:
遮住索拉的眼睛。
Cover Sora's eyes.
qa.C2:
看看索拉有什麼反應。
Observe what reaction Sora has.
qa.R1:
「沒事......我知道發生什麼事了。」索拉流著淚。
"It's alright...... I know what happened." Tears run out of Sora's eyes.
qa.R2:
「嘟嘟......為什麼......」索拉跪了下來。
"Dudu...... Why......" Sora kneels down.

name: Kubao酷爆
descZh:
Samael於嚎叫森林守夜時撿起的幼狼，隨著台北市議員們一起行動。
在地下城時，透過Uko告知大家他的本名為戴倫，不過願意接受酷爆為他的名字。
descEn:
A wolf pup that Samael found at the Howling Forest when she took the night shift.
酷爆 adventured with the party.
In the dungeon, it told Uko that its original name was Darren, but was fine with 酷爆 being its name.

qa.Q:
餵食酷爆的時間到了。你身上有很多種可以餵他的食物。
It's time to feed Kubao. You have a lot of choices of food to feed him.
qa.C1:
拿出你的乾糧，分他一大塊。
Take out your rations, and give him a big piece.
qa.C2:
拿出你收藏的肉乾，拔一塊給他。
Take out your collection of jerky, and give him a piece.
qa.R1:
酷爆小口小口地吃，吃一半就不吃了。
Kubao takes small bites, and stops eating halfway through.
qa.R2:
酷爆大口把肉乾吃掉，討著下一塊吃。
Kubao devours a large piece of jerkey, looking forward to a new one.

name: Petra佩特拉
descZh:
居住在金海岸礦坑中的老鼠人。
受到拉索斯教徒的脅迫，在島上綁架居民。
在金海岸礦坑的戰鬥中展現了驚人的求生意志。
descEn:
A ratfolk living in the Gold Coast Mines.
Forced by followers of Laxthos to kidnap residents on the island.
She displayed an astonishing will to survive during the battle in the Gold Coast Mines.

qa.Q:
你看見一隻鼠人冒險者，正在幫助拯救其他鼠人。
You see a ratfolk adventurer, saving the other ratfolks.
qa.C1:
你上前和他致意。
You walk up to her and pay your tribute.
qa.C2:
你邀請他加入你的團隊。
You ask her to join your adventuring group.
qa.R1:
佩特拉和你握手，並表示救人要緊。
Petra shakes your hand, and say that saving others is priority.
qa.R2:
佩特拉感謝你的邀請，但他表示自己有更重要的事項。
Petra thanks you for inviting, but says she has other priorities.

name: Yi伊
descZh:
麥克嵩貧民窟的年輕男子，似乎和貧民窟裡的多數人都認識。
受僱於被他稱為M伯爵的馬可斯・詹斯之下，擔任類似情報員的角色，負責搜集和蜘蛛神教相關的情報。
有一座秘密基地，裡面有不少和宗教相關的書籍。
由玩家Nasa扮演。
descEn:
A young man from old town Macksohn, who seemed to know everyone in the old town.
He was hired by Marcus Jens, whom he called Count M, as an agent, in charge of information on the Spider-God religion.
He had a secret base with lots of books on religion.
This character was played by Nasa.

qa.Q:
你看見伊躡手躡腳地在馬克斯家附近逡巡。
You see Yi sneaking around Marcus's house.
qa.C1:
你上前詢問他在幹麻。
You walk up to him, asking what he's doing.
qa.C2:
你登門拜訪馬克斯，並告訴他你看到的事。
You visit Marcus, and tell him what you see.
qa.R1:
「我不確定M伯爵有沒有在家......」伊尷尬的說道。
"I'm not sure if Count M is at home or not......" Yi says awkwardly.
qa.R2:
「噢，你說的是我的線人。」馬可斯笑了笑。「他常常這樣子，但他是個好孩子。」
"Oh, you're talking about my informant." Marcus laughs. "He's often like that, but he's a good kid."

name: Yung勇哥
descZh:
馬格努斯爵士給Lemmy騎去麥克嵩的馬。
年紀較大，跑的速度比較慢，但是依舊穩健且可靠。
descEn:
The horse that Syr Magnus provided Lemmy to ride to Macksohn.
He was old and slow, but still steady and reliable.

qa.Q:
你發現在團隊加入斯比迪後，勇哥好像更沒自信了。
You find that after Speedy joins the group, Yung seems less confident.
qa.C1:
你利用餵食的機會，多餵勇哥一些稻草。
You take the opportunity to feed Yung more straw.
qa.C2:
你故意當著勇哥的面，說著「那個斯比迪也沒什麼了不起嘛」。
You intentionally say "that Speedy is nothing special" in front of Yung.
qa.R1:
勇哥慢慢吃，還是把多給的稻草也吃完了。
Yung takes it slow, but still finish the extra straw.
qa.R2:
你似乎聽見勇哥嘆氣。但他只是隻馬，不會嘆氣的吧？
You seem to hear Yung sigh. But he's just a horse, he wouldn't sigh, right?
